papers.title: Dispute Resolution in Voting
papers.authors: David A. Basin, Sasa Radomirovic, Lara Schmid
papers.abstract: In voting, disputes arise when a voter claims that the voting authority is dishonest and did not correctly process his ballot while the authority claims to have followed the protocol. A dispute can be resolved if any third party can unambiguously determine who is right. We systematically characterize all relevant disputes for a generic, practically relevant, class of voting protocols. Based on our characterization, we propose a new definition of dispute resolution for voting that accounts for the possibility that both voters and the voting authority can make false claims and that voters may abstain from voting.A central aspect of our work is timeliness: a voter should possess the evidence required to resolve disputes no later than the election’s end. We characterize what assumptions are necessary and sufficient for timeliness in terms of a communication topology for our voting protocol class. We formalize the dispute resolution properties and communication topologies symbolically. This provides the basis for verification of dispute resolution for a broad class of protocols. To demonstrate the utility of our model, we analyze a mixnet-based voting protocol and prove that it satisfies dispute resolution as well as verifiability and receipt-freeness. To prove our claims, we combine machine-checked proofs with traditional pen-and-paper proofs.
papers.abstract_zh: 在投票中，当投票人声称投票当局不诚实，没有正确处理他的选票，而当局声称遵守了协议时，就会产生争议。如果任何第三方能够明确确定谁是对的，争议就可以得到解决。我们系统地描述了一类通用的、实际相关的投票协议的所有相关争议。基于我们的描述，我们提出了一个新的投票争议解决的定义，该定义考虑了投票人和投票机构都可以提出虚假声明以及投票人可以放弃投票的可能性。我们工作的一个核心方面是及时性:选民应该在选举结束前掌握解决争端所需的证据。我们根据投票协议类的通信拓扑来描述什么假设对于及时性是必要的和充分的。我们将争议解决属性和通信拓扑符号化。这为一大类协议的争议解决的验证提供了基础。为了证明模型的实用性，我们分析了一个基于mixnet的投票协议，并证明了它满足争议解决以及可验证性和无收据性。为了证明我们的主张，我们将机器检查的校样与传统的纸笔校样结合起来。
papers.title_zh: 投票中的争议解决

papers.title: Fifty Shades of Ballot Privacy: Privacy against a Malicious Board
papers.authors: Véronique Cortier, Joseph Lallemand, Bogdan Warinschi
papers.abstract: We propose a framework for the analysis of electronic voting schemes in the presence of malicious bulletin boards. We identify a spectrum of notions where the adversary is allowed to tamper with the bulletin board in ways that reflect practical deployment and usage considerations. To clarify the security guarantees provided by the different notions we establish a relation with simulation-based security with respect to a family of ideal functionalities. The ideal functionalities make clear the set of authorised attacker capabilities which makes it easier to understand and compare the associated levels of security. As an application, we study three protocols of the literature (Helios, Belenios, and Civitas) and identify the different levels of privacy they offer.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一个框架来分析存在恶意公告板的电子投票方案。我们确定了一系列概念，其中允许对手以反映实际部署和使用考虑的方式篡改公告板。为了阐明由不同概念提供的安全保证，我们建立了关于一族理想功能的基于模拟的安全性的关系。理想的功能明确了授权攻击者的能力集，这使得理解和比较相关的安全级别变得更加容易。作为应用，我们研究了文献中的三个协议(Helios、Belenios和Civitas ),并确定了它们提供的不同隐私级别。
papers.title_zh: 投票隐私的五十个层次:反对恶意董事会的隐私

papers.title: Universal Unconditional Verifiability in E-Voting without Trusted Parties
papers.authors: Vincenzo Iovino, Alfredo Rial, Peter B. Rønne, Peter Y. A. Ryan
papers.abstract: In e-voting protocols, cryptographers must balance usability with strong security guarantees, such as privacy and verifiability. In traditional e-voting protocols, privacy is often provided by a trusted authority that learns the votes and computes the tally. Some protocols replace the trusted authority by a set of authorities, and privacy is guaranteed if less than a threshold number of authorities are corrupt. For verifiability, stronger security is demanded. Typically, corrupt authorities that try to fake the tally result must always be detected.To provide verifiability, many e-voting protocols use Non-Interactive Zero-Knowledge proofs (NIZK). Thanks to their non-interactive nature, NIZK allow anybody, including third parties that do not participate in the protocol, to verify the correctness of the tally. Therefore, NIZK can be used to obtain universal verifiability. Additionally, NIZK also improve usability because they allow voters to cast a vote non-interactively.The disadvantage of NIZK is that their security is based on setup assumptions such as the common reference string (CRS) or the random oracle model. The former requires a trusted party to generate a CRS. The latter, though a popular model for secure protocol design, has been shown to be unsound.We address the design of e-voting protocols that provide verifiability without any trust assumptions. We show that Non-Interactive Witness-Indistinguishable proofs can be used for this purpose. Our e-voting protocols are private under the Decision Linear assumption, while perfect individual verifiability, i.e. a fake tally is detected with probability 1, holds unconditionally. Perfect universal verifiability requires a trusted public bulletin board. We remark that our definition of verifiability does not consider eligibility or end-to-end verifiability. First, we present a general construction that supports any tally function. Then, we show how to efficiently instantiate it for specific types of elections through Groth-Sahai proofs.
papers.abstract_zh: 在电子投票协议中，密码学家必须在可用性和强大的安全保证(如隐私和可验证性)之间取得平衡。在传统的电子投票协议中，隐私通常由可信的权威机构提供，该权威机构学习投票并计算票数。一些协议用一组机构代替可信机构，并且如果少于阈值数量的机构被破坏，则隐私得到保证。对于可验证性，需要更强的安全性。通常情况下，试图伪造计票结果的腐败当局总是会被发现。为了提供可验证性，许多电子投票协议使用非交互式零知识证明(NIZK)。由于它们的非交互性质，NIZK允许任何人，包括不参与协议的第三方，来验证计数的正确性。因此，NIZK可以用来获得普遍的可验证性。此外，NIZK还提高了可用性，因为它们允许投票者以非交互方式投票。NIZK的缺点是，它们的安全性基于设置假设，如公共引用字符串(CRS)或随机oracle模型。前者要求可信方生成CRS。后者虽然是安全协议设计的流行模型，但已被证明是不可靠的。我们解决了电子投票协议的设计，提供了没有任何信任假设的可验证性。我们表明，非交互式证人不可区分的证据可以用于这一目的。在决策线性假设下，我们的电子投票协议是私有的，而完美的个人可验证性，即以概率1检测到虚假计票，无条件成立。完美的普遍可验证性需要一个可信的公共公告板。我们注意到，我们对可验证性的定义没有考虑资格或端到端的可验证性。首先，我们给出一个支持任何计数函数的通用结构。然后，我们通过Groth-Sahai证明展示了如何针对特定类型的选举有效地实例化它。
papers.title_zh: 无可信中心电子投票的普遍无条件可验证性

papers.title: SoK: Techniques for Verifiable Mix Nets
papers.authors: Thomas Haines, Johannes Müller
papers.abstract: Since David Chaum introduced the idea of mix nets 40 years ago, they have become widely used building blocks for privacy-preserving protocols. Several important applications, such as secure e-voting, require that the employed mix net be verifiable. In the literature, numerous techniques have been proposed to make mix nets verifiable. Some of them have also been employed in politically binding elections. Verifiable mix nets differ in many aspects, including their precise verifiability levels, possible trust assumptions, and required cryptographic primitives; unfortunately, these differences are often opaque, making comparison painful. To shed light on this intransparent state of affairs, we provide the following contributions. For each verifiability technique proposed to date, we first precisely describe how the underlying basic mix net is to be extended and which (additional) cryptographic primitives are required, and then study its verifiability level, including possible trust assumptions, within one generic and expressive verifiability framework. Based on our uniform treatment, we are able to transparently compare all known verifiability techniques for mix nets, including their advantages and limitations. Altogether, our work offers a detailed and expressive reference point for the design, employment, and comparison of verifiable mix nets.
papers.abstract_zh: 自从David Chaum在40年前提出混合网络的概念以来，它们已经成为隐私保护协议广泛使用的构建模块。一些重要的应用，如安全的电子投票，要求使用的混合网是可验证的。在文献中，已经提出了许多技术来使混合网可验证。他们中的一些人还在具有政治约束力的选举中被雇用。可验证混合网在许多方面不同，包括它们的精确可验证性级别、可能的信任假设和所需的密码原语；不幸的是，这些差异往往是不透明的，这使得比较变得很痛苦。为了阐明这种不透明的状态，我们提供以下贡献。对于迄今为止提出的每一种可验证性技术，我们首先精确地描述如何扩展底层的基本混合网，以及需要哪些(附加的)密码原语，然后在一个通用的和表达性的可验证性框架内研究其可验证性级别，包括可能的信任假设。基于我们的统一处理，我们能够透明地比较所有已知的混合网验证技术，包括它们的优点和局限性。总之，我们的工作为可验证混合网络的设计、使用和比较提供了一个详细的和有表现力的参考点。
papers.title_zh: SoK:可验证混合网技术

papers.title: Transparent IFC Enforcement: Possibility and (In)Efficiency Results
papers.authors: Maximilian Algehed, Cormac Flanagan
papers.abstract: Information Flow Control (IFC) is a collection of techniques for ensuring a no-write-down no-read-up style security policy known as noninterference. Traditional methods for both static (e.g. type systems) and dynamic (e.g. runtime monitors) IFC suffer from untenable numbers of false alarms on real-world programs. Secure Multi-Execution (SME) promises to provide secure information flow control without modifying the behaviour of already secure programs, a property commonly referred to as transparency. Implementations of SME exist for the web in the form of the FlowFox browser and as plug-ins to several programming languages. Furthermore, SME can in theory work in a black-box manner, meaning that it can be programming language agnostic, making it perfect for securing legacy or third-party systems. As such SME, and its variants like Multiple Facets (MF) and Faceted Secure Multi-Execution (FSME), appear to be a family of panaceas for the security engineer. The question is, how come, given all these advantages, that these techniques are not ubiquitous in practice?The answer lies, partially, in the issue of runtime and memory overhead. SME and its variants are prohibitively expensive to deploy in many non-trivial situations. The natural question is why is this the case? On the surface, the reason is simple. The techniques in the SME family all rely on the idea of multi-execution, running all or parts of a program multiple times to achieve noninterference. Naturally, this causes some overhead. However, the predominant thinking in the IFC community has been that these overheads can be overcome. In this paper we argue that there are fundamental reasons to expect this not to be the case and prove two key theorems:•All transparent enforcement is polynomial time equivalent to multi-execution.•All black-box enforcement takes time exponential in the number of principals in the security lattice.Our methods also allow us to answer, in the affirmative, an open question about the possibility of secure and transparent enforcement of a security condition known as Termination Insensitive Noninterference.
papers.abstract_zh: 信息流控制(IFC)是一个技术集合，用于确保无写无读风格的安全策略，称为无干扰。静态(例如类型系统)和动态(例如运行时监视器)IFC的传统方法在现实世界的程序中遭受难以维持的大量错误警报。安全多执行(SME)承诺提供安全的信息流控制，而不修改已经安全的程序的行为，这种特性通常被称为透明性。SME的实现以FlowFox浏览器的形式存在于web上，并作为几种编程语言的插件。此外，SME在理论上可以以黑盒方式工作，这意味着它可以是编程语言不可知的，这使得它非常适合保护遗留系统或第三方系统。因此，SME及其变体，如多方面(MF)和多方面安全多执行(FSME ),似乎是安全工程师的万能药系列。问题是，考虑到所有这些优势，为什么这些技术在实践中并不普遍？答案部分在于运行时和内存开销的问题。在许多重要的情况下，部署SME及其变体是极其昂贵的。很自然的问题是为什么会这样？表面上看，原因很简单。SME家族中的技术都依赖于多重执行的思想，即多次运行程序的全部或部分以实现互不干扰。这自然会导致一些开销。然而，国际金融公司界的主导思想是这些开销是可以克服的。在本文中，我们认为有一些基本的理由认为情况并非如此，并证明了两个关键定理:所有透明执行都是多项式时间的，等价于多执行。所有的黑盒强制执行需要的时间与安全网格中主体的数量成指数关系。我们的方法还允许我们以肯定的方式回答一个公开的问题，该问题是关于被称为终止不敏感不干扰的安全条件的安全和透明实施的可能性。
papers.title_zh: 透明的国际金融公司执行:可能性和(低)效率结果

papers.title: VERONICA: Expressive and Precise Concurrent Information Flow Security
papers.authors: Daniel Schoepe, Toby Murray, Andrei Sabelfeld
papers.abstract: Methods for proving that concurrent software does not leak its secrets has remained an active topic of research for at least the past four decades. Despite an impressive array of work, the present situation remains highly unsatisfactory. With contemporary compositional proof methods one is forced to choose between expressiveness (the ability to reason about a wide variety of security policies), on the one hand, and precision (the ability to reason about complex thread interactions and program behaviours), on the other. Achieving both is essential and, we argue, requires a new style of compositional reasoning.We present VERONICA, the first program logic for proving concurrent programs information flow secure that supports compositional, high-precision reasoning about a wide range of security policies and program behaviours (e.g. expressive declassification, value-dependent classification, secret-dependent branching). Just as importantly, VERONICA embodies a new approach for engineering such logics that can be re-used elsewhere, called decoupled functional correctness (DFC). DFC leads to a simple and clean logic, even while achieving this unprecedented combination of features. We demonstrate the virtues and versatility of VERONICA by verifying a range of example programs, beyond the reach of prior methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 至少在过去的四十年里，证明并发软件不泄漏其秘密的方法一直是一个活跃的研究课题。尽管做了大量令人印象深刻的工作，但目前的情况仍然非常不令人满意。对于当代的组合证明方法，人们不得不在表达性(推理各种安全策略的能力)和精确性(推理复杂的线程交互和程序行为的能力)之间做出选择。实现这两个目标是必要的，我们认为，这需要一种新的组合推理方式。我们提出了VERONICA，这是第一个用于证明并发程序信息流安全的程序逻辑，它支持关于广泛的安全策略和程序行为(例如，表达式解密、值相关分类、秘密相关分支)的组合、高精度推理。同样重要的是，VERONICA体现了一种设计这种可以在其他地方重用的逻辑的新方法，称为解耦功能正确性(DFC)。DFC导致了一个简单和干净的逻辑，甚至在实现这种前所未有的功能组合。我们通过验证一系列示例程序来展示VERONICA的优点和多功能性，这是以前的方法无法达到的。
papers.title_zh: VERONICA:表达性和精确的并发信息流安全

papers.title: Reconciling progress-insensitive noninterference and declassification
papers.authors: Johan Bay, Aslan Askarov
papers.abstract: Practitioners of secure information flow often face a design challenge: what is the right semantic treatment of leaks via termination? On the one hand, the potential harm of untrusted code calls for strong progress-sensitive security. On the other hand, when the code is trusted to not aggressively exploit termination channels, practical concerns, such as permissiveness of the enforcement, make a case for settling for weaker, progress-insensitive security. This binary situation, however, provides no suitable middle point for systems that mix trusted and untrusted code. This paper connects the two extremes by reframing progress-insensitivity as a particular form of declassification. Our novel semantic condition reconciles progress-insensitive security as a declassification bound on the so-called progress knowledge in an otherwise progress or timing sensitive setting. We show how the new condition can be soundly enforced using a mostly standard information-flow monitor. We believe that the connection established in this work will enable other applications of ideas from the literature on declassification to progress-insensitivity.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全信息流的实践者经常面临一个设计挑战:通过终止的泄漏的正确语义处理是什么？一方面，不可信代码的潜在危害要求强的对进度敏感的安全性。另一方面，当代码被信任不会积极地利用终止通道时，实际的考虑，如强制的允许性，使得满足于较弱的、对进程不敏感的安全性成为可能。然而，这种二进制情况没有为混合可信和不可信代码的系统提供合适的中间点。本文将这两个极端联系起来，将对进展不敏感重新定义为解密的一种特殊形式。我们的新语义条件将对进度不敏感的安全性调和为在其他进度或时间敏感设置中的所谓进度知识上的解密界限。我们展示了如何使用一个基本标准的信息流监视器来合理地实施新的条件。我们相信，这项工作中建立的联系将使其他应用的想法从解密的文献进展不敏感。
papers.title_zh: 调和对进程不敏感的不干扰和解密

papers.title: Language-Based Web Session Integrity
papers.authors: Stefano Calzavara, Riccardo Focardi, Niklas Grimm, Matteo Maffei, Mauro Tempesta
papers.abstract: Session management is a fundamental component of web applications: despite the apparent simplicity, correctly implementing web sessions is extremely tricky, as witnessed by the large number of existing attacks. This motivated the design of formal methods to rigorously reason about web session security which, however, are not supported at present by suitable automated verification techniques. In this paper we introduce the first security type system that enforces session security on a core model of web applications, focusing in particular on server-side code. We showcase the expressiveness of our type system by analyzing the session management logic of HotCRP, Moodle, and phpMyAdmin, unveiling novel security flaws that have been acknowledged by software developers.
papers.abstract_zh: 会话管理是web应用程序的一个基本组件:尽管表面上很简单，但正确实现web会话是非常棘手的，正如大量现有攻击所证明的那样。这激励了形式化方法的设计，以严格推理web会话安全性，然而，目前还没有合适的自动验证技术支持。在本文中，我们介绍了第一个安全类型系统，该系统在web应用程序的核心模型上实施会话安全，特别关注服务器端代码。我们通过分析HotCRP、Moodle和phpMyAdmin的会话管理逻辑展示了我们的类型系统的表达能力，揭示了软件开发人员已经承认的新的安全缺陷。
papers.title_zh: 基于语言的Web会话完整性

papers.title: First-Order Logic for Flow-Limited Authorization
papers.authors: Andrew K. Hirsch, Pedro H. Azevedo de Amorim, Ethan Cecchetti, Ross Tate, Owen Arden
papers.abstract: We present the Flow-Limited Authorization First-Order Logic (FLAFOL), a logic for reasoning about authorization decisions in the presence of information-flow policies. We formalize the FLAFOL proof system, characterize its proof-theoretic properties, and develop its security guarantees. In particular, FLAFOL is the first logic to provide a non-interference guarantee while supporting all connectives of first-order logic. Furthermore, this guarantee is the first to combine the notions of non-interference from both authorization logic and information-flow systems. All the theorems in this paper are proven in Coq.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了流受限授权一阶逻辑(FLAFOL)，这是一种在信息流策略存在的情况下对授权决策进行推理的逻辑。我们形式化了FLAFOL证明系统，刻画了它的证明理论性质，并发展了它的安全保证。特别是，FLAFOL是第一个提供无干扰保证的逻辑，同时支持一阶逻辑的所有连接词。此外，这种保证首次将授权逻辑和信息流系统的不干涉概念结合起来。本文中的所有定理都在Coq中得到了证明。
papers.title_zh: 限流授权的一阶逻辑

papers.title: Types and Abstract Interpretation for Authorization Hook Advice
papers.authors: Christian Skalka, David Darais, Trent Jaeger, Frank Capobianco
papers.abstract: Authorization hooks are access control checks that prevent unauthorized principals from interacting with some protected resource, and are used extensively in critical software such as operating systems, middleware, and server programs. They are often intended to mediate information flow between subjects (e.g., file owners), but typically in an ad-hoc manner. In this paper we present a static type and effect system for detecting whether authorization hooks in programs properly defend against undesired information flow between subjects. A significant novelty of our approach is an integrated abstract interpretation-based tool that guides system clients through the information flow consequences of access control policy decisions.
papers.abstract_zh: 授权挂钩是一种访问控制检查，可以防止未经授权的主体与某些受保护的资源进行交互，广泛用于操作系统、中间件和服务器程序等关键软件中。它们通常旨在协调主体(例如文件所有者)之间的信息流，但通常是以特别的方式。在本文中，我们提出了一个静态类型和效果系统，用于检测程序中的授权挂钩是否正确地防御了主体之间不希望的信息流。我们方法的一个显著创新是一个集成的基于抽象解释的工具，它通过访问控制策略决策的信息流结果来指导系统客户。
papers.title_zh: 授权挂钩通知的类型和抽象解释

papers.title: Optimal Obfuscation Mechanisms via Machine Learning
papers.authors: Marco Romanelli, Konstantinos Chatzikokolakis, Catuscia Palamidessi
papers.abstract: We consider the problem of obfuscating sensitive information while preserving utility, and we propose a machine-learning approach inspired by the generative adversarial networks paradigm. The idea is to set up two nets: the generator, that tries to produce an optimal obfuscation mechanism to protect the data, and the classifier, that tries to de-obfuscate the data. By letting the two nets compete against each other, the mechanism improves its degree of protection, until an equilibrium is reached. We apply our method to the case of location privacy, and we perform experiments on synthetic data and on real data from the Gowalla dataset. We evaluate the privacy of the mechanism not only by its capacity to defeat the classifier, but also in terms of the Bayes error, which represents the strongest possible adversary. We compare the privacy-utility tradeoff of our method with that of the planar Laplace mechanism used in geo-indistinguishability, showing favorable results. Like the Laplace mechanism, our system can be deployed at the user end for protecting his location.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们考虑在保持效用的同时混淆敏感信息的问题，并提出一种受生成对抗网络范式启发的机器学习方法。这个想法是建立两个网络:生成器，试图产生一个最佳的混淆机制来保护数据，以及分类器，试图去混淆数据。通过让两个网相互竞争，该机制提高了它的保护程度，直到达到平衡。我们将我们的方法应用于位置隐私的情况，并在合成数据和Gowalla数据集的真实数据上进行实验。我们不仅通过其击败分类器的能力来评估该机制的私密性，而且根据贝叶斯误差来评估该机制的私密性，贝叶斯误差代表最强的可能对手。我们比较了我们的方法与地理不可区分性中使用的平面拉普拉斯机制的隐私-效用权衡，显示了良好的结果。像拉普拉斯机制一样，我们的系统可以部署在用户端以保护他的位置。
papers.title_zh: 基于机器学习的最优混淆机制

papers.title: A Method for Proving Unlinkability of Stateful Protocols
papers.authors: David Baelde, Stéphanie Delaune, Solène Moreau
papers.abstract: The rise of contactless and wireless devices such as mobile phones and RFID chips justifies significant concerns over privacy, and calls for communication protocols that ensure some form of unlinkability. Formally specifying this property is difficult and context-dependent, and analysing it is very complex; as is common with security protocols, several incorrect unlinkability claims can be found in the literature. Formal verification is therefore desirable, but current techniques are not sufficient to directly analyse unlinkability. In [21], two conditions have been identified that imply unlinkability and can be automatically verified. That work, however, only considers a restricted class of protocols. We adapt their formal definition as well as their proof method to the common setting of RFID authentication protocols, where readers access a central database of authorised users. Moreover, we also consider protocols where readers may update their database, and tags may also carry a mutable state. We propose sufficient conditions to ensure unlinkability, find new attacks, and obtain new proofs of unlinkability using Tamarin to establish our sufficient conditions.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动电话和RFID芯片等非接触式无线设备的兴起证明了人们对隐私的极大关注，并呼吁通信协议确保某种形式的不可链接性。形式化地描述这个属性是困难的，并且依赖于上下文，分析它是非常复杂的；与安全协议一样，在文献中可以找到一些不正确的不可链接性声明。因此，形式验证是可取的，但目前的技术不足以直接分析不可链接性。在[21]中，已经确定了暗示不可链接性并且可以自动验证的两个条件。然而，这项工作只考虑了一类有限的协议。我们调整了它们的形式定义以及它们的证明方法，以适应RFID认证协议的公共设置，其中读取器访问授权用户的中央数据库。此外，我们还考虑了一些协议，在这些协议中，读者可以更新他们的数据库，标签也可以携带可变状态。我们提出充分的条件来确保不可链接性，发现新的攻击，并获得新的证明不可链接性使用Tamarin建立我们的充分条件。
papers.title_zh: 一种证明有状态协议不可链接性的方法

papers.title: Abstracting Faceted Execution
papers.authors: Kristopher K. Micinski, David Darais, Thomas Gilray
papers.abstract: Faceted execution is a linguistic paradigm for dynamic information-flow control with the distinguishing feature that program values may be faceted. Such values represent multiple versions or facets at once, for different security labels. This enables policy-agnostic programming: a paradigm permitting expressive privacy policies to be declared, independent of program logic. Although faceted execution prevents information leakage at runtime, it does not guarantee the absence of failure due to policy violations. By contrast with static mechanisms (such as security type systems), dynamic information-flow control permits arbitrarily expressive and dynamic privacy policies but imposes significant runtime overhead and delays discovery of any possible violations. In this paper, we present the two different abstract interpretations for faceted execution in the presence of first-class policies. We first present an abstraction which allows one to reason statically about the shape of facets at each program point. This abstraction is useful for statically proving the absence of runtime errors and eliminating runtime checks related to facets. Reasoning statically about the contents of faceted values, however, is complicated by the presence of first-class security labels, especially because abstract labels may conflate more than one runtime label. To address these issues, we also develop a more precise abstraction that relies on an analysis tracking singleton heap abstractions. We present an implementation of our coarse abstraction in Racket and demonstrate its performance on several sample programs. We conclude by showing how our precise domain can be used to verify information-flow properties.
papers.abstract_zh: 分面执行是一种动态信息流控制的语言范式，其显著特征是程序值可能是分面的。对于不同的安全标签，这些值一次表示多个版本或方面。这使得与策略无关的编程成为可能:这是一种允许声明表达性隐私策略的范例，独立于程序逻辑。尽管分面执行可以防止运行时的信息泄漏，但它不能保证不会因为违反策略而导致失败。与静态机制(例如安全类型的系统)相比，动态信息流控制允许任意表达和动态的隐私策略，但是强加了显著的运行时开销，并且延迟了对任何可能的违反的发现。在本文中，我们提出了一级策略下刻面执行的两种不同的抽象解释。我们首先给出一个抽象，它允许人们静态地推理每个程序点上的刻面的形状。这种抽象对于静态证明不存在运行时错误和消除与方面相关的运行时检查非常有用。然而，对分面值的内容进行静态推理由于一级安全标签的存在而变得复杂，特别是因为抽象标签可能会合并多个运行时标签。为了解决这些问题，我们还开发了一个更精确的抽象，它依赖于跟踪单例堆抽象的分析。我们在球拍中展示了我们的粗糙抽象的实现，并在几个示例程序中演示了它的性能。最后，我们展示了如何使用我们的精确域来验证信息流属性。
papers.title_zh: 抽象分面执行

papers.title: Nontransitive Security Types for Coarse-grained Information Flow Control
papers.authors: Yi Lu, Chenyi Zhang
papers.abstract: Language-based information flow control (IFC) aims to provide guarantees about information propagation in computer systems having multiple security levels. Existing IFC systems extend the lattice model of Denning’s, enforcing transitive security policies by tracking information flows along with a partially ordered set of security levels. They yield a transitive noninterference property of either confidentiality or integrity. In this paper, we explore IFC for security policies that are not necessarily transitive. Such nontransitive security policies avoid unwanted or unexpected information flows implied by transitive policies and naturally accommodate high-level coarse-grained security requirements in modern component-based software. We present a novel security type system for enforcing nontransitive security policies. Unlike traditional security type systems that verify information propagation by subtyping security levels of a transitive policy, our type system relaxes strong transitivity by inferring information flow history through security levels and ensuring that they respect the nontransitive policy in effect. Such a type system yields a new nontransitive noninterference property that offers more flexible information flow relations induced by security policies that do not have to be transitive, therefore generalizing the conventional transitive noninterference. This enables us to directly reason about the extent of information flows in the program and restrict interactions between security-sensitive and untrusted components.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于语言的信息流控制(IFC)旨在为具有多种安全级别的计算机系统中的信息传播提供保证。现有的IFC系统扩展了Denning的网格模型，通过跟踪信息流和一组部分有序的安全级别来实施可传递的安全策略。它们产生一种传递性的非干扰性质，即保密性或完整性。在本文中，我们探讨IFC的安全政策，不一定是传递的。这种非传递性安全策略避免了传递性策略所隐含的不需要的或意外的信息流，并且自然地适应了现代基于组件的软件中的高级粗粒度安全需求。我们提出了一种新的安全类型系统，用于实施不可传递的安全策略。不像传统的安全类型系统通过对可传递策略的安全级别进行子类型化来验证信息传播，我们的类型系统通过安全级别推断信息流历史并确保它们遵守有效的非可传递策略来放松强传递性。这种类型系统产生了一种新的非传递性不干扰属性，该属性提供了由不必传递的安全策略引起的更灵活的信息流关系，因此概括了传统的传递性不干扰。这使我们能够直接推断程序中信息流的范围，并限制安全敏感组件和不可信组件之间的交互。
papers.title_zh: 粗粒度信息流控制的非传递性安全类型

papers.title: Securing Asynchronous Exceptions
papers.authors: Carlos Tomé Cortiñas, Marco Vassena, Alejandro Russo
papers.abstract: Language-based information-flow control (IFC) techniques often rely on special purpose, ad-hoc primitives to address different covert channels that originate in the runtime system, beyond the scope of language constructs. Since these piecemeal solutions may not compose securely, there is a need for a unified mechanism to control covert channels. As a first step towards this goal, we argue for the design of a general interface that allows programs to safely interact with the runtime system and the available computing resources. To coordinate the communication between programs and the runtime system, we propose the use of asynchronous exceptions (interrupts), which, to the best of our knowledge, have not been considered before in the context of IFC languages. Since asynchronous exceptions can be raised at any point during execution-often due to the occurrence of an external event-threads must temporarily mask them out when manipulating locks and shared data structures to avoid deadlocks and, therefore, breaking program invariants. Crucially, the naive combination of asynchronous exceptions with existing features of IFC languages (e.g., concurrency and synchronization variables) may open up new possibilities of information leakage. In this paper, we present $\mathrm {M}\mathrm {A}\mathrm {C}_{async}$, a concurrent, statically enforced IFC language that, as a novelty, features asynchronous exceptions. We show how asynchronous exceptions easily enable (out of the box) useful programming patterns like speculative execution and some degree of resource management. We prove that programs in $\mathrm {M}\mathrm {A}\mathrm {C}_{async}$ satisfy progress-sensitive non-interference and mechanize our formal claims in the Agda proof assistant.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于语言的信息流控制(IFC)技术通常依赖于特殊目的的、特别的原语来处理不同的隐蔽通道，这些通道源自运行时系统，超出了语言结构的范围。由于这些零碎的解决方案可能无法安全地组合，因此需要一种统一的机制来控制隐蔽通道。作为实现这一目标的第一步，我们主张设计一个通用接口，允许程序安全地与运行时系统和可用的计算资源进行交互。为了协调程序和运行时系统之间的通信，我们建议使用异步异常(中断)，据我们所知，这在IFC语言的上下文中还没有考虑过。由于异步异常可以在执行过程中的任何时候引发——通常是由于外部事件的发生——线程在操作锁和共享数据结构时必须临时屏蔽它们，以避免死锁，从而破坏程序不变量。至关重要的是，异步异常与IFC语言的现有特性(例如，并发性和同步变量)的简单结合可能会带来新的信息泄漏的可能性。在本文中，我们介绍了$ \ mathrm { M } \ mathrm { A } \ mathrm { C } _ { async } $，这是一种并发的、静态执行的IFC语言，作为一种新颖的语言，它具有异步异常的特性。我们展示了异步异常如何轻松地启用(开箱即用)有用的编程模式，如推测性执行和某种程度的资源管理。我们证明＄\ mathrm { M } \ mathrm { A } \ mathrm { C } _ { async } $中的程序满足对进度敏感的无干扰，并在Agda proof assistant中机械化我们的正式声明。
papers.title_zh: 保护异步异常

papers.title: PASAPTO: Policy-aware Security and Performance Trade-off Analysis-Computation on Encrypted Data with Restricted Leakage
papers.authors: Andreas Fischer, Jonas Janneck, Jörn Kussmaul, Nikolas Krätzschmar, Florian Kerschbaum, Eric Bodden
papers.abstract: This work considers the trade-off between security and performance when revealing partial information about encrypted data computed on. The focus of our work is on information revealed through control flow side-channels when executing programs on encrypted data. We use quantitative information flow to measure security, running time to measure performance and program transformation techniques to alter the trade-off between the two. Combined with information flow policies, we perform a policy-aware security and performance trade-off (PASAPTO) analysis. We formalize the problem of PASAPTO analysis as an optimization problem, prove the NPhardness of the corresponding decision problem and present two algorithms solving it heuristically.We implemented our algorithms and combined them with the Dataflow Authentication (DFAuth) approach for outsourcing sensitive computations. Our DFAuth Trade-off Analyzer (DFATA) takes Java Bytecode operating on plaintext data and an associated information flow policy as input. It outputs semantically equivalent program variants operating on encrypted data which are policy-compliant and approximately Pareto-optimal with respect to leakage and performance. We evaluated DFATA in a commercial cloud environment using Java programs, e.g., a decision tree program performing machine learning on medical data. The decision tree variant with the worst performance is 357% slower than the fastest variant. Leakage varies between 0% and 17% of the input.
papers.abstract_zh: 这项工作考虑了在揭示有关计算的加密数据的部分信息时安全性和性能之间的权衡。我们工作的重点是在加密数据上执行程序时，通过控制流旁道透露的信息。我们使用量化的信息流来衡量安全性，运行时间来衡量性能，程序转换技术来改变两者之间的平衡。结合信息流策略，我们执行策略感知安全性和性能权衡(PASAPTO)分析。我们将PASAPTO分析问题形式化为一个优化问题，证明了相应决策问题的NP难性，并给出了两个启发式求解算法。我们实现了我们的算法，并将其与数据流认证(DFAuth)方法相结合，用于外包敏感计算。我们的DFAuth权衡分析器(DFATA)将对明文数据进行操作的Java字节码和相关的信息流策略作为输入。它输出对加密数据进行操作的语义等价的程序变体，这些程序变体符合策略并且在泄漏和性能方面近似帕累托最优。我们使用Java程序在商业云环境中评估了DFATA，例如对医疗数据执行机器学习的决策树程序。性能最差的决策树变体比最快的变体慢357%。泄漏在输入的0%和17%之间变化。
papers.title_zh: PASAPTO:策略感知的安全性和性能权衡分析——在限制泄漏的情况下计算加密数据

papers.title: Runtime Enforcement for Control System Security
papers.authors: Ruggero Lanotte, Massimo Merro, Andrei Munteanu
papers.abstract: With the explosion of Industry 4.0, industrial facilities and critical infrastructures are transforming into “smart” systems that dynamically adapt to external events. The result is an ecosystem of heterogeneous physical and cyber components, such as programmable logic controllers, which are more and more exposed to cyber-physical attacks, i.e., security breaches in cyberspace that adversely affect the physical processes at the core of industrial control systems. We apply runtime enforcement techniques, based on an ad-hoc sub-class of Ligatti et al.’s edit automata, to enforce specification compliance in networks of potentially compromised controllers, formalised in Hennessy and Regan’s Timed Process Language. We define a synthesis algorithm that, given an alphabet $\mathcal{P}$ of observable actions and an enforceable regular expression e capturing a timed property for controllers, returns a monitor that enforces the property e during the execution of any (potentially corrupted) controller with alphabet $\mathcal{P}$ and complying with the property e. Our monitors correct and suppress incorrect actions coming from corrupted controllers and emit actions in full autonomy when the controller under scrutiny is not able to do so in a correct manner. Besides classical properties, such as transparency and soundness, the proposed enforcement ensures non-obvious properties, such as polynomial complexity of the synthesis, deadlock-and diverge-freedom of monitored controllers, together with scalability when dealing with networks of controllers.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着工业4.0的爆发，工业设施和关键基础设施正在转变为动态适应外部事件的“智能”系统。结果是异构物理和网络组件的生态系统，如可编程逻辑控制器，越来越多地暴露于网络物理攻击，即网络空间中的安全漏洞，对工业控制系统核心的物理过程产生不利影响。我们应用运行时强制技术，基于Ligatti等人的编辑自动机的特别子类，以在潜在受损控制器的网络中强制规范符合性，这在Hennessy和Regan的时间过程语言中被正式化。我们定义了一个合成算法，在给定一个可观察动作的alphabet $\mathcal{P}$和一个捕获控制器的定时属性的可执行正则表达式e的情况下，返回一个监视器，该监视器在执行任何具有alphabet $\mathcal{P}$并符合属性e的(潜在损坏的)控制器期间执行属性e。我们的监视器纠正并抑制来自损坏的控制器的不正确动作，并在被审查的控制器无法以正确的方式执行时完全自主地发出动作。除了诸如透明性和可靠性之类的经典属性之外，所提出的实施确保了非显而易见的属性，诸如合成的多项式复杂性、被监控控制器的死锁和发散自由，以及在处理控制器网络时的可扩展性。
papers.title_zh: 控制系统安全性的运行时实施

papers.title: Provably Secure Isolation for Interruptible Enclaved Execution on Small Microprocessors
papers.authors: Matteo Busi, Job Noorman, Jo Van Bulck, Letterio Galletta, Pierpaolo Degano, Jan Tobias Mühlberg, Frank Piessens
papers.abstract: Computer systems often provide hardware support for isolation mechanisms like privilege levels, virtual memory, or enclaved execution. Over the past years, several successful software-based side-channel attacks have been developed that break, or at least significantly weaken the isolation that these mechanisms offer. Extending a processor with new architectural or micro-architectural features, brings a risk of introducing new such side-channel attacks. This paper studies the problem of extending a processor with new features without weakening the security of the isolation mechanisms that the processor offers. We propose to use full abstraction as a formal criterion for the security of a processor extension, and we instantiate that criterion to the concrete case of extending a microprocessor that supports enclaved execution with secure interruptibility of these enclaves. This is a very relevant instantiation as several recent papers have shown that interruptibility of enclaves leads to a variety of software-based side-channel attacks. We propose a design for interruptible enclaves, and prove that it satisfies our security criterion. We also implement the design on an open-source enclave-enabled microprocessor, and evaluate the cost of our design in terms of performance and hardware size.
papers.abstract_zh: 计算机系统通常为隔离机制提供硬件支持，如特权级别、虚拟内存或包围执行。在过去的几年中，已经开发了几个成功的基于软件的旁道攻击，打破了或者至少显著地削弱了这些机制所提供的隔离。用新的架构或微架构特性来扩展处理器，会带来引入新的此类侧信道攻击的风险。本文研究在不削弱处理器提供的隔离机制的安全性的情况下，用新特性扩展处理器的问题。我们建议使用完全抽象作为处理器扩展安全性的正式标准，并且我们将该标准实例化为扩展微处理器的具体情况，该微处理器支持具有这些飞地的安全可中断性的飞地执行。这是一个非常相关的实例，因为最近的几篇论文已经表明，enclaves的可中断性会导致各种基于软件的旁路攻击。我们提出了一个可中断飞地的设计，并证明它满足我们的安全标准。我们还在支持enclave的开源微处理器上实现了该设计，并从性能和硬件尺寸方面评估了我们设计的成本。
papers.title_zh: 小型微处理器上可中断包围执行的可证明安全隔离

papers.title: Limiting the impact of unreliable randomness in deployed security protocols
papers.authors: Liliya R. Akhmetzyanova, Cas Cremers, Luke Garratt, Stanislav Smyshlyaev, Nick Sullivan
papers.abstract: Many cryptographic mechanisms depend upon the availability of securely generated random numbers. In practice, the sources of random numbers can be unreliable for many reasons, including bugs, compromise or subversion of standards. While there exist ways to significantly reduce the impact of unreliable randomness, these typically do not work well with practical constraints, such as long-term keys stored in hardware security modules. In practice, even modern protocols like TLS 1.3 lack such mechanisms and are therefore highly vulnerable to unreliable randomness.We propose a wrapper construction that reduces the impact of untrusted randomness, and which is is compatible with, and effective in, existing deployments of protocols such as TLS. We provide a security analysis of the construction and elaborate on design choices and practical interpretations. Our findings show that it is possible to effectively harden deployed protocols against unreliable randomness.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多加密机制依赖于安全生成的随机数的可用性。在实践中，随机数的来源可能因为许多原因而不可靠，包括错误、妥协或对标准的颠覆。虽然存在显著降低不可靠随机性影响的方法，但是这些方法通常不能很好地处理实际约束，例如存储在硬件安全模块中的长期密钥。实际上，即使像TLS 1.3这样的现代协议也缺乏这样的机制，因此非常容易受到不可靠随机性的影响。我们提出了一种包装器结构，它减少了不可信随机性的影响，并且与TLS等协议的现有部署兼容，并且在其中是有效的。我们提供了建筑的安全分析，并阐述了设计选择和实际的解释。我们的发现表明，针对不可靠的随机性，有效地强化已部署的协议是可能的。
papers.title_zh: 限制部署的安全协议中不可靠随机性的影响

papers.title: Authentication in Key-Exchange: Definitions, Relations and Composition
papers.authors: Cyprien Delpech de Saint Guilhem, Marc Fischlin, Bogdan Warinschi
papers.abstract: We present a systematic approach to define and study authentication notions in authenticated key-exchange protocols. We propose and use a flexible and expressive predicate-based definitional framework. Our definitions capture key and entity authentication, in both implicit and explicit variants, as well as key and entity confirmation, for authenticated key-exchange protocols. In particular, we capture critical notions in the authentication space such as key-compromise impersonation resistance and security against unknown key-share attacks. We first discuss these definitions within the Bellare-Rogaway model and then extend them to Canetti-Krawczyk-style models. We then show two useful applications of our framework. First, we look at the authentication guarantees of three representative protocols to draw several useful lessons for protocol design. The core technical contribution of this paper is then to formally establish that composition of secure implicitly authenticated key-exchange with subsequent confirmation protocols yields explicit authentication guarantees. Without a formal separation of implicit and explicit authentication from secrecy, a proof of this folklore result could not have been established.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一个系统的方法来定义和研究认证密钥交换协议中的认证概念。我们提出并使用了一个灵活而富有表现力的基于谓词的定义框架。我们的定义包括隐式和显式的密钥和实体认证，以及认证密钥交换协议的密钥和实体确认。特别是，我们捕获了身份验证领域中的关键概念，如密钥泄露模拟抵抗性和针对未知密钥共享攻击的安全性。我们首先在贝拉雷-罗加韦模型中讨论这些定义，然后将它们扩展到卡内蒂-科劳兹克式的模型。然后我们展示了我们的框架的两个有用的应用。首先，我们来看看三个典型协议的认证保证，以便为协议设计提供一些有用的经验。本文的核心技术贡献是正式确定安全隐式认证密钥交换与后续确认协议的组合产生显式认证保证。如果不把隐含的和明确的认证从保密中正式分离出来，这种民间传说结果的证据就不可能成立。
papers.title_zh: 密钥交换中的认证:定义、关系和组成

papers.title: Automated Analysis of PUF-based Protocols
papers.authors: Riccardo Focardi, Flaminia L. Luccio
papers.abstract: Physical Unclonable Functions (PUFs) are a promising technology to secure low-cost devices. A PUF is a function whose values depend on the physical characteristics of the underlying hardware: the same PUF implemented on two identical integrated circuits will return different values. Thus, a PUF can be used as a unique fingerprint identifying one specific physical device among (apparently) identical copies that run the same firmware on the same hardware. PUFs, however, are tricky to implement, and a number of attacks have been reported in the literature, often due to wrong assumptions about the provided security guarantees and/or the attacker model. In this paper, we present the first mechanized symbolic model for PUFs that allows for precisely reasoning about their security with respect to a variegate set of attackers. We consider mutual authentication protocols based on different kinds of PUFs and model attackers that are able to access PUF values stored on servers, abuse the PUF APIs, model the PUF behavior and exploit error correction data to reproduce the PUF values. We prove security properties and we formally specify the capabilities required by the attacker to break them. Our analysis points out various subtleties, and allows for a systematic comparison between different PUF-based protocols. The mechanized models are easily extensible and can be automatically checked with the Tamarin prover.
papers.abstract_zh: 物理不可克隆功能(puf)是保证低成本设备的一种有前途的技术。PUF是一个函数，其值取决于底层硬件的物理特性:在两个相同的集成电路上实现的相同的PUF将返回不同的值。因此，PUF可以被用作唯一的指纹，在运行相同硬件上的相同固件的(表面上)相同的副本中识别一个特定的物理设备。然而，puf很难实现，文献中已经报道了许多攻击，通常是由于对所提供的安全保证和/或攻击者模型的错误假设。在本文中，我们提出了第一个puf的机械化符号模型，该模型允许精确地推理它们相对于各种攻击者的安全性。我们考虑基于不同类型PUF的相互认证协议，并模拟攻击者，攻击者能够访问存储在服务器上的PUF值，滥用PUFs and，模拟PUF行为，并利用纠错数据来复制PUF值。我们证明安全属性，并正式指定攻击者破坏它们所需的能力。我们的分析指出了各种微妙之处，并允许对不同的基于PUF的协议进行系统的比较。机械化模型很容易扩展，并且可以用Tamarin prover自动检查。
papers.title_zh: 基于PUF协议的自动化分析

papers.title: Anonymous Lottery In The Proof-of-Stake Setting
papers.authors: Foteini Baldimtsi, Varun Madathil, Alessandra Scafuro, Linfeng Zhou
papers.abstract: When Proof-of-Stake (PoS) underlies a consensus protocol, parties who are eligible to participate in the protocol are selected via a public selection function that depends on the stake they own. Identity and stake of the selected parties must then be disclosed in order to allow verification of their eligibility, and this can raise privacy concerns. In this paper, we present a modular approach for addressing the identity leaks of selection functions, decoupling the problem of implementing an anonymous selection of the participants, from the problem of implementing others task, e.g. consensus. We present an ideal functionality for anonymous selection that can be more easily composed with other protocols. We then show an instantiation of our anonymous selection functionality based on the selection function of Algorand.
papers.abstract_zh: 当利益证明(PoS)是共识协议的基础时，有资格参与协议的各方通过公共选择功能进行选择，该功能取决于他们拥有的利益。然后，必须披露所选各方的身份和股份，以便核实他们的资格，这可能会引起隐私问题。在本文中，我们提出了一种解决选择函数身份泄漏的模块化方法，将实现参与者匿名选择的问题与实现其他任务(如共识)的问题分离开来。我们提出了一个理想的匿名选择功能，可以更容易地与其他协议组合。然后，我们展示了一个基于Algorand选择函数的匿名选择功能的实例。
papers.title_zh: 利害关系证明中的匿名彩票

papers.title: A Composable Security Treatment of the Lightning Network
papers.authors: Aggelos Kiayias, Orfeas Stefanos Thyfronitis Litos
papers.abstract: The high latency and low throughput of blockchain protocols constitute one of the fundamental barriers for their wider adoption. Overlay protocols, notably the lightning network, have been touted as the most viable direction for rectifying this in practice. In this work we present for the first time a full formalisation and security analysis of the lightning network in the (global) universal composition setting that leverages a global ledger functionality, for which realisability by the Bitcoin blockchain protocol has been demonstrated in previous work [Badertscher et al., Crypto’17]. As a result, our treatment delineates exactly how the security guarantees of the protocol depend on the properties of the underlying ledger and the frequent availability of the protocol participants. Moreover, we provide a complete and modular description of the core of the lightning protocol that highlights precisely its dependency to underlying basic cryptographic primitives such as igital signatures, pseudorandom functions, identity-based signatures and a less common two-party primitive, which we term a combined digital signature, that were originally hidden within the lightning protocol’s implementation.
papers.abstract_zh: 区块链协议的高延迟和低吞吐量构成了它们被广泛采用的基本障碍之一。覆盖协议，特别是lightning网络，被吹捧为在实践中纠正这种情况的最可行的方向。在这项工作中，我们首次提出了在利用全球分类账功能的(全球)通用组合设置中闪电网络的完整形式化和安全性分析，比特币区块链协议的可实现性已在之前的工作中得到证明[Badertscher等人，Crypto'17]。因此，我们的处理准确地描述了协议的安全保证如何依赖于底层分类帐的属性和协议参与者的频繁可用性。此外，我们提供了lightning协议核心的完整和模块化描述，该描述精确地强调了它对底层基本密码原语的依赖性，如数字签名、伪随机函数、基于身份的签名和一个不太常见的双方原语，我们称之为组合数字签名，这些原语最初隐藏在lightning协议的实现中。
papers.title_zh: 雷电网络的复合安全处理

papers.title: Clockwork: Tracking Remote Timing Attacks
papers.authors: Iulia Bastys, Musard Balliu, Tamara Rezk, Andrei Sabelfeld
papers.abstract: Timing leaks have been a major concern for the security community. A common approach is to prevent secrets from affecting the execution time, thus achieving security with respect to a strong, local attacker who can measure the timing of program runs. However, this approach becomes restrictive as soon as programs branch on a secret. This paper focuses on timing leaks under remote execution. A key difference is that the remote attacker does not have a reference point of when a program run has started or finished, which significantly restricts attacker capabilities. We propose an extensional security characterization that captures the essence of remote timing attacks. We identify patterns of combining clock access, secret branching, and output in a way that leads to timing leaks. Based on these patterns, we design Clockwork, a monitor that rules out remote timing leaks. We implement the approach for JavaScript, leveraging JSFlow, a state-of-the-art information flow tracker. We demonstrate the feasibility of the approach on case studies with IFTTT, a popular IoT app platform, and VJSC, an advanced JavaScript library for e-voting.
papers.abstract_zh: 时间泄露一直是安全社区关注的主要问题。一种常见的方法是防止秘密影响执行时间，从而针对能够测量程序运行时间的强大本地攻击者实现安全性。然而，一旦程序分支到一个秘密上，这种方法就变得有限制了。本文主要关注远程执行下的计时泄漏。一个关键的区别是，远程攻击者没有程序运行开始或结束的参考点，这极大地限制了攻击者的能力。我们提出了一个外延安全特征，它抓住了远程定时攻击的本质。我们确定了组合时钟访问、秘密分支和输出的模式，这种模式会导致定时泄漏。基于这些模式，我们设计了时钟装置，一个排除远程计时泄漏的监视器。我们利用JSFlow实现了JavaScript的方法，js flow是最先进的信息流跟踪器。我们通过一个流行的物联网应用平台IFTTT和一个用于电子投票的高级JavaScript库VJSC的案例研究证明了该方法的可行性。
papers.title_zh: 发条:追踪远程定时攻击

papers.title: Controller Synthesis for Hyperproperties
papers.authors: Borzoo Bonakdarpour, Bernd Finkbeiner
papers.abstract: We investigate the problem of controller synthesis for hyperproperties specified in the temporal logic HyperLTL. Hyperproperties are system properties that relate multiple execution traces. Hyperproperties can elegantly express information-flow policies like noninterference and observational determinism. The controller synthesis problem is to automatically design a controller for a plant that ensures satisfaction of a given specification in the presence of the environment or adversarial actions. We show that the controller synthesis problem is decidable for HyperLTL specifications and finite-state plants. We provide a rigorous complexity analysis for different fragments of HyperLTL and different system types: tree-shaped, acyclic, and general graphs.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们研究了时序逻辑超LTL中指定的超属性的控制器综合问题。超属性是关联多个执行跟踪的系统属性。超属性可以优雅地表达信息流策略，如不干涉和观察决定论。控制器综合问题是为一个设备自动设计一个控制器，保证在环境或敌对行为存在的情况下满足给定的规范。我们证明了控制器综合问题对于超LTL规范和有限状态设备是可判定的。我们为HyperLTL的不同片段和不同的系统类型提供了严格的复杂性分析:树形图、非循环图和普通图。
papers.title_zh: 超特性的控制器综合

papers.title: Rely/Guarantee Reasoning for Noninterference in Non-Blocking Algorithms
papers.authors: Nicholas Coughlin, Graeme Smith
papers.abstract: Noninterference characterizes a security property in which an attacker cannot determine the inputs to a system based on outputs of a lower classification. Value-dependent noninterference enables the analysis of systems in which these classifications may depend on the system’s state and evolve throughout execution. Existing approaches to enforcing such a property for concurrent systems are constrained in their capability to express how the concurrent components modify shared variables and, therefore, the value-dependent classifications. Such approaches typically make use of externally verified annotations or coarse locking primitives to express limited constraints on variables, such as read and write permissions. Consequently, these techniques are insufficient for the analysis of programs that feature complex concurrent behaviours or require fine-grained synchronisation, as seen in non-blocking algorithms.This paper presents a compositional logic for enforcing value-dependent noninterference properties for complex concurrent algorithms, including non-blocking algorithms. It uses rely/guarantee reasoning to establish how classifications may be modified by concurrent components. Additionally, the logic allows for the specification of security policies at a component level and ensures their valid composition. These results have been formalised in Isabelle/HOL.
papers.abstract_zh: 无干扰是一种安全特性，攻击者无法根据较低分类的输出来确定系统的输入。依赖于值的不干涉允许对系统进行分析，其中这些分类可能依赖于系统的状态，并在整个执行过程中演化。为并发系统实施这种属性的现有方法在表达并发组件如何修改共享变量以及因此的值相关分类的能力方面受到限制。这种方法通常利用外部验证的注释或粗锁定原语来表达对变量的有限约束，如读写权限。因此，这些技术不足以分析具有复杂并发行为或需要细粒度同步的程序，如非阻塞算法。本文提出了一种复合逻辑，用于对复杂并发算法(包括非阻塞算法)实施依赖于值的不干扰特性。它使用依赖/保证推理来建立并发组件如何修改分类。此外，该逻辑允许在组件级别指定安全策略，并确保它们的有效组合。这些结果已经在伊莎贝尔/HOL得到正式认可。
papers.title_zh: 非阻塞算法中不干扰的可靠/保证推理

papers.title: Exploiting attack-defense trees to find an optimal set of countermeasures
papers.authors: Barbara Fila, Wojciech Widel
papers.abstract: Selecting the most pertinent countermeasures to secure a system is one of the ultimate goals of risk assessment. In this context, it is important to rely on modeling methods that the security experts are already familiar with, so that the solution can be smoothly adopted within industry.We propose a full-fledged framework, relying on attack–defense trees and integer linear programming, to find an optimal set of countermeasures. We use attack–defense trees formalized with directed acyclic graphs. This enables us to conveniently reason about attacker’s actions that can contribute to several distinct attacks, and countermeasures that can block different ways of attacking. We provide a constructive way of extracting all reasonable behaviors of the two actors from such models. We then exploit this extracted information to formulate a generic solution, based on integer linear programing, to address a wide class of optimization problems. We show how to instantiate it for specific security-relevant optimization criteria. We cover deterministic and probabilistic cases. The framework has been implemented in a prototype tool, and validated in a real-life case study.
papers.abstract_zh: 选择最恰当的对策来保护系统是风险评估的最终目标之一。在这种情况下，依靠安全专家已经熟悉的建模方法是很重要的，这样解决方案才能在行业内顺利采用。我们提出了一个完整的框架，依靠攻击-防御树和整数线性规划，找到一个最佳的对策集。我们使用用有向无环图形式化的攻防树。这使我们能够方便地推断攻击者的行动可能导致几种不同的攻击，以及可以阻止不同攻击方式的对策。我们提供了一种从这种模型中提取两个参与者的所有合理行为的建设性方法。然后，基于整数线性规划，我们利用这些提取的信息来制定一个通用的解决方案，以解决各种各样的优化问题。我们展示了如何针对特定的安全相关优化标准实例化它。我们涵盖确定性和概率性的情况。该框架已在原型工具中实现，并在实际案例研究中得到验证。
papers.title_zh: 利用攻击-防御树找到一组最佳对策

papers.title: Provably Robust Decisions based on Potentially Malicious Sources of Information
papers.authors: Tim Muller, Dongxia Wang, Jun Sun
papers.abstract: Sometimes a security-critical decision must be made using information provided by peers. Think of routing messages, user reports, sensor data, navigational information, blockchain updates. Attackers manifest as peers that strategically report fake information. Trust models use the provided information, and attempt to suggest the correct decision. A model that appears accurate by empirical evaluation of attacks may still be susceptible to manipulation. For a security-critical decision, it is important to take the entire attack space into account. Therefore, we define the property of robustness: the probability of deciding correctly, regardless of what information attackers provide. We introduce the notion of realisations of honesty, which allow us to bypass reasoning about specific feedback. We present two schemes that are optimally robust under the right assumptions. The “majority-rule” principle is a special case of the other scheme which is more general, named “most plausible realisations”.
papers.abstract_zh: 有时，必须使用对等方提供的信息做出安全关键决策。想想路由信息、用户报告、传感器数据、导航信息、区块链更新。攻击者表现为有策略地报告虚假信息的对等方。信任模型使用提供的信息，并试图建议正确的决策。通过攻击的经验评估看起来准确的模型仍然可能容易被操纵。对于一个安全关键的决策，将整个攻击空间考虑在内是很重要的。因此，我们定义了健壮性的属性:正确决策的概率，而不管攻击者提供什么信息。我们引入了诚实实现的概念，它允许我们绕过对特定反馈的推理。我们提出了两个方案，在正确的假设下是最优鲁棒的。“多数决”原则是另一种更一般的方案的特例，即“最合理的实现”。
papers.title_zh: 基于潜在恶意信息源的可靠决策

papers.title: Conditional Observational Equivalence and Off-line Guessing Attacks in Multiset Rewriting
papers.authors: Petar Paradzik, Ante Derek
papers.abstract: We propose conditional observational equivalence — a variant of observational equivalence that is more flexible since it can be made dependent on arbitrary safety trace properties. We extend an existing method for verifying observational equivalence in the multiset rewriting setting with the ability to handle conditions. Our extension can automatically verify conditional observational equivalence for a simple class of conditions that depend only on the structure of the execution. By using conditional observational equivalence, we give the first method for verifying off-line guessing resistance in the multiset rewriting setting and apply it to analyze and verify the properties of EAP-EKE, a password-authenticated key exchange (PAKE) protocol.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了条件观测等价——一种更灵活的观测等价的变体，因为它可以依赖于任意的安全轨迹属性。我们用处理条件的能力扩展了现有的在多重集重写设置中验证观察等价的方法。我们的扩展可以自动验证只依赖于执行结构的简单条件类的条件观测等价性。通过使用条件观测等价，我们给出了第一种在多重集重写环境下验证抗离线猜测的方法，并应用它分析和验证了EAP-EKE协议的性质。
papers.title_zh: 多重集重写中的条件观察等价和离线猜测攻击

papers.title: Is Eve nearby? Analysing protocols under the distant-attacker assumption
papers.authors: Reynaldo Gil Pons, Ross Horne, Sjouke Mauw, Alwen Tiu, Rolando Trujillo-Rasua
papers.abstract: Various modern protocols tailored to emerging wire-less networks, such as body area networks, rely on the proximity and honesty of devices within the network to achieve their security goals. However, there does not exist a security framework that supports the formal analysis of such protocols, leaving the door open to unexpected flaws. In this article we introduce such a security framework, show how it can be implemented in the protocol verification tool Tamarin, and use it to find previously unknown vulnerabilities on two recent key exchange protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 为新兴的无线网络(如体域网)定制的各种现代协议依赖于网络内设备的接近度和可靠性来实现其安全目标。然而，不存在支持这种协议的形式分析的安全框架，这为意外的缺陷敞开了大门。在本文中，我们将介绍这样一个安全框架，展示如何在协议验证工具Tamarin中实现它，并使用它来发现最近两个密钥交换协议中以前未知的漏洞。
papers.title_zh: 伊芙在附近吗？远程攻击者假设下的协议分析

papers.title: A small bound on the number of sessions for security protocols
papers.authors: Véronique Cortier, Antoine Dallon, Stéphanie Delaune
papers.abstract: Bounding the number of sessions is a long-standing problem in the context of security protocols. It is well known that even simple properties like secrecy are undecidable when an unbounded number of sessions is considered. Yet, attacks on existing protocols only require a few sessions. In this paper, we propose a sound algorithm that computes a sufficient set of scenarios that need to be considered to detect an attack. Our approach can be applied for both reachability and equivalence properties, for protocols with standard primitives that are type-compliant (unifiable messages have the same type). Moreover, when equivalence properties are considered, else branches are disallowed, and protocols are supposed to be simple (an attacker knows from which role and session a message comes from). Since this class remains undecidable, our algorithm may return an infinite set. However, our experiments show that on most basic protocols of the literature, our algorithm computes a small number of sessions (a dozen). As a consequence, tools for a bounded number of sessions like DeepSec can then be used to conclude that a protocol is secure for an unbounded number of sessions.
papers.abstract_zh: 限制会话数量是安全协议中一个长期存在的问题。众所周知，当考虑无限数量的会话时，即使像保密这样简单的属性也是不可判定的。然而，对现有协议的攻击只需要几个会话。在本文中，我们提出了一种可靠的算法，它可以计算出检测攻击时需要考虑的足够多的场景。我们的方法可以应用于可达性和等价属性，用于具有类型兼容的标准原语的协议(可统一的消息具有相同的类型)。此外，当考虑等价属性时，else分支是不允许的，并且协议应该是简单的(攻击者知道消息来自哪个角色和会话)。因为这个类仍然是不可判定的，我们的算法可能返回一个无限集合。然而，我们的实验表明，在文献的大多数基本协议上，我们的算法计算少量的会话(十几个)。因此，像DeepSec这样的用于有限数量的会话的工具就可以用来推断一个协议对于无限数量的会话是安全的。
papers.title_zh: 安全协议会话数的一个小界限

papers.title: A Formal Model of Checked C
papers.authors: Liyi Li, Yiyun Liu, Deena L. Postol, Leonidas Lampropoulos, David Van Horn, Michael Hicks
papers.abstract: We present a formal model of Checked C, a dialect of C that aims to enforce spatial memory safety. Our model pays particular attention to the semantics of dynamically sized, potentially null-terminated arrays. We formalize this model in Coq, and prove that any spatial memory safety errors can be blamed on portions of the program labeled unchecked; this is a Checked C feature that supports incremental porting and backward compatibility. While our model's operational semantics uses annotated (“fat”) pointers to enforce spatial safety, we show that such annotations can be safely erased. Using PLT Redex we formalize an executable version of our model and a compilation procedure to an untyped C-like language, as well as use randomized testing to validate that generated code faithfully simulates the original. Finally, we develop a custom random generator for well-typed and almost-well-typed terms in our Redex model, and use it to search for inconsistencies between our model and the Clang Checked C implementation. We find these steps to be a useful way to co-develop a language (Checked C is still in development) and a core model of it.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一个Checked C的形式化模型，它是C语言的一种方言，旨在加强空间存储的安全性。我们的模型特别关注动态大小的、可能以null结尾的数组的语义。我们在Coq中形式化了这个模型，并证明任何空间存储安全错误都可以归咎于程序中标记为未检查的部分；这是一个经过检查的C特性，支持增量移植和向后兼容。虽然我们的模型的操作语义使用带注释的(“fat”)指针来加强空间安全，但我们表明这样的注释可以被安全地删除。使用PLT Redex，我们将模型的可执行版本和编译过程形式化为非类型化的类C语言，并使用随机测试来验证生成的代码忠实地模拟了原始代码。最后，我们为Redex模型中的良好类型和几乎良好类型的术语开发了一个定制的随机生成器，并使用它来搜索我们的模型和Clang Checked C实现之间的不一致。我们发现这些步骤是共同开发语言(Checked C仍在开发中)及其核心模型的有用方法。
papers.title_zh: 检查C语言的一种形式模型

papers.title: SecurePtrs: Proving Secure Compilation with Data-Flow Back-Translation and Turn-Taking Simulation
papers.authors: Akram El-Korashy, Roberto Blanco, Jérémy Thibault, Adrien Durier, Deepak Garg, Catalin Hritcu
papers.abstract: Proving secure compilation of partial programs typically requires back-translating an attack against the compiled program to an attack against the source program. To prove back-translation, one can syntactically translate the target attacker to a source one-i.e., syntax-directed back-translation-or show that the interaction traces of the target attacker can also be emitted by source attackers—i.e., trace-directed back-translation. Syntax-directed back-translation is not suitable when the target attacker may use unstructured control flow that the source language cannot directly represent. Trace-directed back-translation works with such syntactic dissimilarity because only the external interactions of the target attacker have to be mimicked in the source, not its internal control flow. Revealing only external interactions is, however, inconvenient when sharing memory via unforgeable pointers, since information about shared pointers stashed in private memory is not present on the trace. This made prior proofs unnecessarily complex, since the generated attacker had to instead stash all reachable pointers. In this work, we introduce more informative data-flow traces, combining the best of syntax- and trace-directed back-translation in a simpler technique that handles both syntactic dissimilarity and memory sharing well, and that is proved correct in Coq. Additionally, we develop a novel turn-taking simulation relation and use it to prove a recomposition lemma, which is key to reusing compiler correctness in such secure compilation proofs. We are the first to mechanize such a recomposition lemma in the presence of memory sharing. We use these two innovations in a secure compilation proof for a code generation compiler pass between a source language with structured control flow and a target language with unstructured control flow, both with safe pointers and components.
papers.abstract_zh: 证明部分程序的安全编译通常需要将针对已编译程序的攻击反向转换为针对源程序的攻击。为了证明回译，可以从语法上把目标攻击者翻译成源攻击者，即语法导向的回译，或者表明目标攻击者的交互痕迹也可以由源攻击者发出，即痕迹导向的回译。当目标攻击者可能使用源语言无法直接表示的非结构化控制流时，语法导向的反向翻译并不合适。跟踪导向的反向翻译在这种语法差异下工作，因为只有目标攻击者的外部交互需要在源中模拟，而不是其内部控制流。然而，当通过不可伪造的指针共享内存时，只显示外部交互是不方便的，因为关于隐藏在私有内存中的共享指针的信息不会出现在踪迹上。这使得先前的证明变得不必要的复杂，因为生成的攻击者必须隐藏所有可到达的指针。在这篇文章中，我们引入了更丰富的数据流跟踪，在一个更简单的技术中结合了语法和跟踪导向的反向翻译的优点，该技术很好地处理了语法差异和内存共享，并且在Coq中被证明是正确的。此外，我们开发了一种新的话轮转换模拟关系，并用它来证明一个重组引理，这是在这种安全编译证明中重用编译器正确性的关键。我们第一次在内存共享的情况下将这样的重组引理机械化。我们将这两项创新用于代码生成编译器的安全编译验证，在具有结构化控制流的源语言和具有非结构化控制流的目标语言之间传递，两者都具有安全指针和组件。
papers.title_zh: SecurePtrs:用数据流回译和话轮转换模拟证明安全编译

papers.title: Proving full-system security properties under multiple attacker models on capability machines
papers.authors: Thomas Van Strydonck, Aïna Linn Georges, Armaël Guéneau, Alix Trieu, Amin Timany, Frank Piessens, Lars Birkedal, Dominique Devriese
papers.abstract: Assembly-level protection mechanisms (virtual mem-ory, trusted execution environments, virtualization) make it possible to guarantee security properties of a full system in the presence of arbitrary attacker provided code. However, they typically only support a single trust boundary: code is either trusted or untrusted, and protection cannot be nested. Capability machines provide protection mechanisms that are more fine-grained and that do support arbitrary nesting of protection. We show in this paper how this enables the formal verification of full-system security properties under multiple attacker models: differ-ent security objectives of the full system can be verified under a different choice of trust boundary (i.e. under a different attacker model). The verification approach we propose is modular, and is robust: code outside the trust boundary for a given security objective can be arbitrary, unverified attacker-provided code. It is based on the use of universal contracts for untrusted adversarial code: sound, conservative contracts which can be combined with manual verification of trusted components in a compositional program logic. Compositionality of the program logic also allows us to reuse common parts in the analyses for different attacker models. We instantiate the approach concretely by extending an existing capability machine model with support for memory-mapped 1/0 and we obtain full system, machine-verified security properties about external effect traces while limiting the manual verification effort to a small trusted computing base relevant for the specific property under study.
papers.abstract_zh: 汇编级保护机制(虚拟内存、可信执行环境、虚拟化)使得在攻击者提供任意代码的情况下保证整个系统的安全属性成为可能。然而，它们通常只支持单一的信任边界:代码要么是可信的，要么是不可信的，并且保护不能嵌套。能力机器提供了更细粒度的保护机制，并且支持保护的任意嵌套。我们在本文中展示了如何在多攻击者模型下实现全系统安全属性的形式化验证:全系统的不同安全目标可以在不同的信任边界选择下(即，在不同的攻击者模型下)得到验证。我们提出的验证方法是模块化的，并且是健壮的:对于给定的安全目标，信任边界之外的代码可以是攻击者提供的任意的、未经验证的代码。它基于对不可信对抗代码的通用契约的使用:可靠的、保守的契约，它可以与组合程序逻辑中可信组件的手动验证相结合。程序逻辑的组合性也允许我们在不同攻击者模型的分析中重用公共部分。我们通过扩展支持存储器映射1/0的现有能力机器模型来具体实例化该方法，并且我们获得关于外部效应痕迹的完整系统、机器验证的安全属性，同时将手动验证工作限制于与所研究的特定属性相关的小型可信计算基础。
papers.title_zh: 在能力机器上证明多攻击者模型下的全系统安全性

papers.title: Interpreting Epsilon of Differential Privacy in Terms of Advantage in Guessing or Approximating Sensitive Attributes
papers.authors: Alisa Pankova, Peeter Laud
papers.abstract: Differential privacy is a privacy technique with provable guarantees which is typically achieved by introducing noise to statistics before releasing them. The level of privacy is characterized by a certain numeric parameter E > 0, where smaller E means more privacy. However, there is no common agreement on how small E should be, and the actual likelihood of data leakage for the same E may vary for different released statistics and different datasets. In this paper, we show how to relate E to the increase in the probability of attacker's success in guessing something about the private data. The attacker's goal is stated as a Boolean expression over guessing particular categorical and numerical attributes, where numeric attributes can be guessed with some precision. The paper is built upon the definition of d-privacy, which is a gencralization of E-differential privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 差分隐私是一种具有可证明保证的隐私技术，通常通过在发布统计数据之前将噪声引入统计数据来实现。隐私级别由某个数值参数E > 0来表征，其中E越小意味着越隐私。然而，对于E应该有多小并没有一致的意见，对于不同的发布的统计数据和不同的数据集，相同E的数据泄漏的实际可能性可能有所不同。在本文中，我们展示了如何将E与攻击者成功猜测私人数据的可能性的增加联系起来。攻击者的目标被表述为一个布尔表达式，而不是猜测特定的分类和数字属性，其中数字属性可以以一定的精度被猜测。本文建立在d-隐私的定义之上，d-隐私是E-差分隐私的推广。
papers.title_zh: 从猜测或近似敏感属性的优势角度解读差异隐私的ε

papers.title: DPL: A Language for GDPR Enforcement
papers.authors: Farzane Karami, David A. Basin, Einar Broch Johnsen
papers.abstract: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) regulates the handling of personal data, including that personal data may be collected and stored only with the data subject's consent, that data is used only for the explicit purposes for which it is collected, and that is deleted after the purposes are served. We propose a programming language called DPL (Data Protection Language) with constructs for enforcing these central GDPR requirements and provide the language's runtime operational semantics. DPL is designed so that GDPR violations cannot occur: potential violations instead result in runtime errors. Moreover, DPL provides constructs to perform privacy-relevant checks, which enable programmers to avoid these errors. Finally, we formalize DPL in Maude, yielding an environment for program simulation, and verify our claims that DPL programs cannot result in privacy violations.
papers.abstract_zh: 《一般数据保护条例》( GDPR)对个人数据的处理做出了规定，包括只有在数据主体同意的情况下才能收集和存储个人数据，数据仅用于收集数据的明确目的，以及在目的达到后删除数据。我们提出了一种称为DPL(数据保护语言)的编程语言，它具有用于执行这些中央GDPR需求的结构，并提供了该语言的运行时操作语义。DPL的设计使得GDPR违规不会发生:潜在的违规反而会导致运行时错误。此外，DPL提供了执行隐私相关检查的构造，这使得程序员能够避免这些错误。最后，我们在Maude中形式化了DPL，产生了一个程序模拟环境，并验证了我们的说法，即DPL程序不会导致隐私侵犯。
papers.title_zh: DPL:GDPR强制执行的语言

papers.title: Privacy as Reachability
papers.authors: Sébastien Gondron, Sebastian Mödersheim, Luca Viganò
papers.abstract: We show that privacy can be formalized as a reachability problem. We introduce a transaction-process formalism for distributed systems that can exchange cryptographic messages (in a black-box cryptography model). Our formalism includes privacy variables chosen non-deterministically from finite domains (e.g., candidates in a voting protocol), it can work with long-term mutable states (e.g., a hash-key chain) and allows one to specify consciously released information (e.g., number of votes and the result). We discuss examples, e.g., problems of linkability, and the core of the privacy-preserving proximity tracing system DP-3T.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们证明了隐私可以形式化为可达性问题。我们为可以交换加密消息的分布式系统引入了事务处理形式(在黑盒加密模型中)。我们的形式主义包括从有限域中非确定性地选择的隐私变量(例如，投票协议中的候选)，它可以与长期可变状态(例如，散列密钥链)一起工作，并允许人们指定有意识地发布的信息(例如，投票数和结果)。我们讨论例子，例如，可链接性的问题，以及隐私保护邻近追踪系统DP-3T的核心。
papers.title_zh: 隐私作为可达性

papers.title: N-Tube: Formally Verified Secure Bandwidth Reservation in Path-Aware Internet Architectures
papers.authors: Thilo Weghorn, Si Liu, Christoph Sprenger, Adrian Perrig, David A. Basin
papers.abstract: We present N-Tube, a novel, provably secure, inter-domain bandwidth reservation algorithm that runs on a network architecture supporting path-based forwarding. N-Tube reserves global end-to-end bandwidth along network paths in a distributed, neighbor-based, and tube-fair way. It guarantees that benign bandwidth demands are granted available allocations that are immutable, stable, lower-bounded, andfair, even during adversarial demand bursts. We formalize N-Tube and powerful adversaries as a labeled transition system, and inductively prove its safety and security properties. We also apply statistical model checking to validate our proofs and perform an additional quantitative assessment of N-Tube, providing strong guarantees for protection against DDoS attacks. We are not aware of any other complex networked system designs that have been subjected to a comparable analysis of both their qualitative properties (such as correctness and security) and their quantitative properties (such as performance).
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了N-Tube，一种新颖的、可证明安全的域间带宽预留算法，它运行在支持基于路径转发的网络架构上。N-Tube以分布式、基于邻居和管道公平的方式沿网络路径保留全局端到端带宽。它保证良性的带宽需求被授予不可变的、稳定的、下限的和公平的可用分配，即使在敌对的需求爆发期间。我们将N-Tube和强大的对手形式化为一个带标签的转移系统，并归纳证明了它的安全性。我们还应用统计模型检查来验证我们的证明，并对N-Tube进行了额外的定量评估，为防御DDoS攻击提供了强有力的保证。我们不知道有任何其他复杂的网络系统设计已经接受了定性属性(如正确性和安全性)和定量属性(如性能)的比较分析。
papers.title_zh: N-Tube:路径感知互联网架构中形式验证的安全带宽预留

papers.title: Applying consensus and replication securely with FLAQR
papers.authors: Priyanka Mondal, Maximilian Algehed, Owen Arden
papers.abstract: Availability is crucial to the security of distributed systems, but guaranteeing availability is hard, especially when participants in the system may act maliciously. Quorum replication protocols provide both integrity and availability: data and computation is replicated at multiple independent hosts, and a quorum of these hosts must agree on the output of all operations applied to the data. Unfortunately, these protocols have high overhead and can be difficult to calibrate for a specific application's needs. Ideally, developers could use high-level abstractions for consensus and replication to write fault-tolerant code by that is secure by construction. This paper presents Flow-Limited Authorization for Quorum Replication (FLAQR), a core calculus for building distributed applications with heterogeneous quorum replication protocols while enforcing end-to-end information security. Our type system ensures that well-typed FLAQR programs cannot fail (experience an unrecoverable error) in ways that violate their type-level specifications. We present noninterference theorems that characterize FLAQR's confidentiality, integrity, and availability in the presence of consensus, replication, and failures, as well as a liveness theorem for the class of majority quorum protocols under a bounded number of faults.
papers.abstract_zh: 可用性对于分布式系统的安全性至关重要，但是保证可用性是很难的，尤其是当系统中的参与者可能会有恶意行为时。法定复制协议提供了完整性和可用性:数据和计算在多个独立的主机上复制，并且这些主机的法定数量必须就应用于数据的所有操作的输出达成一致。不幸的是，这些协议开销很大，并且很难针对特定应用的需求进行校准。理想情况下，开发人员可以使用高级抽象来达成共识和复制，从而编写容错代码，这种代码在构造上是安全的。本文介绍了用于法定复制的流限制授权(FLAQR)，这是一个核心演算，用于构建具有异构法定复制协议的分布式应用程序，同时实施端到端的信息安全。我们的类型系统确保类型良好的FLAQR程序不会以违反其类型级规范的方式失败(经历不可恢复的错误)。我们提出了不干扰定理，这些定理描述了FLAQR在存在一致性、复制和失败的情况下的机密性、完整性和可用性，以及一类多数法定协议在有限数量的错误下的活性定理。
papers.title_zh: 使用FLAQR安全地应用共识和复制

papers.title: Contingent payments from two-party signing and verification for abelian groups
papers.authors: Sergiu Bursuc, Sjouke Mauw
papers.abstract: The fair exchange problem has faced for a long time the bottleneck of a required trusted third party. The recent development of blockchains introduces a new type of party to this problem, whose trustworthiness relies on a public ledger and distributed computation. The challenge in this setting is to reconcile the minimalistic and public nature of blockchains with elaborate fair exchange requirements, from functionality to privacy. Zero-knowledge contingent payments (ZKCP) are a class of protocols that are promising in this direction, allowing the fair exchange of data for payment. We propose a new ZKCP protocol that, when compared to others, requires less computation from the blockchain and less interaction between parties. The protocol is based on two-party (weak) adaptor signatures, which we show how to instantiate from state of the art multiparty signing protocols. We improve the symbolic definition of ZKCP security and, for automated verification with Tamarin, we propose a general security reduction from the theory of abelian groups to the theory of exclusive or.
papers.abstract_zh: 公平交易问题长期以来一直面临着需要可信第三方的瓶颈。区块链最近的发展为这个问题引入了一种新型的参与方，其可信度依赖于公共账本和分布式计算。这种背景下的挑战是调和区块链的极简主义和公共性质与复杂的公平交易要求，从功能到隐私。零知识或有支付(ZKCP)是一类在这个方向上有前途的协议，允许支付的数据的公平交换。我们提出了一个新的ZKCP协议，与其他协议相比，它需要更少的区块链计算和更少的各方之间的交互。该协议基于双方(弱)适配器签名，我们展示了如何从现有的多方签名协议中实例化。我们改进了ZKCP安全性的符号定义，并且为了用Tamarin进行自动验证，我们提出了从阿贝尔群理论到异或理论的一般安全性约简。
papers.title_zh: 阿贝尔群的双方签名和验证的或有支付

papers.title: Collusion-Preserving Computation without a Mediator
papers.authors: Michele Ciampi, Yun Lu, Vassilis Zikas
papers.abstract: Collusion-free (CF) and collusion-preserving (CP) protocols enrich the standard security offered by multi-party computation (MPC), to tackle settings where subliminal communication is undesirable. However, all existing solutions make arguably unrealistic assumptions on setups, such as physical presence of the parties, access to physical envelopes, or extreme isolation, where the only means of communication is a star-topology network. The above state of affairs remained a limitation of such protocols, which was even reinforced by impossibility results. Thus, for years, it has been unclear if and how the above setup assumptions could be relaxed towards more realistic scenarios. Motivated also by the increasing interest in using hardware tokens for cryptographic applications, in this work we provide the first solution to collusion preserving computation which uses weaker and more common assumptions than the state of the art, i.e., an authenticated broadcast functionality and access to honestly generated trusted hardware tokens. We prove that our protocol is collusion-preserving (in short, CP) secure as long as no parties abort. In the case of an aborting adversary, our protocol still achieves standard (G)UC security with identifiable (and unanimous) abort. Leveraging the above identifiability property, we augment our protocol with a penalization scheme which ensures that it is not profitable to abort, thereby obtaining CP security against incentive-driven attackers. To define (and prove) this latter result, we combine the Rational Protocol Design (RPD) methodology by Garay et al. [FOCS 2013] with the CP framework of Alwen et al. [CRYPTO 2012] to derive a definition of security in the presence of incentive-driven local adversaries which can be of independent interest. Similar to existing CP/CF solutions, our protocol preserves, as a fallback, security against monolithic adversaries, even when the setup (i.e., the hardware tokens) is compromised or corrupted. In addition, our fallback solution achieves identifiable and unanimous abort, which we prove are impossible in previous CP solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: 无共谋(CF)和保持共谋(CP)协议丰富了多方计算(MPC)提供的标准安全性，以解决潜意识通信不理想的情况。然而，所有现有的解决方案都对设置做出了可能不切实际的假设，例如各方的物理存在、对物理包络的访问或极端隔离，其中唯一的通信手段是星形拓扑网络。上述事态仍然是这种协议的一个限制，这种限制甚至因不可能的结果而得到加强。因此，多年来，一直不清楚上述设置假设是否以及如何能够放宽到更现实的场景。也由于对使用硬件令牌进行加密应用的兴趣日益增加，在本工作中，我们提供了第一个共谋保持计算的解决方案，该解决方案使用比现有技术更弱且更常见的假设，即认证的广播功能和对诚实生成的可信硬件令牌的访问。我们证明了只要没有任何一方中止，我们的协议就是共谋保持(简称CP)安全的。在中止对手的情况下，我们的协议仍然实现了标准的(G)UC安全性和可识别的(一致的)中止。利用上述可识别性，我们用一个惩罚方案来增强我们的协议，该方案确保中止是无利可图的，从而获得抵抗激励驱动攻击者的CP安全性。为了定义(并证明)后一个结果，我们将加雷等人[FOCS 2013]的理性协议设计(RPD)方法与爱尔温等人[CRYPTO 2012]的CP框架相结合，推导出激励驱动的本地对手存在时的安全性定义，这些对手可能具有独立的利益。与现有的CP/CF解决方案类似，我们的协议保留了抵御单一对手的安全性，即使在设置(即硬件令牌)受到损害或破坏时也是如此。此外，我们的回退解决方案实现了可识别的一致中止，我们证明这在以前的CP解决方案中是不可能的。
papers.title_zh: 无中介者的共谋保持计算

papers.title: Bringing State-Separating Proofs to EasyCrypt A Security Proof for Cryptobox
papers.authors: François Dupressoir, Konrad Kohbrok, Sabine Oechsner
papers.abstract: Machine-checked cryptography aims to reinforce confidence in the primitives and protocols that underpin all digital security. However, machine-checked proof techniques remain in practice difficult to apply to real-world constructions. A particular challenge is structured reasoning about complex constructions at different levels of abstraction. The State-Separating Proofs (SSP) methodology for guiding cryptographic proofs by Brzuska, Delignat-Lavaud, Fournet, Kohbrok and Kohlweiss (ASIACRYPT'18) is a promising contestant to support such reasoning. In this work, we explore how SSPs can guide EasyCrypt formalisations of proofs for modular constructions. Concretely, we propose a mapping from SSP to EasyCrypt concepts which enables us to enhance cryptographic proofs with SSP insights while maintaining compatibility with existing EasyCrypt proof support. To showcase our insights, we develop a formal security proof for the cryptobox family of public-key authenticated encryption schemes based on non-interactive key exchange and symmetric authenticated encryption. As a side effect, we obtain the first formal security proof for NaCl's instantiation of cryptobox. Finally we discuss changes to the practice of SSP on paper and potential implications for future tool designers.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器检查加密旨在增强对支撑所有数字安全的原语和协议的信心。然而，机器检查的证明技术在实践中仍然难以应用于真实世界的构造。一个特别的挑战是在不同抽象层次上对复杂结构的结构化推理。Brzuska、Delignat-Lavaud、Fournet、Kohbrok和Kohlweiss (ASIACRYPT'18)提出的用于指导密码证明的状态分离证明(SSP)方法是支持这种推理的有前途的竞争者。在这篇文章中，我们探索了SSPs如何指导模结构证明的EasyCrypt形式化。具体地说，我们提出了从SSP到EasyCrypt概念的映射，这使得我们能够在保持与现有EasyCrypt证明支持的兼容性的同时，利用SSP洞察来增强加密证明。为了展示我们的见解，我们开发了一个基于非交互式密钥交换和对称认证加密的公钥认证加密方案cryptobox家族的正式安全证明。作为一个副作用，我们获得了第一个NaCl的加密盒实例化的安全证明。最后，我们讨论了纸上SSP实践的变化以及对未来工具设计者的潜在影响。
papers.title_zh: 将状态分离证明引入EasyCrypt &一种密码箱的安全证明

papers.title: IFCIL: An Information Flow Configuration Language for SELinux
papers.authors: Lorenzo Ceragioli, Letterio Galletta, Pierpaolo Degano, David A. Basin
papers.abstract: Security Enhanced Linux (SELinux) is a security architecture for Linux implementing mandatory access control. It has been used in numerous security-critical contexts ranging from servers to mobile devices. But this is challenging as SELinux security policies are difficult to write, understand, and maintain. Recently, the intermediate language CIL was introduced to foster the development of high-level policy languages and to write structured configurations. However, CIL lacks mechanisms for ensuring that the resulting configurations obey desired information flow policies. To remedy this, we propose IFCIL, a backward compatible extension of CIL for specifying fine-grained information flow requirements for CIL configurations. Using IFCIL, administrators can express, e.g., confidentiality, integrity, and non-interference properties. We also provide a tool to statically verify these requirements.
papers.abstract_zh: Security Enhanced Linux (SELinux)是一个为Linux实现强制访问控制的安全架构。它已被用于从服务器到移动设备的众多安全关键环境中。但是这很有挑战性，因为SELinux安全策略很难编写、理解和维护。最近，引入了中间语言CIL来促进高级策略语言的开发和编写结构化配置。然而，CIL缺乏确保最终配置遵守期望的信息流策略的机制。为了补救这一点，我们提出了IFCIL，它是CIL的向后兼容扩展，用于指定CIL配置的细粒度信息流需求。使用IFCIL，管理员可以表达例如机密性、完整性和不干扰属性。我们还提供了一个工具来静态地验证这些需求。
papers.title_zh: if cil:SELinux的信息流配置语言

papers.title: Towards a General-Purpose Dynamic Information Flow Policy
papers.authors: Peixuan Li, Danfeng Zhang
papers.abstract: Noninterference offers a rigorous end-to-end guarantee for secure propagation of information. However, real-world systems almost always involve security requirements that change during program execution, making noninterference inapplicable. Prior works alleviate the limitation to some extent, but even for a veteran in information flow security, understanding the subtleties in the syntax and semantics of each policy is challenging, largely due to very different policy specification languages, and more fundamentally, semantic requirements of each policy. We take a top-down approach and present a novel information flow policy, called Dynamic Release, which allows information flow restrictions to downgrade and upgrade in arbitrary ways. Dynamic Release is formalized on a novel framework that, for the first time, allows us to compare and contrast various dynamic policies in the literature. We show that Dynamic Release generalizes declassification, erasure, delegation and revocation. Moreover, it is the only dynamic policy that is both applicable and correct on a benchmark of tests with dynamic policy.
papers.abstract_zh: 无干扰为信息的安全传播提供了严格的端到端保证。然而，现实世界的系统几乎总是涉及到在程序执行过程中变化的安全需求，这使得无干扰不适用。先前的工作在一定程度上缓解了这种限制，但是即使对于信息流安全领域的老手来说，理解每个策略的语法和语义中的微妙之处也是具有挑战性的，这很大程度上是由于非常不同的策略规范语言，以及更基本的，每个策略的语义需求。我们采用自顶向下的方法，提出了一种新的信息流策略，称为动态释放，允许信息流限制以任意方式降级和升级。动态发布在一个新颖的框架上被形式化，这第一次允许我们比较和对比文献中的各种动态策略。我们证明了动态发布概括了解密、擦除、委托和撤销。此外，在使用动态策略的基准测试中，它是唯一既适用又正确的动态策略。
papers.title_zh: 走向通用的动态信息流策略

papers.title: Beware of Greeks bearing entanglement? Quantum covert channels, information flow and non-local games
papers.authors: David Mestel
papers.abstract: Can quantum entanglement increase the capacity of (classical) covert channels? To one familiar with Holevo's Theorem it is tempting to think that the answer is obviously no. However, in this work we show: quantum entanglement can in fact increase the capacity of a classical covert channel, in the presence of an active adversary; on the other hand, a zero-capacity channel is not improved by entanglement, so entanglement cannot create ‘purely quantum’ covert channels; the problem of determining the capacity of a given channel in the presence of entanglement is undecidable; but there is an algorithm to bound the entangled capacity of a channel from above, adapted from the semi-definite hierarchy from the theory of non-local games, whose close connection to channel capacity is at the core of all of our results.
