JE only requires developers to add annotations to their programs to enable the execution within the TEE. Drawing on information flow control, we develop a security type system that checks confidentiality and integrity policies against realistic attackers with full control over the code running outside the TEE. We formalize the security type system for the JE core and prove it sound for a semantic characterization of security. We implement JE and the security type system, enable Java programs to run on Intel SGX with strong security guarantees. We evaluate our approach on use cases from the literature, including a battleship game, a secure event processing system, and a popular processing framework for big data, showing that we correctly handle complex cases of partitioning, information flow, declassification, and trust.
papers.abstract_zh: 机密计算是一种很有前途的技术，用于保护在不受信任的主机(例如，云)上使用的代码和数据。许多硬件供应商提供了可信执行环境(tee)的不同实现。TEE是一个硬件保护的执行环境，允许在不受信任的主机上对敏感数据执行机密计算。尽管实现针对低级攻击者的强安全保证的呼吁，两个挑战阻碍了tees的采用。首先，用高级管理语言(例如Java或Scala)开发软件，利用现有的tee是复杂且容易出错的。其次，将应用程序划分为运行在TEE内部和外部的组件可能会破坏应用程序级的安全策略，导致应用程序在面对真实的攻击者时不安全。在这项工作中，我们研究了这两个挑战。我们提出了JE，一个无缝集成TEE的编程模型，抽象出低级编程细节，如初始化和加载数据到TEE。JE只要求开发人员向他们的程序添加注释，以使程序能够在TEE中执行。利用信息流控制，我们开发了一个安全类型的系统，它检查机密性和完整性策略，防止真实的攻击者完全控制运行在TEE之外的代码。我们形式化了JE核心的安全类型系统，并证明它对于安全的语义表征是合理的。我们实施了JE和安全类型系统，使Java程序能够在具有强大安全保障的英特尔SGX上运行。我们从文献中评估了我们的用例方法，包括战舰游戏、安全事件处理系统和流行的大数据处理框架，表明我们正确处理了分区、信息流、解密和信任的复杂情况。
papers.title_zh: 使用Enclaves进行安全软件开发的语言支持

papers.title: A Coq proof of the correctness of X25519 in TweetNaCl
papers.authors: Peter Schwabe, Benoît Viguier, Timmy Weerwag, Freek Wiedijk
papers.abstract: We formally prove that the C implementation of the X25519 key-exchange protocol in the TweetNaCl library is correct. We prove both that it correctly implements the protocol from Bernstein’s 2006 paper, as standardized in RFC 7748, as well as the absence of undefined behavior like arithmetic overflows and array out-of-bounds errors. We also formally prove, based on the work of Bartzia and Strub, that X25519 is mathematically correct, i.e., that it correctly computes scalar multiplication on the elliptic curve Curve25519. The proofs are all computer-verified using the Coq theorem prover. To establish the link between C and Coq we use the Verified Software Toolchain (VST).
papers.abstract_zh: 我们正式证明了TweetNaCl库中X25519密钥交换协议的C实现是正确的。我们证明它正确地实现了Bernstein 2006年论文中的协议，如RFC 7748中的标准，并且没有未定义的行为，如算术溢出和数组越界错误。基于Bartzia和Strub的工作，我们还正式证明了X25519在数学上是正确的，即它正确地计算了椭圆曲线曲线上的标量乘法。这些证明都是用Coq定理证明器通过计算机验证的。为了在C和Coq之间建立联系，我们使用了经验证的软件工具链(VST)。
papers.title_zh: TweetNaCl中X25519正确性的Coq证明

papers.title: On the Soundness of Infrastructure Adversaries
papers.authors: Alexander Dax, Robert Künnemann
papers.abstract: Campus Companies and network operators perform risk assessment to inform policy-making, guide infrastructure investments or to comply with security standards such as ISO 27001. Due to the size and complexity of these networks, risk assessment techniques such as attack graphs or trees describe the attacker with a finite set of rules. This characterization of the attacker can easily miss attack vectors or overstate them, potentially leading to incorrect risk estimation. In this work, we propose the first methodology to justify a rule-based attacker model. Conceptually, we add another layer of abstraction on top of the symbolic model of cryptography, which reasons about protocols and abstracts cryptographic primitives. This new layer reasons about Internet-scale networks and abstracts protocols.We show, in general, how the soundness and completeness of a rule-based model can be ensured by verifying trace properties, linking soundness to safety properties and completeness to liveness properties. We then demonstrate the approach for a recently proposed threat model that quantifies the confidentiality of email communication on the Internet, including DNS, DNSSEC, and SMTP. Using off-the-shelf protocol verification tools, we discover two flaws in their threat model. After fixing them, we show that it provides symbolic soundness.
papers.abstract_zh: 校园公司和网络运营商执行风险评估，为决策提供信息、指导基础设施投资或遵守ISO 27001等安全标准。由于这些网络的规模和复杂性，诸如攻击图或树之类的风险评估技术用一组有限的规则来描述攻击者。对攻击者的这种描述很容易遗漏攻击媒介或夸大它们，从而可能导致错误的风险估计。在这项工作中，我们提出了第一个方法来证明一个基于规则的攻击者模型。从概念上讲，我们在密码学的符号模型之上添加了另一个抽象层，它推理协议并抽象密码原语。这个新的层推理关于互联网规模的网络和抽象协议。一般来说，我们展示了基于规则的模型的可靠性和完整性是如何通过验证跟踪属性、将可靠性链接到安全属性以及将完整性链接到活性属性来确保的。然后，我们展示了最近提出的威胁模型的方法，该模型量化了互联网上电子邮件通信的机密性，包括DNS、DNSSEC和SMTP。使用现成的协议验证工具，我们发现了他们的威胁模型中的两个缺陷。在修复它们之后，我们证明它提供了符号合理性。
papers.title_zh: 基础设施对手的稳健性

papers.title: Automating Audit with Policy Inference
papers.authors: Abhishek Bichhawat, Matt Fredrikson, Jean Yang
papers.abstract: The risk posed by high-profile data breaches has raised the stakes for adhering to data access policies for many organizations, but the complexity of both the policies themselves and the applications that must obey them raises significant challenges. To mitigate this risk, fine-grained audit of access to private data has become common practice, but this is a costly, time-consuming, and error-prone process.We propose an approach for automating much of the work required for fine-grained audit of private data access. Starting from the assumption that the auditor does not have an explicit, formal description of the correct policy, but is able to decide whether a given policy fragment is partially correct, our approach gradually infers a policy from audit log entries. When the auditor determines that a proposed policy fragment is appropriate, it is added to the system’s mechanized policy, and future log entries to which the fragment applies can be dealt with automatically. We prove that for a general class of attribute-based data policies, this inference process satisfies a monotonicity property which implies that eventually, the mechanized policy will comprise the full set of access rules, and no further manual audit is necessary. Finally, we evaluate this approach using a case study involving synthetic electronic medical records and the HIPAA rule, and show that the inferred mechanized policy quickly converges to the full, stable rule, significantly reducing the amount of effort needed to ensure compliance in a practical setting.
papers.abstract_zh: 高调的数据泄露带来的风险增加了许多组织遵守数据访问策略的风险，但策略本身和必须遵守策略的应用程序的复杂性带来了巨大的挑战。为了降低这种风险，对私有数据访问的细粒度审计已经成为常见的做法，但这是一个成本高昂、耗时且容易出错的过程。我们提出了一种方法来自动化私有数据访问的细粒度审计所需的大部分工作。假设审计员没有正确策略的明确、正式的描述，但是能够决定给定的策略片段是否部分正确，我们的方法从审计日志条目逐步推断策略。当审计员确定建议的策略片段是适当的时，它被添加到系统的机械化策略中，并且该片段所应用的未来日志条目可以被自动处理。我们证明，对于一类基于属性的数据策略，这种推理过程满足单调性，这意味着最终，机械化的策略将包括完整的访问规则集，并且不需要进一步的人工审核。最后，我们使用涉及合成电子医疗记录和HIPAA规则的案例研究来评估这种方法，并表明推断的机械化策略很快收敛到完整、稳定的规则，显著减少了在实际设置中确保合规性所需的工作量。
papers.title_zh: 通过策略推理实现审计自动化

papers.title: Concise UC Zero-Knowledge Proofs for Oblivious Updatable Databases
papers.authors: Jan Camenisch, Maria Dubovitskaya, Alfredo Rial
papers.abstract: We propose an ideal functionality $\mathcal{F}_{\mathrm{C}\mathrm{D}}$ and a construction $\Pi_{\mathrm{C}\mathrm{D}}$ for oblivious and updatable committed databases. $\mathcal{F}_{\mathrm{C}\mathrm{D}}$ allows a prover $\mathcal{P}$ to read, write, and update values in a database and to prove to a verifier $\mathcal{V}$ in zero-knowledge (ZK) that a value is read from or written into a certain position. The following properties must hold: (1) values stored in the database remain hidden from $\mathcal{V}$; (2) a value read from a certain position is equal to the value previously written into that position; (3) (obliviousness) both the value read or written and its position remain hidden from $\mathcal{V}$.$\Pi_{\mathrm{C}\mathrm{D}}$ is based on vector commitments. After the initialization phase, the cost of read and write operations is independent of the database size, outperforming other techniques that achieve cost sublinear in the dataset size for prover and/or verifier. Therefore, our construction is especially appealing for large datasets. In existing “commit-and-prove” two-party protocols, the task of maintaining a committed database between $\mathcal{P}$ and $\mathcal{V}$ and reading and writing values into it is not separated from the task of proving statements about the values read or written. $\mathcal{F}_{\mathrm{C}\mathrm{D}}$ allows us to improve modularity in protocol design by separating those tasks. In comparison to simply using a commitment scheme to maintain a committed database, $\mathcal{F}_{\mathrm{C}\mathrm{D}}$ allows $\mathcal{P}$ to hide efficiently the positions read or written from $\mathcal{V}$. Thanks to this property, we design protocols for e.g. privacy-preserving e-commerce and location-based services where $\mathcal{V}$ gathers aggregate statistics about the statements that $\mathcal{P}$ proves in ZK.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出一个理想的函数$ \ mathcal { F } _ { \ mathrm { C } \ mathrm { D } } $和一个构造$\Pi_{\mathrm{C}\mathrm{D}}$用于不经意的和可更新的提交数据库。$ \ mathcal { F } _ { \ mathrm { C } \ mathrm { D } } $允许证明者$\mathcal{P}$读取、写入和更新数据库中的值，并向零知识(ZK)的验证者$\mathcal{V}$证明某个值是从某个位置读取或写入的。以下属性必须成立:(1)存储在数据库中的值对$\mathcal{V}$保持隐藏；(2)从某一位置读取的值等于先前写入该位置的值；(3)(遗忘)读取或写入的值及其位置对$\mathcal{V}$保持隐藏。$\Pi_{\mathrm{C}\mathrm{D}}$基于向量承诺。在初始化阶段之后，读取和写入操作的成本与数据库大小无关，优于在证明者和/或验证者的数据集大小方面实现成本次线性的其他技术。因此，我们的构造对大型数据集特别有吸引力。在现有的“提交-证明”两方协议中，维护$\mathcal{P}$和$\mathcal{V}$之间的提交数据库并向其中读写值的任务没有与证明关于读写值的语句的任务分开。$ \ mathcal { F } _ { \ mathrm { C } \ mathrm { D } } $允许我们通过分离这些任务来提高协议设计的模块化。与简单地使用提交方案来维护提交的数据库相比，$ \ mathcal { F } _ { \ mathrm { C } \ mathrm { D } } $允许$\mathcal{P}$有效地隐藏从$\mathcal{V}读取或写入的位置。由于这一特性，我们为保护隐私的电子商务和基于位置的服务设计了协议，其中＄\ mathcal { V } $收集关于＄\ mathcal { P } $在ZK证明的声明的聚合统计信息。
papers.title_zh: 不经意可更新数据库的简洁UC零知识证明

papers.title: Verifying Accountability for Unbounded Sets of Participants
papers.authors: Kevin Morio, Robert Künnemann
papers.abstract: Little can be achieved in the design of security protocols without trusting at least some participants. This trust should be justified or, at the very least, subject to examination. One way to strengthen trustworthiness is to hold parties accountable for their actions, as this provides a strong incentive to refrain from malicious behavior. This has led to an increased interest in accountability in the design of security protocols.In this work, we combine the accountability definition of Künnemann, Esiyok, and Backes [21] with the notion of case tests to extend its applicability to protocols with unbounded sets of participants. We propose a general construction of verdict functions and a set of verification conditions that achieve soundness and completeness.Expressing the verification conditions in terms of trace properties allows us to extend TAMARIN—a protocol verification tool— with the ability to analyze and verify accountability properties in a highly automated way. In contrast to prior work, our approach is significantly more flexible and applicable to a wider range of protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 如果不信任至少一些参与者，安全协议的设计将一事无成。这种信任应该是合理的，或者至少要经过检验。加强可信度的一个方法是让各方对自己的行为负责，因为这为避免恶意行为提供了强有力的激励。这使得人们对安全协议设计中的责任越来越感兴趣。在这项工作中，我们将kunne Mann、Esiyok和Backes [21]的责任定义与案例测试的概念相结合，以将其适用性扩展到参与者集合不受限制的协议。我们提出了一个判决函数的一般结构和一组实现可靠性和完整性的验证条件。用跟踪属性表达验证条件允许我们扩展TAMARIN——一个协议验证工具——以高度自动化的方式分析和验证责任属性的能力。与以前的工作相比，我们的方法更加灵活，适用于更广泛的协议。
papers.title_zh: 验证无限参与者集合的责任

papers.title: A Formal Information-Theoretic Leakage Analysis of Order-Revealing Encryption
papers.authors: Mireya Jurado, Catuscia Palamidessi, Geoffrey Smith
papers.abstract: Order-Revealing Encryption (ORE) allows deriving the order of two plaintexts to facilitate database functions such as range queries and sorting. Ideally, nothing is observable to an adversary beyond the order of the messages. Unfortunately, Ideal ORE is challenging to implement, and a variation of it has then been developed. This variation, referred to as CLWW ORE, reveals the first differing bit position between every two plaintexts, in addition to the order.We provide a formal leakage analysis of these two ORE variations by applying the information-theoretic quantitative information flow (QIF) framework. We evaluate two threat models: (1) the Bayes scenario in which an adversary wishes to guess the secret entirely and (2) a bucketing scenario in which an adversary is content to simply guess the range of the plaintext. We provide security implications, usage guidelines, and a mitigation technique that improves the security of Ideal ORE. We find that while Ideal and CLWW ORE perform similarly under the Bayes scenario, CLWW ORE is fundamentally insecure under the bucketing scenario.
papers.abstract_zh: 揭示顺序的加密(ORE)允许导出两个明文的顺序，以方便数据库功能，如范围查询和排序。理想情况下，除了消息的顺序之外，对手看不到任何东西。不幸的是，理想矿石很难实现，于是人们开发了一种变体。这种变化称为CLWW ORE，除了顺序之外，还揭示了每两个明文之间的第一个不同的位位置。我们通过应用信息论定量信息流(QIF)框架提供了这两种矿石变异的正式渗漏分析。我们评估了两种威胁模型:(Bayes场景，其中对手希望完全猜测秘密，以及(2)bucking场景，其中对手满足于简单地猜测明文的范围。我们提供了安全含义、使用指南和一种可以提高Ideal ORE安全性的缓解技术。我们发现，虽然理想矿石和CLWW矿石在贝叶斯方案下表现相似，但CLWW矿石在分桶方案下基本上是不安全的。
papers.title_zh: 揭示顺序加密的形式信息论泄漏分析

papers.title: Cooking Cryptographers: Secure Multiparty Computation Based on Balls and Bags
papers.authors: Daiki Miyahara, Yuichi Komano, Takaaki Mizuki, Hideaki Sone
papers.abstract: Imagine two cryptographers wishing to securely compute the AND value of their secret input bits. They are in the kitchen, where all they have are three saucepans with Borscht soup and some kinds of ingredients. Interestingly, by secretly putting ingredients in the saucepans depending on their inputs, they can find only the AND value from the taste of the cooked Borscht. Because cooking for secure computations is not so convenient, let us regard ingredients and saucepans (with Borscht soup) as balls and bags, respectively, which are easy to handle and also familiar tools for learning Probability in high school. Then, our problem is generalized as: Can we realize secure multiparty computations (MPCs) with balls and bags?There are techniques to realize MPCs with everyday objects, such as physical cards, coins, and a PEZ dispenser. We encode the input bits with such objects and securely compute some predetermined function using them. In this paper, we present a novel technique based on the physical properties of balls and bags. That is, our challenges are how to utilize an interesting feature that the balls become disordered immediately after they are put into a bag, namely they are “automatically shuffled”. We give the first framework of MPCs using balls and bags (namely, ball-based cryptography), and propose secure AND computation and general MPCs. Our protocols are realizations of usable security which helps people with understanding the principles of MPCs as well as solving social problems in daily life.
papers.abstract_zh: 想象两个密码学家希望安全地计算他们的秘密输入位的AND值。他们在厨房里，那里只有三个炖锅，里面有罗宋汤和一些配料。有趣的是，通过根据他们的输入偷偷将配料放入炖锅，他们只能从煮好的罗宋汤的味道中找到价值。因为安全计算的烹饪不是那么方便，我们就把食材和炖锅(有罗宋汤的)分别看成球和袋子，容易处理，也是高中学习概率的熟悉工具。然后，我们的问题被概括为:我们能用球和包实现安全多方计算吗？有一些技术可以用日常物品来实现MPC，例如实体卡片、硬币和PEZ自动售货机。我们用这些对象对输入位进行编码，并使用它们安全地计算一些预定的函数。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一种基于球和包的物理特性的新技术。也就是说，我们的挑战是如何利用一个有趣的特征，即球在被放入袋子后立即变得无序，即它们被“自动洗牌”。我们给出了使用球和包的MPCs的第一个框架(即基于球的密码)，并提出了安全、计算和通用的MPCs。我们的协议是可用安全性的实现，有助于人们理解MPCs的原理以及解决日常生活中的社会问题。
papers.title_zh: 烹饪密码器:基于球和袋的安全多方计算

papers.title: Election Verifiability Revisited: Automated Security Proofs and Attacks on Helios and Belenios
papers.authors: Sevdenur Baloglu, Sergiu Bursuc, Sjouke Mauw, Jun Pang
papers.abstract: Election verifiability aims to ensure that the outcome produced by electronic voting systems correctly reflects the intentions of eligible voters, even in the presence of an adversary that may corrupt various parts of the voting infrastructure. Protecting such systems from manipulation is challenging because of their distributed nature involving voters, election authorities, voting servers and voting platforms. An adversary corrupting any of these can make changes that, individually, would go unnoticed, yet in the end will affect the outcome of the election. It is, therefore, important to rigorously evaluate whether the measures prescribed by election verifiability achieve their goals. We propose a formal framework that allows such an evaluation in a systematic and automated way. We demonstrate its application to the verification of various scenarios in Helios and Belenios, two prominent internet voting systems, for which we capture features and corruption models previously outside the scope of formal verification. Relying on the Tamarin protocol prover for automation, we derive new security proofs and attacks on deployed versions of these protocols, illustrating trade-offs between usability and security.
papers.abstract_zh: 选举可验证性旨在确保电子投票系统产生的结果正确反映合格选民的意图，即使存在可能破坏投票基础设施各个部分的对手。保护此类系统免受操纵是一项挑战，因为它们的分布性质涉及选民、选举当局、投票服务器和投票平台。一个对手破坏了其中的任何一个，就可以做出一些改变，而这些改变，就个人而言，是不会被注意到的，但最终会影响选举的结果。因此，严格评估选举可核查性所规定的措施是否达到了目标是很重要的。我们提出了一个正式的框架，允许以系统化和自动化的方式进行这样的评估。我们展示了它在Helios和Belenios这两个著名的互联网投票系统中的各种场景验证中的应用，我们捕获了以前在正式验证范围之外的特征和腐败模型。依靠Tamarin协议证明者的自动化，我们得到了新的安全证明和对这些协议部署版本的攻击，说明了可用性和安全性之间的权衡。
papers.title_zh: 选举可验证性再探:自动化安全证明和对Helios和Belenios的攻击

papers.title: Formalizing Nakamoto-Style Proof of Stake
papers.authors: Søren Eller Thomsen, Bas Spitters
papers.abstract: Fault-tolerant distributed systems move the trust in a single party to a majority of parties participating in the protocol. This makes blockchain based crypto-currencies possible: they allow parties to agree on a total order of transactions without a trusted third party. To trust a distributed system, the security of the protocol and the correctness of the implementation must be indisputable. We present the first machine checked proof that guarantees both safety and liveness for a consensus algorithm. We verify a Proof of Stake (PoS) Nakamoto-style blockchain (NSB) protocol, using the foundational proof assistant Coq. In particular, we consider a PoS NSB in a synchronous network with a static set of corrupted parties. We define execution semantics for this setting and prove chain growth, chain quality, and common prefix which together imply both safety and liveness.
papers.abstract_zh: 容错分布式系统将单个参与方的信任转移到参与协议的大多数参与方。这使得基于区块链的加密货币成为可能:它们允许各方在没有可信第三方的情况下就交易的总顺序达成一致。要信任一个分布式系统，协议的安全性和实现的正确性必须是无可争议的。我们提出了第一个机器检查的证明，保证了一致性算法的安全性和活性。我们使用基本的证明助手Coq验证了中本聪式的区块链(NSB)协议。特别地，我们考虑一个同步网络中的PoS NSB，它具有一组静态的被破坏方。我们为这个设置定义了执行语义，并证明了链增长、链质量和公共前缀，它们共同暗示了安全性和活性。
papers.title_zh: 形式化中本聪式的股权证明

papers.title: SSProve: A Foundational Framework for Modular Cryptographic Proofs in Coq
papers.authors: Carmine Abate, Philipp G. Haselwarter, Exequiel Rivas, Antoine Van Muylder, Théo Winterhalter, Catalin Hritcu, Kenji Maillard, Bas Spitters
papers.abstract: State-separating proofs (SSP) is a recent methodology for structuring game-based cryptographic proofs in a modular way. While very promising, this methodology was previously not fully formalized and came with little tool support. We address this by introducing SSProve, the first general verification framework for machine-checked state-separating proofs. SSProve combines high-level modular proofs about composed protocols, as proposed in SSP, with a probabilistic relational program logic for formalizing the lower-level details, which together enable constructing fully machine-checked crypto proofs in the Coq proof assistant. Moreover, SSProve is itself formalized in Coq, including the algebraic laws of SSP, the soundness of the program logic, and the connection between these two verification styles.
papers.abstract_zh: 状态分离证明(SSP)是一种以模块化方式构造基于游戏的密码证明的新方法。虽然非常有前途，但是这种方法以前没有完全形式化，并且几乎没有工具支持。我们通过引入SProve来解决这个问题，s prove是第一个用于机器检查状态分离证明的通用验证框架。SSProve将SSP中提出的关于组合协议的高级模块化证明与用于形式化较低级细节的概率关系程序逻辑相结合，这两者一起使得能够在Coq证明助手中构造完全机器检查的加密证明。而且，SSProve本身是在Coq中形式化的，包括SSP的代数法则，程序逻辑的健全性，以及这两种验证风格之间的联系。
papers.title_zh: s prove:Coq中模块密码证明的基础框架

papers.title: Dynamic IFC Theorems for Free!
papers.authors: Maximilian Algehed, Jean-Philippe Bernardy, Catalin Hritcu
papers.abstract: We show that noninterference and transparency, the key soundness theorems for dynamic IFC libraries, can be obtained “for free”, as direct consequences of the more general parametricity theorem of type abstraction. This allows us to give very short soundness proofs for dynamic IFC libraries such as faceted values and LIO. Our proofs stay short even when fully mechanized for Agda implementations of the libraries in terms of type abstraction.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们表明，作为类型抽象的更一般的参数化定理的直接结果，动态IFC库的关键可靠性定理不干涉和透明性可以“免费”获得。这允许我们对动态IFC库，如刻面值和LIO，给出非常简短的可靠性证明。就类型抽象而言，我们的证明仍然很短，即使在完全机械化的Agda库实现中也是如此。
papers.title_zh: 免费的动态IFC定理！

papers.title: Formal Verification of Secure Forwarding Protocols
papers.authors: Tobias Klenze, Christoph Sprenger, David A. Basin
papers.abstract: Today’s Internet is built on decades-old networking protocols that lack scalability, reliability, and security. In response, the networking community has developed path-aware Internet architectures that solve these issues while simultaneously empowering end hosts. In these architectures, autonomous systems construct authenticated forwarding paths based on their routing policies. Each end host then selects one of these authorized paths and includes it in the packet header, thus allowing routers to efficiently determine how to forward the packet. A central security property of these architectures is path authorization, requiring that packets can only travel along authorized paths. This property protects the routing policies of autonomous systems from malicious senders.The fundamental role of packet forwarding in the Internet and the complexity of the authentication mechanisms employed call for a formal analysis. In this vein, we develop in Isabelle/HOL a parameterized verification framework for path-aware data plane protocols. We first formulate an abstract model without an attacker for which we prove path authorization. We then refine this model by introducing an attacker and by protecting authorized paths using (generic) cryptographic validation fields. This model is parameterized by the protocol’s authentication mechanism and assumes five simple verification conditions that are sufficient to prove the refinement of the abstract model. We validate our framework by instantiating it with several concrete protocols from the literature and proving that they each satisfy the verification conditions and hence path authorization. No invariants must be proven for the instantiation. Our framework thus supports low-effort security proofs for data plane protocols. The results hold for arbitrary network topologies and sets of authorized paths, a guarantee that state-of-the-art automated security protocol verifiers cannot currently provide.
papers.abstract_zh: 今天的互联网建立在几十年前的网络协议之上，缺乏可扩展性、可靠性和安全性。作为回应，网络社区开发了路径感知的互联网架构，在支持终端主机的同时解决了这些问题。在这些体系结构中，自治系统基于它们的路由策略构建认证转发路径。然后，每台终端主机选择这些授权路径中的一条，并将其包含在数据包报头中，从而允许路由器有效地确定如何转发数据包。这些体系结构的主要安全属性是路径授权，要求数据包只能沿着授权的路径传输。该属性保护自治系统的路由策略免受恶意发送者的攻击。包转发在因特网中的基本作用和所采用的认证机制的复杂性要求进行形式分析。在这种情况下，我们在伊莎贝尔/HOL开发了路径感知数据平面协议的参数化验证框架。我们首先建立一个没有攻击者的抽象模型，并为其证明路径授权。然后，我们通过引入攻击者和使用(通用)加密验证字段保护授权路径来改进这个模型。该模型由协议的认证机制参数化，并假设五个简单的验证条件，足以证明抽象模型的改进。我们通过实例化文献中的几个具体协议来验证我们的框架，并证明它们每个都满足验证条件，从而满足路径授权。实例化不需要证明不变量。因此，我们的框架支持数据平面协议的低努力安全证明。结果适用于任意网络拓扑和授权路径集，这是目前最先进的自动化安全协议验证器无法提供的保证。
papers.title_zh: 安全转发协议的形式化验证

papers.title: Secure Compilation of Constant-Resource Programs
papers.authors: Gilles Barthe, Sandrine Blazy, Rémi Hutin, David Pichardie
papers.abstract: Observational non-interference (ONI) is a generic information-flow policy for side-channel leakage. Informally, a program is ONI-secure if observing program leakage during execution does not reveal any information about secrets. Formally, ONI is parametrized by a leakage function $\ell$, and different instances of ONI can be recovered through different instantiations of $\ell$. One popular instance of ONI is the cryptographic constant-time (CCT) policy, which is widely used in cryptographic libraries to protect against timing and cache attacks. Informally, a program is CCT-secure if it does not branch on secrets and does not perform secret-dependent memory accesses. Another instance of ONI is the constant-resource (CR) policy, a relaxation of the CCT policy which is used in Amazon's s2n implementation of TLS and in several other security applications. Informally, a program is CR-secure if its cost (modelled by a tick operator over an arbitrary semi-group) does not depend on secrets.In this paper, we consider the problem of preserving ONI by compilation. Prior work on the preservation of the CCT policy develops proof techniques for showing that main compiler optimisations preserve the CCT policy. However, these proof techniques critically rely on the fact that the semi-group used for modelling leakage satisfies the property:\begin{equation*}\ell_{1}+\ \ell_{1}^{\prime}\ =\ell_{2}+\ell_{2}^{\prime}\Rightarrow\ell_{1}=\ell_{2}\wedge\ \ell_{1}^{\prime}\ =\ell_{2}^{\prime}\end{equation*}Unfortunately, this non-cancelling property fails for the CR policy, because its underlying semi-group is $(\mathbb{N},\ +)$ and it is currently not known how to extend existing techniques to policies that do not satisfy non-cancellation.We propose a methodology for proving the preservation of the CR policy during a program transformation. We present an implementation of some elementary compiler passes, and apply the methodology to prove the preservation of these passes. Our results have been mechanically verified using the Coq proof assistant.
papers.abstract_zh: 观察无干扰(ONI)是一种通用的边信道泄漏信息流策略。通俗地说，如果在执行过程中观察程序泄漏不会暴露任何秘密信息，那么程序就是ONI安全的。形式上，ONI由泄漏函数$\ell$参数化，ONI的不同实例可以通过$\ell$的不同实例化来恢复。ONI的一个流行实例是加密常数时间(CCT)策略，它广泛用于加密库中以防止计时和缓存攻击。非正式地说，如果一个程序没有秘密分支，并且不执行秘密相关的内存访问，那么它就是CCT安全的。ONI的另一个例子是恒定资源(CR)策略，这是对CCT策略的一种放宽，在Amazon的s2n TLS实现和其他几个安全应用程序中使用。非正式地说，如果一个程序的成本(由tick算子在任意半群上建模)不依赖于秘密，则该程序是CR-安全的。在本文中，我们考虑通过编译保持ONI的问题。先前关于保留CCT策略的工作开发了证明技术，用于显示主要编译器优化保留了CCT策略。然而，这些证明技术关键地依赖于这样的事实，即用于对泄漏建模的半群满足属性:\ begin { equation * } \ ell _ { 1 }+\ \ell_{1}^{\prime}\ =\ell_{2}+\ell_{2}^{\prime}\rightarrow\ell_{1}=\ell_{2}\wedge\ \ell_{1}^{\prime}\ =\ell_{2}^{\prime}\end{equation*}unfortunately，这个不可取消属性对于CR策略是不成立的，因为它的基础半群是$(\mathbb{N}，\ +)$并且当前不知道如何将现有技术扩展到不满足不可取消的策略。我们提出了一种方法来证明在一个项目转换过程中的CR政策的保存。我们提出了一些基本编译器通道的实现，并应用该方法来证明这些通道的保持性。我们的结果已经使用Coq proof assistant进行了机械验证。
papers.title_zh: 恒定资源程序的安全编译

papers.title: Optimising Faceted Secure Multi-Execution
papers.authors: Maximilian Algehed, Alejandro Russo, Cormac Flanagan
papers.abstract: Language-Based Information Flow Control (IFC) provides strong security guarantees for untrusted code, but often suffers from a non-negligible rate of false alarms. Multi-execution based techniques promise to provide security guarantees without raising any false alarms. However, all known multi-execution approaches introduce extraneous performance overheads which are rarely studied. In this work, we lay down the foundations for optimisation techniques aimed at reducing these overheads to a managable level, thus helping to make multi-execution more practical. We characterise our optimisations as data-and control-oriented. Data-oriented optimisations reduce storage overheads— which also helps to remove unnecessary repeated computations. In contrast, computation-oriented optimisations rely on program annotations in order to reduce needless computation. These annotations motivate the need for a new, stronger, theoretical notion of transparency— i.e., a stronger notion for characterising the lack of false alarms. To show the efficacy of our optimisation techniques, we apply them to two case-studies: a secure (faceted) database and a chat server written in a multi-execution based IFC framework. Our case-studies clearly show that our optimisations significantly reduce the storage and computational overhead, sometimes from exponential to polynomial order. All of our formal results are accompanied by mechanised proofs in Agda.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于语言的信息流控制(IFC)为不受信任的代码提供了强大的安全保证，但经常遭受不可忽略的误报率。基于多执行的技术承诺提供安全保证，而不会引起任何错误警报。然而，所有已知的多执行方法都会引入额外的性能开销，这一点很少被研究。在这项工作中，我们奠定了优化技术的基础，旨在将这些开销减少到可管理的水平，从而有助于使多重执行更加实用。我们将优化描述为面向数据和控制的。面向数据的优化减少了存储开销，这也有助于消除不必要的重复计算。相反，面向计算的优化依赖于程序注释来减少不必要的计算。这些注释激发了对新的、更强的、理论上的透明度概念的需求——也就是说，一个更强的用于描述缺少假警报的概念。为了展示我们的优化技术的有效性，我们将它们应用于两个案例研究:一个安全的(刻面的)数据库和一个在基于多执行的IFC框架中编写的聊天服务器。我们的案例研究清楚地表明，我们的优化大大减少了存储和计算开销，有时从指数级减少到多项式级。我们所有的正式结果都伴随着Agda中的机械化证明。
papers.title_zh: 优化分面安全多执行

papers.title: Canonical Representations of k-Safety Hyperproperties
papers.authors: Bernd Finkbeiner, Lennart Haas, Hazem Torfah
papers.abstract: Hyperproperties elevate the traditional view of trace properties form sets of traces to sets of sets of traces and provide a formalism for expressing information-flow policies. For trace properties, algorithms for verification, monitoring, and synthesis are typically based on a representation of the properties as omega-automata. For hyperproperties, a similar, canonical automata-theoretic representation is, so far, missing. This is a serious obstacle for the development of algorithms, because basic constructions, such as learning algorithms, cannot be applied. In this paper, we present a canonical representation for the widely used class of regular k-safety hyperproperties, which includes important polices such as noninterference. We show that a regular k-safety hyperproperty S can be represented by a finite automaton, where each word accepted by the automaton represents a violation of S. The representation provides an automata-theoretic approach to regular k-safety hyperproperties and allows us to compare regular k-safety hyperproperties, simplify them, and learn such hyperproperties. We investigate the problem of constructing automata for regular k-safety hyperproperties in general and from formulas in HyperLTL, and provide complexity bounds for the different translations. We also present a learning algorithm for regular k-safety hyperproperties based on the L* learning algorithm for deterministic finite automata.
papers.abstract_zh: 超属性将跟踪属性的传统观点从跟踪集提升到跟踪集的集，并提供了一种表达信息流策略的形式。对于跟踪属性，用于验证、监控和合成的算法通常基于作为欧米伽自动机的属性表示。对于超属性，一个相似的，规范的自动机理论表示，到目前为止还没有。这对于算法的发展是一个严重的障碍，因为学习算法等基本构造无法应用。在本文中，我们提出了一类广泛使用的正则k-安全超性质的规范表示，其中包括重要的政策，如不干涉。我们证明了一个正则k-安全超性质S可以用一个有限自动机来表示，其中自动机接受的每个字都代表一个对S的违反。这种表示提供了一种对正则k-安全超性质的自动机理论方法，并允许我们比较正则k-安全超性质，简化它们，并学习这样的超性质。我们研究了在一般情况下从HyperLTL中的公式为正则k-安全超属性构造自动机的问题，并为不同的翻译提供了复杂性界限。基于确定性有限自动机的L*学习算法，我们还提出了正则k-安全超性质的学习算法。
papers.title_zh: k-安全超性质的典范表示

papers.title: Timing Leaks and Coarse-Grained Clocks
papers.authors: Panagiotis Vasilikos, Hanne Riis Nielson, Flemming Nielson, Boris Köpf
papers.abstract: Timing-based side-channel attacks have matured from an academic exercise to a powerful attack vector in the hand of real-world adversaries. A widely deployed countermeausure against such attacks is to reduce the accuracy of the clocks that are available to adversaries. While a number of high-profile attacks show that this mitigation can be side-stepped, there has not been a principled analysis of the degree of security it provides until now. In this paper, we perform the first information-flow analysis with respect to adversaries with coarse-grained clocks. To this end, we define an adversary model that is parametric in the granularity of the clock and connect it with a system model based on timed automata. We present algorithms for translating such a system to an information-theoretic channel, which enables us to analyze the leakage using standard techniques from quantitative information-flow analysis. We use our techniques to derive insights about the effect of reducing clock resolution on security. In particular, (1) we show that a coarse-grained clock might leak more than a fine-grained one, (2) we give a sufficient condition for when increasing the grain of the clock we achieve better security, and (3) we show that the attack techniques used in the literature form a strict hierarchy in terms of the information an adversary can extract using them. Finally, we illustrate the expressiveness of our development on a case study of a system that uses RSA signatures.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于时间的旁道攻击已经从一种学术练习发展成为现实世界对手手中的一种强大的攻击手段。针对这种攻击的一种广泛采用的对策是降低对手可获得的时钟的准确性。虽然一些高调的攻击表明，这种缓解可以回避，但直到现在还没有对它提供的安全程度进行原则性的分析。在本文中，我们对使用粗粒度时钟的对手进行了第一次信息流分析。为此，我们定义了一个时钟粒度参数化的对手模型，并将其与基于时间自动机的系统模型联系起来。我们提出了将这样的系统转换成信息论信道的算法，这使得我们能够使用来自定量信息流分析的标准技术来分析泄漏。我们使用我们的技术来获得关于降低时钟分辨率对安全性的影响的见解。特别地，(1)我们证明了粗粒度的时钟可能比细粒度的时钟泄漏更多，(2)我们给出了当增加时钟粒度时我们获得更好的安全性的充分条件，以及(3)我们证明了文献中使用的攻击技术根据对手可以使用它们提取的信息形成了严格的层次结构。最后，我们在一个使用RSA签名的系统的案例研究中说明了我们的开发的表现力。
papers.title_zh: 定时泄漏和粗粒度时钟

papers.title: Decidability of a Sound Set of Inference Rules for Computational Indistinguishability
papers.authors: Adrien Koutsos
papers.abstract: Computational indistinguishability is a key property in cryptography and verification of security protocols. Current tools for proving it rely on cryptographic game transformations. We follow Bana and Comon's approach, axiomatizing what an adversary cannot distinguish. We prove the decidability of a set of first-order axioms which are computationally sound, though incomplete, for protocols with a bounded number of sessions whose security is based on an IND-CCA_2 encryption scheme. Alternatively, our result can be viewed as the decidability of a family of cryptographic game transformations. Our proof relies on term rewriting and automated deduction techniques.
papers.abstract_zh: 计算不可区分性是密码学和安全协议验证中的一个重要性质。目前证明它的工具依赖于加密游戏转换。我们遵循Bana和Comon的方法，公理化对手不能区分的东西。我们证明了一组一阶公理的可判定性，这些公理在计算上是合理的，尽管是不完全的，对于具有有限数量的会话的协议，其安全性是基于IND-CCA_2加密方案的。或者，我们的结果可以被看作是一族密码游戏变换的可判定性。我们的证明依赖于术语重写和自动演绎技术。
papers.title_zh: 计算不可区分性推理规则集的可判定性

papers.title: How to Wrap it up - A Formally Verified Proposal for the use of Authenticated Wrapping in PKCS#11
papers.authors: Alexander Dax, Robert Künnemann, Sven Tangermann, Michael Backes
papers.abstract: Being the most widely used and comprehensive standard for hardware security modules, cryptographic tokens and smart cards, PKCS#11 has been the subject of academic study for years. PKCS#11 provides a key store that is separate from the application, so that, ideally, an application never sees a key in the clear. Again and again, researchers have pointed out the need for an import/export mechanism that ensures the integrity of the permissions associated to a key. With version 2.40, for the first time, the standard included authenticated deterministic encryption schemes. The interface to this operation is insecure, however, so that an application can get the key in the clear, subverting the purpose of using a hardware security module. This work proposes a formal model for the secure use of authenticated deterministic encryption in PKCS#11, including concrete API changes to allow for secure policies to be implemented. Owing to the authenticated encryption mechanism, the policy we propose provides more functionality than any policy proposed so far and can be implemented without access to a random number generator. Our results cover modes of operation that rely on unique initialisation vectors (IVs), like GCM or CCM, but also modes that generate synthetic IVs. We furthermore provide a proof for the deduction soundness of our modelling of deterministic encryption in Böhl et.al.'s composable deduction soundness framework.
papers.abstract_zh: 作为硬件安全模块、加密令牌和智能卡的最广泛使用和最全面的标准，PKCS#11多年来一直是学术研究的主题。PKCS#11提供了一个独立于应用程序的密钥库，因此，在理想情况下，应用程序永远不会看到明文密钥。研究人员一次又一次地指出，需要一种导入/导出机制来确保与密钥相关联的权限的完整性。在2.40版本中，该标准首次包含了经过认证的确定性加密方案。然而，这个操作的接口是不安全的，因此应用程序可以不受阻碍地获得密钥，破坏了使用硬件安全模块的目的。这项工作提出了一个在PKCS#11中安全使用认证确定性加密的正式模型，包括具体的API更改，以实现安全策略。由于认证加密机制，我们提出的策略提供了比迄今为止提出的任何策略更多的功能，并且可以在不访问随机数生成器的情况下实现。我们的结果涵盖了依赖于唯一初始化向量(iv)的操作模式，如GCM或CCM，但也包括生成合成iv的模式。此外，我们还在bhl等人的可组合推理可靠性框架中证明了我们的确定性加密模型的推理可靠性。
papers.title_zh: 如何包装——关于在PKCS#11使用认证包装的正式验证提案

papers.title: Prime, Order Please! Revisiting Small Subgroup and Invalid Curve Attacks on Protocols using Diffie-Hellman
papers.authors: Cas Cremers, Dennis Jackson
papers.abstract: Diffie-Hellman groups are a widely used component in cryptographic protocols in which a shared secret is needed. These protocols are typically proven to be secure under the assumption they are implemented with prime order Diffie Hellman groups. However, in practice, many implementations either choose to use non-prime order groups for reasons of efficiency, or can be manipulated into operating in non-prime order groups. This leaves a gap between the proofs of protocol security, which assume prime order groups, and the real world implementations. This is not merely a theoretical possibility: many attacks exploiting small subgroups or invalid curve points have been found in the real world. While many advances have been made in automated protocol analysis, modern tools such as Tamarin and ProVerif represent DH groups using an abstraction of prime order groups. This means they, like many cryptographic proofs, may miss practical attacks on real world protocols. In this work we develop a novel extension of the symbolic model of Diffie-Hellman groups. By more accurately modelling internal group structure, our approach captures many more differences between prime order groups and their actual implementations. The additional behaviours that our models capture are surprisingly diverse, and include not only attacks using small subgroups and invalid curve points, but also a range of proposed mitigation techniques, such as excluding low order elements, single coordinate ladders, and checking the elliptic curve equation. Our models thereby capture a large family of attacks that were previously outside the symbolic model. We implement our improved models in the Tamarin Prover. We find a new attack on the Secure Scuttlebutt Gossip protocol, independently discover a recent attack on the Tendermint protocol, and show how our analysis finds previous Bluetooth attacks and evaluate the effectiveness of the proposed countermeasures.
papers.abstract_zh: Diffie-Hellman组是需要共享秘密的加密协议中广泛使用的组件。这些协议通常被证明是安全的，假设它们是用素数阶Diffie Hellman群实现的。然而，在实践中，许多实现或者出于效率的原因选择使用非素数阶组，或者可以被操纵成在非素数阶组中操作。这在假设素数阶群的协议安全性证明和现实世界的实现之间留下了一个缺口。这不仅仅是一种理论上的可能性:在现实世界中已经发现了许多利用小组或无效曲线点的攻击。虽然在自动化协议分析方面已经取得了许多进展，但是诸如Tamarin和ProVerif之类的现代工具使用素数阶组的抽象来表示DH组。这意味着它们像许多密码证明一样，可能会错过对现实世界协议的实际攻击。在这项工作中，我们开发了Diffie-Hellman群的符号模型的一个新的扩展。通过更精确地模拟内部组结构，我们的方法捕获了素数阶组和它们的实际实现之间的更多差异。我们的模型捕获的其他行为令人惊讶地多样化，不仅包括使用小组和无效曲线点的攻击，还包括一系列提议的缓解技术，如排除低阶元素、单坐标阶梯和检查椭圆曲线方程。因此，我们的模型捕获了以前在符号模型之外的一大类攻击。我们在Tamarin Prover中实现了改进的模型。我们发现了对安全流言蜚语协议的新攻击，独立发现了对Tendermint协议的最近攻击，并展示了我们的分析如何发现以前的蓝牙攻击并评估所提出的对策的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 总理，请点菜！使用Diffie-Hellman对协议的小子群和无效曲线攻击的再研究

papers.title: Re-Thinking Untraceability in the CryptoNote-Style Blockchain
papers.authors: Jiangshan Yu, Man Ho Allen Au, Paulo Jorge Esteves Veríssimo
papers.abstract: We develop new foundations on transaction untraceability for CryptoNote-style blockchain systems. In particular, we observe new attacks; develop theoretical foundations to model transaction untraceability; provide the least upper bound of transaction untraceability guarantee; provide ways to efficiently and automatically verify whether a given ledger achieves optimal transaction untraceability; and provide a general solution that achieves provably optimal transaction untraceability. Unlike previous cascade effect attacks (ESORICS' 17 and PETS' 18) on CryptoNote-style transaction untraceability, we consider not only a passive attacker but also an active adaptive attacker. Our observed attacks allow both types of attacker to trace blockchain transactions that cannot be traced by using the existing attacks. We develop a series of new games, which we call "The Sun-Tzu Survival Problem", to model CryptoNote-style blockchain transaction untraceability and our identified attacks. In addition, we obtain seven novel results, where three of them are negative and the rest are positive. In particular, thanks to our abstract game, we are able to build bipartite graphs to model transaction untraceability, and provide reductions to formally relate the hardness of calculating untraceability to the hardness of calculating the number of perfect matchings in all possible bipartite graphs. We prove that calculating transaction untraceability is a #P-complete problem, which is believed to be even more difficult to solve than NP problems. In addition, we provide the first result on the least upper bound of transaction untraceability. Moreover, through our theoretical results, we are able to provide ways to efficiently and automatically verify whether a given ledger achieves optimal transaction untraceability. Furthermore, we propose a simple strategy for CryptoNote-style blockchain systems to achieve optimal untraceability. We take Monero as a concrete example to demonstrate how to apply this strategy to optimise the untraceability guarantee provided by Monero.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们为密码笔记型区块链系统的交易不可追踪性建立了新的基础。特别是，我们观察到新的攻击；为交易不可追踪性建模开发理论基础；提供交易不可追踪性保证的最小上界；提供有效和自动验证给定分类帐是否实现最佳交易不可追踪性的方法；并且提供了实现可证明的最佳交易不可追踪性的通用解决方案。与以前针对CryptoNote式交易不可追踪性的级联效应攻击(ESORICS' 17和PETS' 18)不同，我们不仅考虑被动攻击者，还考虑主动自适应攻击者。我们观察到的攻击允许这两种类型的攻击者跟踪使用现有攻击无法跟踪的区块链交易。我们开发了一系列新的游戏，我们称之为“孙子生存问题”,以模拟密码笔记式的区块链交易不可追踪性和我们识别的攻击。此外，我们得到了七个新的结果，其中三个是否定的，其余的是肯定的。特别是，由于我们的抽象游戏，我们能够构建二部图来模拟事务的不可追踪性，并提供约简来将计算不可追踪性的困难与计算所有可能的二部图中完美匹配的数量的困难正式联系起来。我们证明了计算交易不可追踪性是一个# P-完全问题，这个问题被认为比NP问题更难解决。此外，我们给出了交易不可追踪性最小上界的第一个结果。此外，通过我们的理论结果，我们能够提供有效和自动验证给定分类帐是否实现最佳交易不可追踪性的方法。此外，我们提出了一个简单的密码笔记型区块链系统的策略，以实现最佳的不可追踪性。我们以Monero作为一个具体的例子来说明如何应用这种策略来优化Monero提供的不可追踪性保证。
papers.title_zh: 重新思考CryptoNote式区块链的不可追踪性

papers.title: Time-Dependent Decision-Making and Decentralization in Proof-of-Work Cryptocurrencies
papers.authors: Yevhen Zolotavkin, Julián García, Joseph Liu
papers.abstract: Pool mining is a common way to reduce income variance for miners in Proof of Work Cryptocurrencies. A vast majority of mining does happen in pools, where a popular scheme to distribute rewards is Pay per last N Shares (PPLNS). In PPLNS and related schemes, miners are frequently making decisions whose rewards are not immediate and will only manifest in the future. This implies that models of inter-temporal utility are relevant when considering the incentives of miners. We show that when including these features of human behaviour in models of rational pool miners, the conditions that lead to decentralisation are hampered because larger pools may be more attractive to miners. We present a new game theoretical model of PPLNS where rational miners have time preferences. In this setup, the incentives of miners to work for a pool depend on the initial distribution of power between mining pools, as well as the specific details of how time is discounted. Agents jumping to larger pools face a trade-off between reducing the expected payoff from their shares in their current pool, or getting faster rewards in the future by joining a larger pool. We consider a case where pools of different mining power have the same size of reward window N. According to our study, in equilibrium larger pools have a tendency to accumulate a disproportionate share of the network power at the expense of smaller pools. This outcome is prevalent over a large range of realistic model parameters. Our model shows that PPLNS may be harmful to the decentralised governance of cryptocurrencies. A way to ameliorate these negative effects, is to encourage pools to have diverse window sizes, or use different reward mechanisms. Doing this in a decentralised fashion is an open challenge.
papers.abstract_zh: 池挖掘是在工作证明加密货币中减少矿工收入差异的一种常见方法。绝大多数的开采都是在池中进行的，在池中，一个流行的奖励分配方案是每最后N股支付(PPLNS)。在PPLNS和相关方案中，矿工们经常做出回报不是立竿见影，而是在未来才会显现的决定。这意味着当考虑矿工的激励时，跨期效用模型是相关的。我们发现，当把人类行为的这些特征包括在理性的池矿工的模型中时，导致分散化的条件受到阻碍，因为更大的池可能对矿工更有吸引力。我们提出了一个新的PPLNS博弈模型，其中理性矿工有时间偏好。在这种情况下，矿工为一个矿池工作的动机取决于各矿池之间的初始权力分配，以及时间折扣的具体细节。加入更大资金池的代理人面临一个权衡，要么降低他们当前资金池股票的预期回报，要么通过加入更大的资金池在未来获得更快的回报。我们考虑一种情况，其中不同矿业电力的联营体具有相同大小的回报窗口n。根据我们的研究，在平衡状态下，较大的联营体倾向于以较小的联营体为代价积累不成比例的网络电力份额。这种结果在大范围的实际模型参数中普遍存在。我们的模型显示，PPLNS可能对加密货币的去中心化治理有害。改善这些负面影响的一个方法是鼓励资金池具有不同的窗口大小，或者使用不同的奖励机制。以分散的方式做这件事是一个公开的挑战。
papers.title_zh: 工作证明加密货币中的时间相关决策和去中心化

papers.title: Analysis of Deterministic Longest-Chain Protocols
papers.authors: Elaine Shi
papers.abstract: Most classical consensus protocols rely on a leader to coordinate nodes' voting efforts. One novel idea that stems from blockchain-style consensus is to rely, instead, on a "longestchain" idea for such coordination. Such a longest-chain idea was initially considered in randomized protocols, where in each round, a node has some probability of being elected a leader who can propose the next block. Recently, well-known systems have started implementing the deterministic counterpart of such longest-chain protocols — the deterministic counterpart is especially attractive since it is even simpler to implement than their randomized cousins. A notable instantiation is the Aura protocol which is widely shipped with Parity's open-source Ethereum implementation. Interestingly, mathematical analyses of deterministic, longest-chain protocols are lacking even though there exist several analyses of randomized versions. In this paper, we provide the first formal analysis of deterministic, longest-chain-style consensus. We show that a variant of the Aura protocol can defend against a Byzantine adversary that controls fewer than 1 fraction of the nodes, and this resilience parameter is tight. 3 Based on insights gained through our mathematical treatment, we point out that Aura's concrete instantiation actually fails to achieve the resilience level they claim and thus clarify existing misconceptions. Finally, while our tight proof for the longest-chain protocol is rather involved and non-trivial; we show that a variant of the "longest-chain" idea which we call "largest-set" enables a textbook construction that admits a simple proof (albeit with slower confirmation).
papers.abstract_zh: 大多数经典的共识协议依靠一个领导者来协调节点的投票努力。一个源自区块链式共识的新想法是，相反，依靠“最长链”思想来进行这种协调。这种最长链的想法最初是在随机协议中考虑的，在每一轮中，一个节点有一定的概率被选为可以提出下一个区块的领导者。最近，著名的系统已经开始实现这种最长链协议的确定性对应部分——的确定性对应部分特别有吸引力，因为它甚至比它们的随机化表亲更容易实现。一个值得注意的实例是Aura协议，它与Parity的开源以太坊实现一起广泛发布。有趣的是，尽管存在一些对随机化版本的分析，但是缺乏对确定性的最长链协议的数学分析。在这篇论文中，我们提供了第一个确定性的，最长链形式的共识的形式分析。我们证明了Aura协议的一个变体可以抵御控制少于1部分节点的拜占庭对手，并且这个弹性参数是严格的。3基于通过我们的数学处理获得的见解，我们指出Aura的具体实例化实际上未能达到他们声称的弹性水平，从而澄清了现有的误解。最后，虽然我们对最长链协议的严密证明相当复杂且不平凡；我们证明了“最长链”思想的一个变种，我们称之为“最大集合”，它使教科书的结构允许一个简单的证明(尽管有较慢的确认)。
papers.title_zh: 确定性最长链协议分析

papers.title: Symbolic Methods in Computational Cryptography Proofs
papers.authors: Gilles Barthe, Benjamin Grégoire, Charlie Jacomme, Steve Kremer, Pierre-Yves Strub
papers.abstract: Code-based game-playing is a popular methodology for proving security of cryptographic constructions and side-channel countermeasures. This methodology relies on treating cryptographic proofs as an instance of relational program verification (between probabilistic programs), and decomposing the latter into a series of elementary relational program verification steps. In this paper, we develop principled methods for proving such elementary steps for probabilistic programs that operate over finite fields and related algebraic structures. We focus on three essential properties: program equivalence, information flow, and uniformity. We give characterizations of these properties based on deducibility and other notions from symbolic cryptography. We use (sometimes improve) tools from symbolic cryptography to obtain decision procedures or sound proof methods for program equivalence, information flow, and uniformity. Finally, we evaluate our approach using examples drawn from provable security and from side-channel analysis - for the latter, we focus on the masking countermeasure against differential power analysis. A partial implementation of our approach is integrated in EasyCrypt, a proof assistant for provable security, and in MaskVerif, a fully automated prover for masked implementations.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于代码的游戏是一种流行的方法，用于证明密码构造的安全性和旁路对抗。该方法依赖于将密码证明视为关系程序验证的实例(在概率程序之间)，并将后者分解为一系列基本的关系程序验证步骤。在这篇论文中，我们发展了证明在有限域和相关代数结构上操作的概率程序的这些基本步骤的原理方法。我们关注三个基本属性:程序等价性、信息流和一致性。我们给出了这些性质的特征的基础上演绎和其他概念的符号密码学。我们使用(有时改进)来自符号密码术的工具来获得程序等价、信息流和一致性的决策过程或可靠的证明方法。最后，我们使用来自可证明安全性和旁道分析的例子来评估我们的方法——对于后者，我们集中于针对差分功耗分析的掩蔽对策。我们方法的部分实现集成在EasyCrypt(一个可证明安全性的证明助手)和MaskVerif(一个用于屏蔽实现的全自动证明器)中。
papers.title_zh: 计算密码学证明中的符号方法

papers.title: Formalizing Constructive Cryptography using CryptHOL
papers.authors: Andreas Lochbihler, S. Reza Sefidgar, David A. Basin, Ueli Maurer
papers.abstract: Computer-aided cryptography increases the rigour of cryptographic proofs by mechanizing their verification. Existing tools focus mainly on game-based proofs, and efforts to formalize composable frameworks such as Universal Composability have met with limited success. In this paper, we formalize an instance of Constructive Cryptography, a generic theory allowing for clean, composable cryptographic security statements. Namely, we extend CryptHOL, a framework for game-based proofs, with an abstract model of Random Systems and provide proof rules for their equality and composition. We formalize security as a special kind of system construction in which a complex system is built from simpler ones. As a simple case study, we formalize the construction of an information-theoretically secure channel from a key, a random function, and an insecure channel.
papers.abstract_zh: 计算机辅助密码术通过使密码验证机械化来增加密码证明的严格性。现有的工具主要关注基于游戏的证明，而形式化可组合框架(如通用可组合性)的努力只取得了有限的成功。在本文中，我们形式化了一个构造性加密的实例，这是一个允许清晰、可组合的加密安全声明的一般理论。也就是说，我们用随机系统的抽象模型扩展了CryptHOL，一个基于游戏的证明框架，并提供了它们的等式和合成的证明规则。我们将安全性形式化为一种特殊的系统结构，在这种结构中，一个复杂的系统是由简单的系统构建而成的。作为一个简单的案例研究，我们从一个密钥、一个随机函数和一个不安全的信道形式化地构造了一个信息理论上安全的信道。
papers.title_zh: 用CryptHOL形式化构造密码学

papers.title: EasyUC: Using EasyCrypt to Mechanize Proofs of Universally Composable Security
papers.authors: Ran Canetti, Alley Stoughton, Mayank Varia
papers.abstract: We present a methodology for using the EasyCrypt proof assistant (originally designed for mechanizing the generation of proofs of game-based security of cryptographic schemes and protocols) to mechanize proofs of security of cryptographic protocols within the universally composable (UC) security framework. This allows, for the first time, the mechanization and formal verification of the entire sequence of steps needed for proving simulation-based security in a modular way: * Specifying a protocol and the desired ideal functionality; * Constructing a simulator and demonstrating its validity, via reduction to hard computational problems; * Invoking the universal composition operation and demonstrating that it indeed preserves security. We demonstrate our methodology on a simple example: stating and proving the security of secure message communication via a one-time pad, where the key comes from a Diffie-Hellman key-exchange, assuming ideally authenticated communication. We first put together EasyCrypt-verified proofs that: (a) the Diffie-Hellman protocol UC-realizes an ideal key-exchange functionality, assuming hardness of the Decisional Diffie-Hellman problem, and (b) one-time-pad encryption, with a key obtained using ideal key-exchange, UC-realizes an ideal secure-communication functionality. We then mechanically combine the two proofs into an EasyCrypt-verified proof that the composed protocol realizes the same ideal secure-communication functionality. Although formulating a methodology that is both sound and workable has proven to be a complex task, we are hopeful that it will prove to be the basis for mechanized UC security analyses for significantly more complex protocols and tasks.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种使用EasyCrypt proof assistant(最初设计用于机械化加密方案和协议的基于游戏的安全性的证明的生成)来在通用可组合(UC)安全框架内机械化加密协议的安全性的证明的方法。这第一次允许以模块化的方式机械化和正式验证证明基于模拟的安全性所需的整个步骤序列:*指定协议和期望的理想功能；*构建一个模拟器，并通过简化为困难的计算问题来证明其有效性；*调用通用合成操作并证明它确实保护了安全性。我们用一个简单的例子来演示我们的方法:陈述和证明通过一次性密码本进行安全消息通信的安全性，其中密钥来自Diffie-Hellman密钥交换，假设通信是理想的认证通信。我们首先将EasyCrypt验证的证明放在一起:(a)Diffie-Hellman协议UC-实现了理想的密钥交换功能，假设判定Diffie-Hellman问题是困难的，以及(b)一次一密加密，使用理想的密钥交换获得密钥，UC-实现了理想的安全通信功能。然后，我们将这两个证明机械地组合成一个EasyCrypt验证的证明，证明组合的协议实现了相同的理想安全通信功能。虽然制定一个既合理又可行的方法已被证明是一项复杂的任务，但我们希望它将被证明是对复杂得多的协议和任务进行机械化统一通信安全分析的基础。
papers.title_zh: EasyUC:使用EasyCrypt实现通用可组合安全性的机械化证明

papers.title: On the Meaning and Purpose of Attack Trees
papers.authors: Heiko Mantel, Christian W. Probst
papers.abstract: Attack trees are a popular notation for describing threats to systems, both in academia and industry. Originally, attack trees lacked a formal semantics, but formal semantics for different variants of attack trees were proposed later. These semantics focus on the attacker^{\prime}s actions defined in the leaves and the logical structure defined by the inner nodes of an attack tree. Surprisingly, they do not clarify the connection to the goal defined at the root node in a satisfactory fashion. In this article, we aim at a better clarification of this connection between the attacks and the attacker goal specified by an attack tree. We argue that there are multiple sensible success criteria for attacks wrt. a given attacker goal and develop a framework for defining such criteria. We exploit our framework to identify similarities and differences between automatic attack-tree generation techniques. Finally, we propose a novel variant of attack trees that allows one to express exploits in an explicit fashion.
papers.abstract_zh: 攻击树是学术界和工业界描述系统威胁的流行符号。最初，攻击树缺乏形式语义，但是后来针对攻击树的不同变体提出了形式语义。这些语义集中在树叶中定义的attacker^{\prime}s动作和攻击树内部节点定义的逻辑结构上。令人惊讶的是，它们没有以令人满意的方式阐明在根节点定义的目标的联系。在本文中，我们旨在更好地阐明攻击和攻击树指定的攻击者目标之间的联系。我们认为，对于wrt攻击，有多种合理的成功标准。一个给定的攻击者目标，并开发一个框架来定义这样的标准。我们利用我们的框架来识别自动攻击树生成技术之间的相似性和差异。最后，我们提出了一种新的攻击树变体，它允许人们以一种显式的方式来表达攻击。
papers.title_zh: 攻击树的意义和目的

papers.title: Efficient Attack-Defense Tree Analysis using Pareto Attribute Domains
papers.authors: Barbara Fila, Wojciech Widel
papers.abstract: The cheapest attacks are often time-consuming, and those requiring high level of technical skills might occur rarely but result in disastrous consequences. Therefore, analysis focusing on a single parameter at a time, e.g., only cost or time, is insufficient for the successful selection of the appropriate measures increasing system^{\prime}s security. In practice, security engineers are thus confronted with the problem of multi-parameter analysis. The objective of this work is to address this problem and propose a sound, general framework for multi-parameter analysis of security. In order to ensure the usability of our solution for real-life applications, our proposal relies on the attack– defense tree model that security experts from industry are already familiar with. We present mathematical foundations of our framework and characterize the class of parameters it is suitable for. We identify conditions under which the proposed method applies to attack–defense trees where several nodes represent the same action. We discuss the complexity of our approach and implement the underlying algorithms in a proof of concept tool. We analyze its performance on a number of trees of varying complexity, and validate our proposal on a case study borrowed from industry.
papers.abstract_zh: 最便宜的攻击通常很耗时，那些需要高水平技术技能的攻击可能很少发生，但会导致灾难性的后果。因此，一次只关注单个参数的分析(例如，只关注成本或时间)不足以成功选择提高system^{\prime}s安全性的适当措施。在实践中，安全工程师面临着多参数分析的问题。这项工作的目标是解决这一问题，并提出一个健全的，通用的多参数安全分析框架。为了确保我们的解决方案在实际应用中的可用性，我们的提案依赖于行业安全专家已经熟悉的攻防树模型。我们提出了我们的框架的数学基础，并表征了它适合的参数类。我们确定的条件下，提出的方法适用于攻击-防御树，其中几个节点代表相同的行动。我们讨论了我们方法的复杂性，并在一个概念验证工具中实现了底层算法。我们在许多不同复杂度的树上分析了它的性能，并在一个从工业界借来的案例研究上验证了我们的建议。
papers.title_zh: 利用Pareto属性域的高效攻防树分析

papers.title: Games for Security Under Adaptive Adversaries
papers.authors: Timos Antonopoulos, Tachio Terauchi
papers.abstract: This work explores methods for proving and disproving security of systems under adaptive adversaries. Adaptive adversaries are ones which make their next move based on the previous observations. Our first contribution is a new game based characterization of security. We show that the game accurately captures security of deterministic and probabilistic systems against adaptive (probabilistic) adversaries. In addition, we build on top of the game characterization and present techniques that expedite proving the existence of attacker and defender strategies, and consequently proving security or vulnerability of systems. The first is what we call attack (and defense) slopes which give simple sufficient criteria for existence of winning strategies (for attacker and defender). The second is reductions of one game to another achieved by mapping a strategy of one to that of the other. We show that such reductions can prove or disprove security by reducing from a game of a secure system or reducing to that of a non-secure system.
papers.abstract_zh: 这项工作探索了在适应性对手下证明和反证系统安全性的方法。适应性对手是那些根据之前的观察做出下一步行动的对手。我们的第一个贡献是一个新的基于游戏的安全特性。我们证明了该游戏准确地捕捉了确定性和概率性系统对抗适应性(概率性)对手的安全性。此外，我们建立在游戏特性的基础上，并提出加速证明攻击者和防御者策略的存在的技术，从而证明系统的安全性或脆弱性。第一个是我们称之为攻击(和防御)斜率，它给出了存在获胜策略的简单充分的标准(对于攻击者和防御者)。第二个是通过将一个游戏的策略映射到另一个游戏的策略来实现一个游戏到另一个游戏的简化。我们证明了这种归约可以通过从安全系统的博弈归约或归约到非安全系统的博弈来证明或否定安全性。
papers.title_zh: 适应性对手下的安全博弈

papers.title: Information-Flow Preservation in Compiler Optimisations
papers.authors: Frédéric Besson, Alexandre Dang, Thomas P. Jensen
papers.abstract: Correct compilers perform program transformations preserving input/output behaviours of programs. Yet, correctness does not prevent program optimisations from introducing information-flow leaks that would make the target program more vulnerable to side-channel attacks than the source program. To tackle this problem, we propose a notion of Information-Flow Preserving (IFP) program transformation which ensures that a target program is no more vulnerable to passive side-channel attacks than a source program. To protect against a wide range of attacks, we model an attacker who is granted arbitrary memory accesses for a pre-defined set of observation points. We propose a compositional proof principle for proving that a transformation is IFP. Using this principle, we show how a translation validation technique can be used to automatically verify and even close information-flow leaks introduced by standard compiler passes such as dead-store elimination and register allocation. The technique has been experimentally validated on the CompCert C compiler.
papers.abstract_zh: 正确的编译器执行程序转换，保持程序的输入/输出行为。然而，正确性并不能防止程序优化引入信息流泄漏，这将使目标程序比源程序更容易受到旁路攻击。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了信息流保持(IFP)程序转换的概念，它确保目标程序不会比源程序更容易受到被动旁路攻击。为了防范各种各样的攻击，我们模拟了一个攻击者，他被授权对一组预定义的观察点进行任意的内存访问。我们提出了一个合成证明原理来证明一个变换是IFP。利用这一原理，我们展示了如何使用翻译验证技术来自动验证甚至关闭由标准编译器通道(如死存储消除和寄存器分配)引入的信息流泄漏。该技术已经在CompCert C编译器上通过了实验验证。
papers.title_zh: 编译器优化中的信息流保持

papers.title: Temporal Safety for Stack Allocated Memory on Capability Machines
papers.authors: Stelios Tsampas, Dominique Devriese, Frank Piessens
papers.abstract: Memory capabilities as supported in capability machines are very similar to fat pointers, and hence are very useful for the efficient enforcement of spatial memory safety. Enforcing temporal memory safety however, is more challenging. This paper investigates an approach to enforce temporal memory safety for stack-allocated memory in C-like languages by extending capabilities with a simple dynamic mechanism. This mechanism ensures that capabilities with a certain lifetime can only be stored in memory that has a longer lifetime. Our mechanism prevents temporal memory safety violations, yet is sufficiently permissive to allow typical C coding idioms where addresses of local variables are passed up the call stack. We formalize the desired behavior of a simple C-like language as a dependently typed operational semantics, and we show that existing compilers to capability machines do not simulate this desired behavior: they either have to break temporal safety, or they have to defensively rule out allowed behaviors. Finally, we show that with our proposed dynamic mechanism, our compiler is fully abstract.
papers.abstract_zh: 能力机器中支持的存储器能力非常类似于胖指针，因此对于空间存储器安全的有效实施非常有用。然而，实施时间记忆安全更具挑战性。本文研究了一种通过简单的动态机制扩展能力来加强类C语言中堆栈分配内存的临时内存安全的方法。这种机制确保了具有特定生存期的功能只能存储在具有更长生存期的内存中。我们的机制防止了违反临时内存安全的行为，但也足够允许典型的C编码习惯用法，其中局部变量的地址在调用堆栈中向上传递。我们将一个简单的类C语言的期望行为形式化为一个依赖类型的操作语义，并且我们表明现有的能力机器编译器并不模拟这种期望的行为:它们要么必须打破时间安全性，要么必须防御性地排除允许的行为。最后，我们展示了使用我们提出的动态机制，我们的编译器是完全抽象的。
papers.title_zh: 能力机器上堆栈分配内存的时间安全性

papers.title: Journey Beyond Full Abstraction: Exploring Robust Property Preservation for Secure Compilation
papers.authors: Carmine Abate, Roberto Blanco, Deepak Garg, Catalin Hritcu, Marco Patrignani, Jérémy Thibault
papers.abstract: Good programming languages provide helpful abstractions for writing secure code, but the security properties of the source language are generally not preserved when compiling a program and linking it with adversarial code in a low-level target language (e.g., a library or a legacy application). Linked target code that is compromised or malicious may, for instance, read and write the compiled program^{\prime}s data and code, jump to arbitrary memory locations, or smash the stack, blatantly violating any source-level abstraction. By contrast, a fully abstract compilation chain protects source-level abstractions all the way down, ensuring that linked adversarial target code cannot observe more about the compiled program than what some linked source code could about the source program. However, while research in this area has so far focused on preserving observational equivalence, as needed for achieving full abstraction, there is a much larger space of security properties one can choose to preserve against linked adversarial code. And the precise class of security properties one chooses crucially impacts not only the supported security goals and the strength of the attacker model, but also the kind of protections a secure compilation chain has to introduce. We are the first to thoroughly explore a large space of formal secure compilation criteria based on robust property preservation, i.e., the preservation of properties satisfied against arbitrary adversarial contexts. We study robustly preserving various classes of trace properties such as safety, of hyperproperties such as noninterference, and of relational hyperproperties such as trace equivalence. This leads to many new secure compilation criteria, some of which are easier to practically achieve and prove than full abstraction, and some of which provide strictly stronger security guarantees. For each of the studied criteria we propose an equivalent "property-free" characterization that clarifies which proof techniques apply. For relational properties and hyperproperties, which relate the behaviors of multiple programs, our formal definitions of the property classes themselves are novel. We order our criteria by their relative strength and show several collapses and separation results. Finally, we adapt existing proof techniques to show that even the strongest of our secure compilation criteria, the robust preservation of all relational hyperproperties, is achievable for a simple translation from a statically typed to a dynamically typed language.
papers.abstract_zh: 好的编程语言为编写安全代码提供了有用的抽象，但是当编译程序并将其与低级目标语言(例如，库或遗留应用程序)中的敌对代码链接时，源语言的安全属性通常不会被保留。例如，被损害的或恶意的链接目标代码可以读写编译的program^{\prime}s数据和代码，跳转到任意存储器位置，或破坏堆栈，公然违反任何源代码级抽象。相比之下，完全抽象的编译链自始至终保护源代码级的抽象，确保链接的对立目标代码不会比某些链接的源代码更多地观察到编译后的程序。然而，虽然该领域的研究迄今为止集中在保持观察等价上，这是实现完全抽象所需要的，但是人们可以选择更大的安全属性空间来防止链接的对抗代码。人们选择的安全属性的确切类别不仅会严重影响所支持的安全目标和攻击者模型的强度，还会影响安全编译链必须引入的保护类型。我们是第一个彻底探索一个大空间的正式安全编译标准的基础上稳健的属性保存，即保存的性质满足对任意敌对的背景。我们研究稳健地保持各种类型的迹属性，如安全性，超属性，如不干扰，以及关系超属性，如迹等价。这导致了许多新的安全编译标准，其中一些标准比完全抽象更容易实现和证明，其中一些标准提供了更强的安全保证。对于每一个被研究的标准，我们提出了一个等价的“无属性”的特征，阐明了哪些证明技术适用。对于将多个程序的行为联系起来的关系属性和超属性，我们对属性类本身的正式定义是新颖的。我们根据它们的相对强度对我们的标准进行排序，并显示几个折叠和分离结果。最后，我们采用现有的证明技术来表明，即使是我们最强的安全编译标准，所有关系超属性的健壮保持，对于从静态类型语言到动态类型语言的简单转换也是可以实现的。
papers.title_zh: 超越完全抽象的旅程:探索安全编译的健壮属性保持

papers.title: Using Information Flow to Design an ISA that Controls Timing Channels
papers.authors: Drew Zagieboylo, G. Edward Suh, Andrew C. Myers
papers.abstract: Information-flow control (IFC) enforcing languages can provide high assurance that software does not leak information or allow an attacker to influence critical systems. IFC hardware description languages have also been used to design secure circuits that eliminate timing channels. However, there remains a gap between IFC hardware and software; these two components are built independently with no abstraction for how to compose their security guarantees. This paper presents a proposal for an instruction set architecture (ISA) that can provide the appropriate abstraction for joining hardware and software IFC mechanisms. Our ISA describes a RISC-V processor that tracks information-flow labels at run time and uses these labels to eliminate or mitigate timing channels. To make the ISA more practical, it allows constrained downgrading of information; it permits trading off security for performance; and still offers control primitives such as system calls. We prove timing-sensitive noninterference modulo downgrading and nonmalleability for programs executing our ISA. This involves novel restrictions on the mutability of labels beyond previous dynamic IFC systems. Furthermore, we define specific security conditions which correct hardware can implement to provide software-level security and sketch how such hardware may be designed and verified.
papers.abstract_zh: 信息流控制(IFC)强制语言可以高度保证软件不会泄漏信息或允许攻击者影响关键系统。IFC硬件描述语言也被用于设计消除定时通道的安全电路。然而，国际金融公司的硬件和软件之间仍然存在差距；这两个组件是独立构建的，没有抽象出如何组合它们的安全保证。本文提出了一个指令集架构(ISA)的建议，它可以为连接硬件和软件IFC机制提供适当的抽象。我们的ISA描述了一个RISC-V处理器，它在运行时跟踪信息流标签，并使用这些标签来消除或减轻定时通道。为了使ISA更加实用，它允许信息的约束降级；它允许用安全性换取性能；并且仍然提供诸如系统调用之类的控制原语。我们证明了执行我们的ISA的程序的时间敏感无干扰模降级和不可移植性。这包括对标签可变性的新限制，超越了以前的动态IFC系统。此外，我们定义了正确的硬件可以实现的特定安全条件，以提供软件级的安全性，并概述了如何设计和验证这样的硬件。
papers.title_zh: 利用信息流设计控制定时通道的ISA

papers.title: A Formal Approach to Secure Speculation
papers.authors: Kevin Cheang, Cameron Rasmussen, Sanjit A. Seshia, Pramod Subramanyan
papers.abstract: Transient execution attacks like Spectre, Meltdown and Foreshadow have shown that combinations of microarchitectural side-channels can be synergistically exploited to create side-channel leaks that are greater than the sum of their parts. While both hardware and software mitigations have been proposed against these attacks, provable security has remained elusive. This paper introduces a formal methodology for enabling secure speculative execution on modern processors. We propose a new class of information flow security properties called trace property-dependent observational determinism (TPOD). We use this class to formulate a secure speculation property. Our formulation precisely characterises all transient execution vulnerabilities. We demonstrate its applicability by verifying secure speculation for several illustrative programs.
papers.abstract_zh: 像Spectre、Meltdown和forbesode这样的瞬时执行攻击已经表明，微体系结构侧通道的组合可以被协同利用来创建侧通道泄漏，其大于其部件的总和。虽然针对这些攻击已经提出了硬件和软件缓解措施，但是可证明的安全性仍然难以捉摸。本文介绍了一种在现代处理器上实现安全推测执行的形式化方法。我们提出了一类新的信息流安全属性，称为依赖跟踪属性的观察确定性(TPOD)。我们使用这个类来构造一个安全的投机属性。我们的公式精确地描述了所有瞬时执行漏洞的特征。我们通过验证几个说明性程序的安全推测来证明它的适用性。
papers.title_zh: 一种安全推测的形式化方法

papers.title: Information Flow Control for Distributed Trusted Execution Environments
papers.authors: Anitha Gollamudi, Stephen Chong, Owen Arden
papers.abstract: Distributed applications cannot assume that their security policies will be enforced on untrusted hosts. Trusted execution environments (TEEs) combined with cryptographic mechanisms enable execution of known code on an untrusted host and the exchange of confidential and authenticated messages with it. TEEs do not, however, establish the trustworthiness of code executing in a TEE. Thus, developing secure applications using TEEs requires specialized expertise and careful auditing. This paper presents DFLATE, a core security calculus for distributed applications with TEEs. DFLATE offers high-level abstractions that reflect both the guarantees and limitations of the underlying security mechanisms they are based on. The accuracy of these abstractions is exhibited by asymmetry between confidentiality and integrity in our formal results: DFLATE enforces a strong form of noninterference for confidentiality, but only a weak form for integrity. This reflects the asymmetry of the security guarantees of a TEE: a malicious host cannot access secrets in the TEE or modify its contents, but they can suppress or manipulate the sequence of its inputs and outputs. Therefore DFLATE cannot protect against the suppression of high-integrity messages, but when these messages are delivered, their contents cannot have been influenced by an attacker.
papers.abstract_zh: 分布式应用程序不能假定它们的安全策略会在不受信任的主机上实施。与加密机制相结合的可信执行环境(TEEs)支持在不受信任的主机上执行已知代码，并与其交换机密和经过身份验证的消息。然而，TEE不建立在TEE中执行的代码的可信度。因此，使用TEEs开发安全的应用程序需要专业知识和仔细的审核。本文提出了一种面向分布式应用的核心安全演算DFLATE。DFLATE提供了高级抽象，反映了它们所基于的底层安全机制的保证和限制。在我们的正式结果中，机密性和完整性之间的不对称展示了这些抽象的准确性:DFLATE对机密性实施了强形式的不干涉，但对完整性仅实施了弱形式的不干涉。这反映了TEE的安全保证的不对称性:恶意主机不能访问TEE中的秘密或修改其内容，但他们可以抑制或操纵其输入和输出的序列。因此，DFLATE不能防止高完整性消息被抑制，但是当这些消息被传递时，它们的内容不可能受到攻击者的影响。
papers.title_zh: 分布式可信执行环境的信息流控制

papers.title: Securing Cross-App Interactions in IoT Platforms
papers.authors: Musard Balliu, Massimo Merro, Michele Pasqua
papers.abstract: IoT platforms enable users to connect various smart devices and online services via reactive apps running on the cloud. These apps, often developed by third-parties, perform simple computations on data triggered by external information sources and actuate the results of computation on external information sinks. Recent research shows that unintended or malicious interactions between the different (even benign) apps of a user can cause severe security and safety risks. These works leverage program analysis techniques to build tools for unveiling unexpected interference across apps for specific use cases. Despite these initial efforts, we are still lacking a semantic framework for understanding interactions between IoT apps. The question of what security policy cross-app interference embodies remains largely unexplored. This paper proposes a semantic framework capturing the essence of cross-app interactions in IoT platforms. The framework generalizes and connects syntactic enforcement mechanisms to bisimulation-based notions of security, thus providing a baseline for formulating soundness criteria of these enforcement mechanisms. Specifically, we present a calculus that models the behavioral semantics of a system of apps executing concurrently, and use it to define desirable semantic policies in the security and safety context of IoT apps. To demonstrate the usefulness of our framework, we define static mechanisms for enforcing cross-app security and safety, and prove them sound with respect to our semantic conditions. Finally, we leverage real-world apps to validate the practical benefits of our policy framework.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网平台使用户能够通过运行在云上的反应式应用程序连接各种智能设备和在线服务。这些应用通常由第三方开发，对外部信息源触发的数据执行简单计算，并在外部信息接收器上驱动计算结果。最近的研究表明，用户的不同(甚至良性)应用程序之间的无意或恶意交互可能会导致严重的安全风险。这些工作利用程序分析技术来构建工具，以揭示特定用例中跨应用程序的意外干扰。尽管有这些初步的努力，我们仍然缺乏理解物联网应用程序之间交互的语义框架。跨应用程序干扰体现了什么样的安全策略，这个问题在很大程度上仍未被探究。本文提出了一个语义框架来捕捉物联网平台中跨应用交互的本质。该框架将句法执行机制概括并连接到基于互模拟的安全概念，从而为制定这些执行机制的可靠性标准提供了基线。具体而言，我们提出了一种演算，该演算对并发执行的应用系统的行为语义进行建模，并使用它来定义物联网应用的安全性和安全上下文中的理想语义策略。为了证明我们的框架的有用性，我们定义了用于加强跨应用程序安全性的静态机制，并证明它们在我们的语义条件方面是合理的。最后，我们利用真实世界的应用程序来验证我们的策略框架的实际优势。
papers.title_zh: 保护物联网平台中的跨应用交互

papers.title: Static Enforcement of Security in Runtime Systems
papers.authors: Mathias Vorreiter Pedersen, Aslan Askarov
papers.abstract: Underneath every modern programming language is a runtime environment (RTE) that handles features such as automatic memory management and thread scheduling. In the information-flow control (IFC) literature, the RTE is often part of the trusted computing base (TCB), and there has been little focus on applying IFC to the implementation of the RTE itself. In this paper we address this problem by designing an IFC language, Zee, for implementing secure RTEs, thereby removing the RTE from the TCB. We implement Zee and design and implement secure versions of garbage collectors and thread schedulers using Zee. We also prove that a faithful calculus of Zee satisfies a strong variant of timing-sensitive noninterference.
papers.abstract_zh: 在每一种现代编程语言的基础上，都有一个运行时环境(RTE ),可以处理诸如自动内存管理和线程调度等功能。在信息流控制(IFC)文献中，RTE通常是可信计算基础(TCB)的一部分，很少关注将IFC应用于RTE本身的实现。在本文中，我们通过设计一种IFC语言Zee来解决这个问题，该语言用于实现安全RTE，从而从TCB中移除RTE。我们实现了Zee，并使用Zee设计和实现了垃圾收集器和线程调度器的安全版本。我们还证明了Zee的忠实演算满足时间敏感不干扰的一个强变体。
papers.title_zh: 运行时系统中安全的静态实施

papers.title: Beyond Labels: Permissiveness for Dynamic Information Flow Enforcement
papers.authors: Elisavet Kozyri, Fred B. Schneider, Andrew Bedford, Josée Desharnais, Nadia Tawbi
papers.abstract: Flow-sensitive labels used by dynamic enforcement mechanisms might themselves encode sensitive information, which can leak. Metalabels, employed to represent the sensitivity of labels, exhibit the same problem. This paper derives a new family of enforcers—k-Enf, for 2 ≤ k ≤ ∞—that uses label chains, where each label defines the sensitivity of its predecessor. These enforcers satisfy Block-safe Noninterference (BNI), which proscribes leaks from observing variables, label chains, and blocked executions. Theorems in this paper characterize where longer label chains can improve the permissiveness of dynamic enforcement mechanisms that satisfy BNI. These theorems depend on semantic attributes—k-precise, k-varying, and k-dependent—of such mechanisms, as well as on initialization, threat model, and lattice size.
papers.abstract_zh: 动态执行机制使用的流敏感标签本身可能会编码敏感信息，这些信息可能会泄漏。用于表示标记敏感度的金属标记也存在同样的问题。本文推导了一个新的使用标签链的实施器家族——k-Enf，其中2≤k≤∞—其中每个标签定义其前一个标签的敏感度。这些实施器满足块安全无干扰(BNI)的要求，它禁止从观察变量、标签链和阻塞执行中泄漏。本文中的定理描述了较长的标签链可以提高满足BNI的动态执行机制的允许性。这些定理依赖于这种机制的语义属性——k精确、k变化和k相关——以及初始化、威胁模型和网格大小。
papers.title_zh: 超越标签:动态信息流实施的允许性

papers.title: BeleniosVS: Secrecy and Verifiability Against a Corrupted Voting Device
papers.authors: Véronique Cortier, Alicia Filipiak, Joseph Lallemand
papers.abstract: Electronic voting systems aim at two conflicting properties, namely privacy and verifiability, while trying to minimise the trust assumptions on the various voting components. Most existing voting systems either assume trust in the voting device or in the voting server. We propose a novel remote voting scheme BeleniosVS that achieves both privacy and verifiability against a dishonest voting server as well as a dishonest voting device. In particular, a voter does not leak her vote to her voting device and she can check that her ballot on the bulletin board does correspond to her intended vote. More specifically, we assume two elections authorities: the voting server and a registrar that acts only during the setup. Then BeleniosVS guarantees both privacy and verifiability against a dishonest voting device, provided that not both election authorities are corrupted. Additionally, our scheme guarantees receipt-freeness against an external adversary. We provide a formal proof of privacy, receipt-freeness, and verifiability using the tool ProVerif, covering a hundred cases of threat scenarios. Proving verifiability required to develop a set of sufficient conditions, that can be handled by ProVerif. This contribution is of independent interest.
papers.abstract_zh: 电子投票系统的目标是两个相互冲突的属性，即隐私和可验证性，同时试图最小化对各种投票组件的信任假设。大多数现有的投票系统要么假设信任投票设备，要么信任投票服务器。我们提出了一个新的远程投票方案BeleniosVS，该方案针对不诚实的投票服务器和不诚实的投票设备实现了保密性和可验证性。特别地，投票人不会将她的投票泄露给她的投票设备，并且她可以检查她在公告牌上的投票确实对应于她想要的投票。更具体地说，我们假设有两个选举机构:投票服务器和仅在设置过程中起作用的注册器。如果两个选举机构都没有腐败，那么BeleniosVS可以保证隐私和可验证性，防止不诚实的投票设备。此外，我们的方案保证了抵抗外部对手的无收据性。我们使用工具ProVerif提供了隐私性、无收据性和可验证性的正式证明，涵盖了一百种威胁场景。证明可验证性需要开发一组充分的条件，这可以由ProVerif来处理。这一贡献是独立的利益。
papers.title_zh: 针对腐败投票设备的保密性和可验证性

papers.title: Resource-Bounded Intruders in Denial of Service Attacks
papers.authors: Abraão Aires Urquiza, Musab A. AlTurki, Max I. Kanovich, Tajana Ban Kirigin, Vivek Nigam, Andre Scedrov, Carolyn L. Talcott
papers.abstract: Denial of Service (DoS) attacks have been a serious security concern, as no service is, in principle, protected against them. Although a Dolev-Yao intruder with unlimited resources can trivially render any service unavailable, DoS attacks do not necessarily have to be carried out by such (extremely) powerful intruders. It is useful in practice and more challenging for formal protocol verification to determine whether a service is vulnerable even to resource-bounded intruders that cannot generate or intercept arbitrary large volumes of traffic. This paper proposes a novel, more refined intruder model where the intruder can only consume at most some specified amount of resources in any given time window. Additionally, we propose protocol theories that may contain timeouts and specify service resource usage during protocol execution. In contrast to the existing resource-conscious protocol verification models, our model allows finer and more subtle analysis of DoS problems. We illustrate the power of our approach by representing a number of classes of DoS attacks, such as, Slow, Asymmetric and Amplification DoS attacks, exhausting different types of resources of the target, such as, number of workers, processing power, memory, and network bandwidth. We show that the proposed DoS problem is undecidable in general and is PSPACE-complete for the class of resource-bounded, balanced systems. Finally, we implemented our formal verification model in the rewriting logic tool Maude and analyzed a number of DoS attacks in Maude using Rewriting Modulo SMT in an automated fashion.
papers.abstract_zh: 拒绝服务(DoS)攻击已经成为一个严重的安全问题，因为原则上没有任何服务可以抵御这种攻击。尽管拥有无限资源的Dolev-Yao入侵者可以轻而易举地使任何服务不可用，但DoS攻击不一定必须由这种(极其)强大的入侵者来执行。这在实践中很有用，但对于正式的协议验证来说更具挑战性，以确定服务是否易受资源受限的入侵者的攻击，这些入侵者不能生成或拦截任意大容量的流量。本文提出了一种新的、更精确的入侵者模型，在该模型中，入侵者在任何给定的时间窗口内最多只能消耗指定数量的资源。此外，我们提出的协议理论可能包含超时，并指定协议执行期间的服务资源使用。与现有的资源感知协议验证模型相比，我们的模型允许对DoS问题进行更精细和更微妙的分析。我们通过表示多种类型的DoS攻击，例如慢速、不对称和放大DoS攻击，耗尽目标的不同类型的资源，例如工作者的数量、处理能力、存储器和网络带宽，来说明我们的方法的能力。我们证明了所提出的DoS问题在一般情况下是不可判定的，并且对于一类资源受限的平衡系统是PSPACE-完全的。最后，我们在重写逻辑工具Maude中实现了我们的形式化验证模型，并以自动化的方式使用重写模SMT分析了Maude中的一些DoS攻击。
papers.title_zh: 拒绝服务攻击中的资源受限入侵者

papers.title: Automated Verification of Accountability in Security Protocols
papers.authors: Robert Künnemann, Ilkan Esiyok, Michael Backes
papers.abstract: Accountability is a recent paradigm in security protocol design which aims to eliminate traditional trust assumptions on parties and hold them accountable for their misbehavior. It is meant to establish trust in the first place and to recognize and react if this trust is violated. In this work, we discuss a protocol-agnostic definition of accountability: a protocol provides accountability (w.r.t. some security property) if it can identify all misbehaving parties, where misbehavior is defined as a deviation from the protocol that causes a security violation. We provide a mechanized method for the verification of accountability and demonstrate its use for verification and attack finding on various examples from the accountability and causality literature, including Certificate Transparency and Kroll^{\prime}s Accountable Algorithms protocol. We reach a high degree of automation by expressing accountability in terms of a set of trace properties and show their soundness and completeness.
papers.abstract_zh: 问责制是安全协议设计中的一个新范式，旨在消除对各方的传统信任假设，并让他们对自己的不当行为负责。这意味着首先要建立信任，并在这种信任遭到破坏时进行识别和反应。在这篇文章中，我们讨论了一个与协议无关的责任定义:如果一个协议能够识别所有行为不当的一方，它就提供了责任(w.r.t .一些安全属性),其中行为不当被定义为对协议的偏离，导致了安全违规。我们提供了一种验证可问责性的机械化方法，并展示了它在可问责性和因果关系文献的各种例子上的验证和攻击发现的用途，包括证书透明性和Kroll^{\prime}s可问责算法协议。我们通过用一组跟踪属性来表达责任，并显示它们的合理性和完整性，达到了高度的自动化。
papers.title_zh: 安全协议中责任的自动验证

papers.title: Quantifying Information Flow in Interactive Systems
papers.authors: David Mestel
papers.abstract: We consider the problem of quantifying information flow in interactive systems, modelled as finite-state transducers in the style of Goguen and Meseguer. Our main result is that if the system is deterministic then the information flow is either logarithmic or linear, and there is a polynomial-time algorithm to distinguish the two cases and compute the rate of logarithmic flow.
