Our model includes a resource-bounded timing adversary who strives to maximize the probability of key recovery, and a defender who strives to reduce the cost while maintaining a certain degree of security. We obtain the optimal protection as an equilibrium in a game between the defender and the adversary. At the heart of the equilibrium computation are novel bounds for the probability of key recovery, which are expressed as a function of the applied protection and the attack strategy of a timing adversary. We put our techniques to work in a case study in which we identify optimal protections for libgcrypt's ElGamal implementation. We determine situations in which the optimal choice is to use a defensive, constant-time implementation and a small key, and situations in which the optimal choice is a more aggressively tuned (but leaky) implementation with a longer key.
papers.abstract_zh: 定时攻击可以有效地从密码系统中恢复密钥。虽然使用恒定时间实现可以击败它们，但是这种防御方法是以性能损失为代价的。因此，人们面临着在性能和安全性之间取得平衡以防止计时攻击的问题。本文以基于离散对数的密码系统为例，提出了一种确定抵抗计时攻击的最优保护的系统方法。我们的模型包括一个资源受限的定时敌手和一个防御者，前者努力使密钥恢复的概率最大化，后者努力降低成本，同时保持一定程度的安全性。我们在防守者和对手的博弈中获得了均衡的最优保护。平衡计算的核心是密钥恢复概率的新界限，它被表示为所应用的保护和定时对手的攻击策略的函数。我们在一个案例研究中使用了我们的技术，在这个案例研究中，我们为libgcrypt的ElGamal实现确定了最佳保护。我们确定了最佳选择是使用防御性的恒定时间实现和小密钥的情况，以及最佳选择是使用更长密钥的更积极调整(但有漏洞)的实现的情况。
papers.title_zh: 针对计时攻击的合理保护

papers.title: Understanding and Enforcing Opacity
papers.authors: Daniel Schoepe, Andrei Sabelfeld
papers.abstract: This paper puts a spotlight on the specification and enforcement of opacity, a security policy for protecting sensitive properties of system behavior. We illustrate the fine granularity of the opacity policy by location privacy and privacy-preserving aggregation scenarios. We present a general framework for opacity and explore its key differences and formal connections with such well-known information-flow models as non-interference, knowledge-based security, and declassification. Our results are machine-checked and parameterized in the observational power of the attacker, including progress-insensitive, progress-sensitive, and timing-sensitive attackers. We present two approaches to enforcing opacity: a whitebox monitor and a blackbox sampling-based enforcement. We report on experiments with prototypes that utilize state-of-the-art Satisfiability Modulo Theories (SMT) solvers and the random testing tool QuickCheck to establish opacity for the location and aggregation-based scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文将重点放在不透明性的规范和实施上，不透明性是一种用于保护系统行为的敏感属性的安全策略。我们通过位置隐私和隐私保护聚合场景来说明不透明策略的细粒度。我们提出了一个不透明性的一般框架，并探讨了它与诸如不干涉、基于知识的安全和解密等众所周知的信息流模型的主要区别和正式联系。我们的结果是机器检查和参数化的攻击者的观察能力，包括进展不敏感，进展敏感，和时间敏感的攻击者。我们提出了两种增强不透明度的方法:白盒监视器和基于黑盒采样的增强。我们报告了利用最先进的可满足性模理论(SMT)解算器和随机测试工具QuickCheck为基于位置和聚集的场景建立不透明性的原型实验。
papers.title_zh: 理解和实施不透明性

papers.title: A Methodology for Information Flow Experiments
papers.authors: Michael Carl Tschantz, Amit Datta, Anupam Datta, Jeannette M. Wing
papers.abstract: Information flow analysis has largely focused on methods that require access to the program in question or total control over an analyzed system. We consider the case where the analyst has neither control over nor a white-box model of the analyzed system. We formalize such limited information flow analyses and study an instance of it: detecting the usage of data by websites. We reduce these problems to ones of causal inference by proving a connection between non-interference and causation. Leveraging this connection, we provide a systematic black-box methodology based on experimental science and statistical analysis. Our systematic study leads to practical advice for detecting web data usage, a previously normalized area. We illustrate these concepts with a series of experiments collecting data on the use of information by websites.
papers.abstract_zh: 信息流分析在很大程度上集中在需要访问正在讨论的程序或完全控制被分析系统的方法上。我们考虑这样一种情况，分析师既不能控制也没有被分析系统的白盒模型。我们形式化了这种有限的信息流分析，并研究了它的一个实例:检测网站对数据的使用。通过证明不干涉和因果关系之间的联系，我们把这些问题归结为因果推理的问题。利用这种联系，我们提供了基于实验科学和统计分析的系统黑盒方法。我们的系统研究为检测网络数据使用提供了实用的建议，这是一个以前标准化的领域。我们用一系列收集网站信息使用数据的实验来说明这些概念。
papers.title_zh: 信息流实验的方法论

papers.title: Flow-Limited Authorization
papers.authors: Owen Arden, Jed Liu, Andrew C. Myers
papers.abstract: Applications that handle sensitive information need to express and reason about the trust relationships between security principals. Such reasoning is difficult because the trust relationships are dynamic, and must thus be reasoned about at runtime when discovering and reasoning about trust relationships might inadvertently reveal confidential information and be subject to manipulation by untrusted principals. The Flow-Limited Authorization Model (FLAM) by Arden et al. exactly meets these needs. However, previous attempts to use FLAM in a programming language have not reaped the full benefits of the model. We present Flamio, an instantiation of FLAM in a language with coarse-grained dynamic information-flow control (IFC) which naturally lends itself to dynamic enforcement techniques. In our implementation of Flamio, the FLAM proof search rules for deriving trust relationships are implemented as regular Flamio computations: the IFC requirements for FLAM proof rules are a natural fit with coarse-grained information-flow mechanisms. Flamio even supports remote procedure calls, and thus seamlessly supports FLAM's distributed proof search. We have implemented Flamio as a Haskell library, and proved that a calculus based on Flamio enforces a noninterference-based security guarantee. We have implemented several case studies, demonstrating the expressiveness and usefulness of Flamio in distributed settings, as well as our novel approach to control label creep during proof search.
papers.abstract_zh: 处理敏感信息的应用程序需要表达和推理安全主体之间的信任关系。这种推理是困难的，因为信任关系是动态的，因此当发现和推理信任关系可能无意中泄露机密信息并受到不可信主体的操纵时，必须在运行时对其进行推理。Arden等人提出的流量受限授权模型(FLAM)正好满足了这些需求。然而，以前在编程语言中使用FLAM的尝试并没有获得该模型的全部好处。我们提出了Flamio，它是FLAM在一种具有粗粒度动态信息流控制(IFC)的语言中的一个实例化，这种控制自然有助于动态执行技术。在我们的Flamio实现中，用于导出信任关系的FLAM证明搜索规则被实现为常规的Flamio计算:IFC对FLAM证明规则的要求是粗粒度信息流机制的自然适应。Flamio甚至支持远程过程调用，从而无缝支持FLAM的分布式证明搜索。我们已经将Flamio实现为一个Haskell库，并证明了基于Flamio的演算可以实施基于不干扰的安全保证。我们实现了几个案例研究，展示了Flamio在分布式环境中的表现力和实用性，以及我们在证据搜索期间控制标签蔓延的新方法。
papers.title_zh: 限流授权

papers.title: Modular Verification for Computer Security
papers.authors: Andrew W. Appel
papers.abstract: For many software components, it is useful and important to verify their security. This can be done by an analysis of the software itself, or by isolating the software behind a protection mechanism such as an operating system kernel (virtual-memory protection) or cryptographic authentication (don't accepted untrusted inputs). But the protection mechanisms themselves must then be verified not just for safety but for functional correctness. Several recent projects have demonstrated that formal, deductive functional-correctness verification is now possible for kernels, crypto, and compilers. Here I explain some of the modularity principles that make these verifications possible.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于许多软件组件来说，验证它们的安全性是有用且重要的。这可以通过分析软件本身来完成，或者通过将软件隔离在保护机制之后来完成，例如操作系统内核(虚拟内存保护)或加密认证(不接受不可信的输入)。但是保护机制本身必须被验证，不仅是为了安全，也是为了功能的正确性。最近的几个项目已经证明，正式的、演绎的功能正确性验证现在对于内核、密码和编译器是可能的。在这里，我解释了使这些验证成为可能的一些模块化原则。
papers.title_zh: 计算机安全的模块化验证

papers.title: Data-Driven Software Security: Models and Methods
papers.authors: Úlfar Erlingsson
papers.abstract: For computer software, our security models, policies, mechanisms, and means of assurance were primarily conceived and developed before the end of the 1970's. However, since that time, software has changed radically: it is thousands of times larger, comprises countless libraries, layers, and services, and is used for more purposes, in far more complex ways. It is worthwhile to revisit our core computer security concepts. This paper outlines what a data-driven model for software security could look like, and describes how the above three questions can be answered affirmatively. Specifically, this paper briefly describes methods for efficient, detailed software monitoring, as well as methods for learning detailed software statistics while providing differential privacy for its users, and, finally, how machine learning methods can help discover users expectations for intended software behavior, and thereby help set security policy. Those methods can be adopted in practice, even at very large scales, and demonstrate that data-driven software security models can provide real-world benefits.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于计算机软件，我们的安全模型、策略、机制和保证手段主要是在20世纪70年代末之前构思和开发的。然而，从那时起，软件已经发生了根本的变化:它大了数千倍，包含了无数的库、层和服务，并且用于更多的目的，以更加复杂的方式使用。重新审视我们的核心计算机安全概念是值得的。本文概述了数据驱动的软件安全模型，并描述了如何肯定地回答上述三个问题。具体而言，本文简要描述了高效、详细的软件监控方法，以及在为用户提供不同隐私的同时学习详细软件统计数据的方法，最后，机器学习方法如何帮助发现用户对预期软件行为的期望，从而帮助制定安全策略。这些方法可以在实践中采用，甚至是在非常大的规模上，并证明数据驱动的软件安全模型可以提供现实世界的好处。
papers.title_zh: 数据驱动的软件安全:模型和方法

papers.title: Are the Real Limits to Scale a Matter of Science, or Engineering, or of Something Else? (Abstract only)
papers.authors: Ross J. Anderson
papers.abstract: Summary form only given. As people get excited about the latest idea for "Big Data" and the "Internet of Things", computer people often shake our heads and say "It won't scale." Pessimism isn't always justified: we have been able to scale up quite a number of tasks, from connectivity through search to social media. But other applications are recalcitrant, from energy management to medical records. The conventional computer-science view is that scaling systems is about computational complexity; about whether the storage or communications required for a task grows more than linearly in the number of users. Over the past thirty years we've developed a pretty good theory of that, but we're learning that it's nowhere near enough. In this talk I present a complementary view, based on over thirty years' experience of security engineering, that the real limits to scale are usually elsewhere. Even where the data are manageable and the algorithms straightforward, things can fail because of the scaling properties of the social context, the economic model or the regulatory environment. This makes some automation projects much harder than they seem. When it comes to safety and privacy many of the attacks that are easy to do in the lab are rare in the wild, as they don't scale either. But others surprise us; no-one in the intelligence community anticipated a leak on the Snowden scale. In short, scaling is now a problem not of computer science but of systems engineering, economics, governance and much else. Conceiving problems too narrowly makes failure likely, while good engineering will require ever more awareness of context. The implications for research, education and policy bear some thought.
papers.abstract_zh: 仅提供总结表格。当人们对“大数据”和“物联网”的最新想法感到兴奋时，计算机人经常摇头说“它不会扩展。”悲观并不总是有道理的:我们已经能够扩大相当多的任务，从通过搜索的连接到社交媒体。但是从能源管理到医疗记录，其他的应用都很难。传统的计算机科学观点认为，扩展系统是关于计算复杂性的；关于一项任务所需的存储或通信是否随着用户数量的增加而超过线性增长。在过去的三十年里，我们已经发展了一套相当好的理论，但是我们发现这还远远不够。在这次演讲中，我基于三十多年的安全工程经验，提出了一个补充性的观点，即规模的真正极限通常在别处。即使在数据易于管理、算法简单明了的情况下，事情也可能因为社会背景、经济模式或监管环境的缩放特性而失败。这使得一些自动化项目比看起来要困难得多。当涉及到安全和隐私时，许多在实验室中容易进行的攻击在野外很少见，因为它们也无法扩展。但其他人让我们惊讶；情报界没有人预料到斯诺登级别的泄密。简而言之，扩展现在不是计算机科学的问题，而是系统工程、经济学、治理和许多其他方面的问题。过于狭隘地考虑问题可能会导致失败，而优秀的工程将需要更多的环境意识。这对研究、教育和政策的影响值得思考。
papers.title_zh: 规模的真正极限是科学问题，还是工程问题，还是其他问题？(仅摘要)

papers.title: On Modular and Fully-Abstract Compilation
papers.authors: Marco Patrignani, Dominique Devriese, Frank Piessens
papers.abstract: Secure compilation studies compilers that generate target-level components that are as secure as their source-level counterparts. Full abstraction is the most widely-proven property when defining a secure compiler. A compiler is modular if it allows different components to be compiled independently and then to be linked together to form a whole program. Unfortunately, many existing fully-abstract compilers to untyped machine code are not modular. So, while fully-abstractly compiled components are secure from malicious attackers, if they are linked against each other the resulting component may become vulnerable to attacks. This paper studies how to devise modular, fully-abstract compilers. It first analyses the attacks arising when compiled programs are linked together, identifying security threats that are due to linking. Then, it defines a compiler from an object-based language with method calls and dynamic memory allocation to untyped assembly language extended with a memory isolation mechanism. The paper provides a proof sketch that the defined compiler is fully-abstract and modular, so its output can be linked together without introducing security violations.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全编译研究生成与源代码级组件一样安全的目标级组件的编译器。当定义一个安全的编译器时，完全抽象是最广泛被证明的属性。如果一个编译器允许不同的组件被独立编译，然后链接在一起形成一个完整的程序，那么它就是模块化的。不幸的是，许多现有的非类型化机器代码的完全抽象编译器不是模块化的。因此，虽然完全抽象编译的组件对于恶意攻击者是安全的，但是如果它们相互链接，那么产生的组件可能容易受到攻击。本文研究如何设计模块化、完全抽象的编译器。它首先分析当编译的程序链接在一起时出现的攻击，识别由于链接引起的安全威胁。然后，它定义了一个编译器，从具有方法调用和动态内存分配的基于对象的语言到扩展了内存隔离机制的无类型汇编语言。文章给出了一个证明草图，证明了所定义的编译器是完全抽象和模块化的，因此它的输出可以链接在一起而不会引入安全违规。
papers.title_zh: 论模块化全抽象编译

papers.title: Secure Software Licensing: Models, Constructions, and Proofs
papers.authors: Sergiu Costea, Bogdan Warinschi
papers.abstract: The problem of secure software licensing is to enforce meaningful restrictions on how software is run on machines outside the control of the software author/vendor. The problem has been addressed through a variety of approaches from software obfuscation to hardware-based solutions, but existent solutions offer only heuristic guarantees which are often invalidated by attacks. This paper establishes foundations for secure software licensing in the form of rigorous models. We identify and formalize two key properties. Privacy demands that licensed software does not leak unwanted information, and integrity ensures that the use of licensed software is compliant with a license - the license is a parameter of our models. Our formal definitions and proposed constructions leverage the isolation/attestation capabilities of recently proposed trusted hardware like SGX which proves to be a key enabling technology for provably secure software licensing.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全软件许可的问题是对软件如何在不受软件作者/供应商控制的机器上运行实施有意义的限制。已经通过从软件混淆到基于硬件的解决方案的各种方法解决了该问题，但是现有的解决方案仅提供启发式保证，这通常被攻击所无效。本文以严格模型的形式建立了安全软件许可的基础。我们确定并形式化了两个关键属性。隐私性要求许可软件不泄漏不需要的信息，完整性确保许可软件的使用符合许可——许可是我们模型的一个参数。我们的正式定义和提出的构造利用了最近提出的可信硬件(如SGX)的隔离/证明功能，该功能被证明是可证明安全的软件许可的关键使能技术。
papers.title_zh: 安全软件许可:模型、结构和证明

papers.title: Beyond Good and Evil: Formalizing the Security Guarantees of Compartmentalizing Compilation
papers.authors: Yannis Juglaret, Catalin Hritcu, Arthur Azevedo de Amorim, Boris Eng, Benjamin C. Pierce
papers.abstract: Compartmentalization is good security-engineering practice. By breaking a large software system into mutually distrustful components that run with minimal privileges, restricting their interactions to conform to well-defined interfaces, we can limit the damage caused by low-level attacks such as control-flow hijacking. When used to defend against such attacks, compartmentalization is often implemented cooperatively by a compiler and a low-level compartmentalization mechanism. However, the formal guarantees provided by such compartmentalizing compilation have seen surprisingly little investigation. We propose a new security property, secure compartmentalizing compilation (SCC), that formally characterizes the guarantees provided by compartmentalizing compilation and clarifies its attacker model. We reconstruct our property by starting from the well-established notion of fully abstract compilation, then identifying and lifting three important limitations that make standard full abstraction unsuitable for compartmentalization. The connection to full abstraction allows us to prove SCC by adapting established proof techniques, we illustrate this with a compiler from a simple unsafe imperative language with procedures to a compartmentalized abstract machine.
papers.abstract_zh: 划分是良好的安全工程实践。通过将一个大型软件系统分解成以最小特权运行的互不信任的组件，限制它们的交互以符合定义良好的接口，我们可以限制低级攻击(如控制流劫持)所造成的损害。当用于防御这种攻击时，划分通常由编译器和低级划分机制合作实现。然而，令人惊讶的是，这种划分汇编所提供的正式保证很少受到调查。我们提出了一个新的安全属性，安全划分编译(SCC)，它形式化地描述了划分编译所提供的保证，并阐明了它的攻击者模型。我们从完善的完全抽象编译的概念出发，重新构建我们的属性，然后识别并提升三个重要的限制，这三个限制使得标准的完全抽象不适合划分。与完全抽象的联系允许我们通过采用已建立的证明技术来证明SCC，我们用一个编译器来说明这一点，从一个简单的不安全的命令式语言到一个划分的抽象机器。
papers.title_zh: 超越善与恶:形式化划分编译的安全保证

papers.title: Relative Perfect Secrecy: Universally Optimal Strategies and Channel Design
papers.authors: M. H. R. Khouzani, Pasquale Malacaria
papers.abstract: Perfect secrecy describes cases where an adversary cannot learn anything about the secret beyond its prior distribution. A classical result by Shannon shows that a necessary condition for perfect secrecy is that the adversary should not be able to eliminate any of the possible secrets. In this paper we answer the following fundamental question: What is the lowest leakage of information that can be achieved when some of the secrets have to be eliminated? We address this question by deriving the minimum leakage in closed-form, and explicitly providing "universally optimal" randomized strategies, in the sense that they guarantee the minimum leakage irrespective of the measure of entropy used to quantify the leakage. We then introduce a generalization of Rényi family of asymmetric measures of leakage which generalizes the g-leakage and show that a slight modification of our strategies are optimal with respect to an important class of such measures. Subsequently, we show that our schemes constitute the Nash Equilibria of closely related two-person zero sum games. This game perspective provides implicit solutions for a wider set of structural constraints and asymmetric entropies. Finally we demonstrate how this work can also be seen as designing a universally optimal channel given a specified prior.
papers.abstract_zh: 完美保密描述了这样的情况，即对手除了事先发布之外，无法获知任何有关秘密的信息。Shannon的一个经典结果表明，完美保密的一个必要条件是对手不能消除任何可能的秘密。在本文中，我们回答了以下基本问题:当必须消除某些秘密时，可以实现的最低信息泄漏是什么？我们通过推导闭合形式的最小泄漏来解决这个问题，并明确提供“普遍最优”的随机化策略，在某种意义上，它们保证最小泄漏，而不管用于量化泄漏的熵的度量。然后，我们引入了Ré nyi族非对称泄漏测度的推广，它推广了g-泄漏，并表明我们的策略稍加修改对于一类重要的此类测度是最优的。随后，我们证明了我们的方案构成了密切相关的两人零和博弈的纳什均衡。这种游戏视角为更广泛的结构约束和不对称熵提供了隐含的解决方案。最后，我们证明了如何这项工作也可以被视为设计一个普遍的最佳渠道给定一个特定的先验。
papers.title_zh: 相对完全保密:普遍最优策略与渠道设计

papers.title: Axioms for Information Leakage
papers.authors: Mário S. Alvim, Konstantinos Chatzikokolakis, Annabelle McIver, Carroll Morgan, Catuscia Palamidessi, Geoffrey Smith
papers.abstract: Quantitative information flow aims to assess and control the leakage of sensitive information by computer systems. A key insight in this area is that no single leakage measure is appropriate in all operational scenarios, as a result, many leakage measures have been proposed, with many different properties. To clarify this complex situation, this paper studies information leakage axiomatically, showing important dependencies among different axioms. It also establishes a completeness result about the g-leakage family, showing that any leakage measure satisfying certain intuitively-reasonable properties can be expressed as a g-leakage.
papers.abstract_zh: 定量信息流旨在评估和控制计算机系统的敏感信息泄漏。这方面的一个关键见解是，没有一种渗漏措施适用于所有作业情况，因此，提出了许多渗漏措施，具有许多不同的特性。为了澄清这种复杂的情况，本文研究了公理化的信息泄漏，显示了不同公理之间的重要依赖关系。它还建立了一个关于g-泄漏族的完备性结果，表明任何满足某些直观合理性质的泄漏测度都可以表示为g-泄漏。
papers.title_zh: 信息泄露的公理

papers.title: Correlated Secrets in Quantitative Information Flow
papers.authors: Nicolás E. Bordenabe, Geoffrey Smith
papers.abstract: A fundamental challenge in controlling the leakage of sensitive information by computer systems is the possibility of correlations between different secrets, with the result that leaking information about one secret may also leak information about a different secret. We explore such leakage, here called Dalenius leakage, within the context of the g-leakage family of leakage measures. We prove a fundamental equivalence between Dalenius min-entropy leakage under arbitrary correlations and g-leakage under arbitrary gain functions, and show how this equivalence increases the significance of the composition refinement relation. We also consider Dalenius leakage in the case when the marginal distributions induced by the correlation are known, giving techniques to compute stronger upper bounds in this case.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过计算机系统控制敏感信息泄漏的一个基本挑战是不同秘密之间的相关性的可能性，其结果是泄漏关于一个秘密的信息也可能泄漏关于不同秘密的信息。我们在泄漏测量的g泄漏族的上下文中探索这种泄漏，这里称为Dalenius泄漏。我们证明了任意相关下的Dalenius最小熵泄漏和任意增益函数下的g-泄漏之间的一个基本等价性，并展示了这种等价性如何增加组成精化关系的重要性。我们还考虑了当由相关性引起的边际分布已知时的Dalenius泄漏，给出了在这种情况下计算更强上界的技术。
papers.title_zh: 定量信息流中的相关秘密

papers.title: Quantitative Verification and Synthesis of Attack-Defence Scenarios
papers.authors: Zaruhi Aslanyan, Flemming Nielson, David Parker
papers.abstract: Attack-defence trees are a powerful technique for formally evaluating attack-defence scenarios. They represent in an intuitive, graphical way the interaction between an attacker and a defender who compete in order to achieve conflicting objectives. We propose a novel framework for the formal analysis of quantitative properties of complex attack-defence scenarios, using an extension of attack-defence trees which models temporal ordering of actions and allows explicit dependencies in the strategies adopted by attackers and defenders. We adopt a game-theoretic approach, translating attack-defence trees to two-player stochastic games, and then employ probabilistic model checking techniques to formally analyse these models. This provides a means to both verify formally specified security properties of the attack-defence scenarios and, dually, to synthesise strategies for attackers or defenders which guarantee or optimise some quantitative property, such as the probability of a successful attack, the expected cost incurred, or some multi-objective trade-off between the two. We implement our approach, building upon the PRISM-games model checker, and apply it to a case study of an RFID goods management system.
papers.abstract_zh: 攻防树是一种用于正式评估攻防场景的强大技术。它们以直观、图形化的方式展示了攻击者和防御者之间的互动，他们为了实现相互冲突的目标而展开竞争。我们提出了一个新的框架，用于对复杂的攻击-防御场景的定量属性进行正式分析，使用攻击-防御树的扩展，该扩展对动作的时间顺序进行建模，并允许攻击者和防御者采用的策略中的显式依赖性。我们采用博弈论的方法，将攻防树转化为两人随机博弈，然后采用概率模型检验技术对这些模型进行形式化分析。这提供了一种方法，既可以验证攻击-防御场景的形式上指定的安全属性，又可以为攻击者或防御者合成策略，这些策略保证或优化一些定量属性，例如成功攻击的概率、预期发生的成本或两者之间的一些多目标权衡。我们在PRISM-games模型检验器的基础上实现了我们的方法，并将其应用于一个RFID商品管理系统的案例研究。
papers.title_zh: 攻防场景的定量验证和综合

papers.title: In the Nick of Time: Proactive Prevention of Obligation Violations
papers.authors: David A. Basin, Søren Debois, Thomas T. Hildebrandt
papers.abstract: We present a system model, an enforcement mechanism, and a policy language for the proactive enforcement of timed provisions and obligations. Our approach improves upon existing formalisms in two ways: (1) we exploit the target system's existing functionality to avert policy violations proactively, rather than compensate for them reactively, and, (2) instead of requiring the manual specification of remedial actions in the policy, we automatically deduce required actions directly from the policy. As a policy language, we employ timed dynamic condition response (DCR) processes. DCR primitives declaratively express timed provisions and obligations as causal relationships between events, and DCR states explicitly represent pending obligations. As key technical results, we show that enforceability of DCR policies is decidable, we give a sufficient polynomial time verifiable condition for a policy to be enforceable, and we give an algorithm for determining from a DCR state a sequence of actions that discharge impending obligations.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一个系统模型，一个执行机制，和一个政策语言，为积极执行的时间规定和义务。我们的方法在两个方面改进了现有的形式:(1)我们利用目标系统的现有功能来主动避免违反策略，而不是被动地对它们进行补偿，以及(2)我们不需要手动指定策略中的补救动作，而是直接从策略中自动推导出所需的动作。作为一种策略语言，我们采用定时动态条件响应(DCR)过程。DCR原语声明性地将定时条款和义务表达为事件之间的因果关系，而DCR状态明确地表示未决义务。作为关键的技术结果，我们证明了DCR政策的可执行性是可判定的，我们给出了一个政策可执行的充分多项式时间可验证的条件，并且我们给出了一个算法，用于从DCR状态确定一系列履行即将发生的义务的行动。
papers.title_zh: 在紧要关头:主动预防违反义务

papers.title: A Calculus for Flow-Limited Authorization
papers.authors: Owen Arden, Andrew C. Myers
papers.abstract: Real-world applications routinely make authorization decisions based on dynamic computation. Reasoning about dynamically computed authority is challenging. Integrity of the system might be compromised if attackers can improperly influence the authorizing computation. Confidentiality can also be compromised by authorization, since authorization decisions are often based on sensitive data such as membership lists and passwords. Previous formal models for authorization do not fully address the security implications of permitting trust relationships to change, which limits their ability to reason about authority that derives from dynamic computation. Our goal is a way to construct dynamic authorization mechanisms that do not violate confidentiality or integrity. We introduce the Flow-Limited Authorization Calculus (FLAC), which is both a simple, expressive model for reasoning about dynamic authorization and also an information flow control language for securely implementing various authorization mechanisms. FLAC combines the insights of two previous models: it extends the Dependency Core Calculus with features made possible by the Flow-Limited Authorization Model. FLAC provides strong end-to-end information security guarantees even for programs that incorporate and implement rich dynamic authorization mechanisms. These guarantees include noninterference and robust declassification, which prevent attackers from influencing information disclosures in unauthorized ways. We prove these security properties formally for all FLAC programs and explore the expressiveness of FLAC with several examples.
papers.abstract_zh: 现实世界的应用程序通常基于动态计算做出授权决定。对动态计算的权限进行推理是具有挑战性的。如果攻击者能够不恰当地影响授权计算，则系统的完整性可能会受到损害。由于授权决策通常基于敏感数据，如成员列表和密码，因此机密性也可能会受到影响。以前的授权正式模型没有完全解决允许信任关系改变的安全问题，这限制了它们对来自动态计算的授权进行推理的能力。我们的目标是构造不违反机密性或完整性的动态授权机制。我们引入了流限制授权演算(FLAC ),它既是一个简单的、表达性的动态授权推理模型，也是一个安全实现各种授权机制的信息流控制语言。FLAC结合了前面两个模型的见解:它扩展了依赖关系核心演算，增加了流限制授权模型的功能。FLAC提供了强大的端到端信息安全保证，即使是对于合并和实现丰富的动态授权机制的程序。这些保证包括不干扰和强大的解密，防止攻击者以未经授权的方式影响信息披露。我们为所有的FLAC程序形式化地证明了这些安全性质，并通过几个例子探讨了FLAC的表达能力。
papers.title_zh: 流量受限授权的演算

papers.title: On Access Control, Capabilities, Their Equivalence, and Confused Deputy Attacks
papers.authors: Vineet Rajani, Deepak Garg, Tamara Rezk
papers.abstract: Motivated by the problem of understanding the difference between practical access control and capability systems formally, we distill the essence of both in a language-based setting. We first prove that access control systems and (object) capabilities are fundamentally different. We further study capabilities as an enforcement mechanism for confused deputy attacks (CDAs), since CDAs may have been the primary motivation for the invention of capabilities. To do this, we develop the first formal characterization of CDA-freedom in a language-based setting and describe its relation to standard information flow integrity. We show that, perhaps suprisingly, capabilities cannot prevent all CDAs. Next, we stipulate restrictions on programs under which capabilities ensure CDA-freedom and prove that the restrictions are sufficient. To relax those restrictions, we examine provenance semantics as sound CDA-freedom enforcement mechanisms.
papers.abstract_zh: 受到正式理解实际访问控制和能力系统之间的区别的问题的激励，我们在基于语言的环境中提取两者的本质。我们首先证明访问控制系统和(对象)能力是根本不同的。我们进一步研究作为混淆代理攻击(CDAs)的执行机制的能力，因为CDAs可能是发明能力的主要动机。为此，我们在基于语言的环境中开发了CDA-freedom的第一个形式化特征，并描述了它与标准信息流完整性的关系。我们表明，也许令人惊讶的是，能力不能阻止所有的CDA。接下来，我们规定了对程序的限制，在这些限制下，能力确保CDA-freedom，并证明这些限制是充分的。为了放松这些限制，我们将来源语义作为可靠的CDA-freedom实施机制进行检查。
papers.title_zh: 关于访问控制、能力、它们的等价性和混淆的代理攻击

papers.title: On Post-compromise Security
papers.authors: Katriel Cohn-Gordon, Cas Cremers, Luke Garratt
papers.abstract: In this work we study communication with a party whose secrets have already been compromised. At first sight, it may seem impossible to provide any type of security in this scenario. However, under some conditions, practically relevant guarantees can still be achieved. We call such guarantees "post-compromise security". We provide the first informal and formal definitions for post-compromise security, and show that it can be achieved in several scenarios. At a technical level, we instantiate our informal definitions in the setting of authenticated key exchange (AKE) protocols, and develop two new strong security models for two different threat models. We show that both of these security models can be satisfied, by proposing two concrete protocol constructions and proving they are secure in the models. Our work leads to crucial insights on how post-compromise security can (and cannot) be achieved, paving the way for applications in other domains.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这部作品中，我们研究了与一个秘密已经泄露的团体的交流。乍一看，在这种情况下似乎不可能提供任何类型的安全性。然而，在某些条件下，仍然可以实现实际相关的保证。我们称这样的保证为“妥协后的安全”。我们提供了第一个非正式和正式的妥协后安全性的定义，并表明它可以在几种情况下实现。在技术层面上，我们以认证密钥交换(AKE)协议为背景实例化了我们的非正式定义，并针对两种不同的威胁模型开发了两个新的强安全模型。通过提出两个具体的协议结构并证明它们在模型中是安全的，我们证明了这两个安全模型是可以满足的。我们的工作对如何实现(和不能实现)妥协后的安全性提供了重要的见解，为其他领域的应用铺平了道路。
papers.title_zh: 论后妥协安全

papers.title: Micro-policies for Web Session Security
papers.authors: Stefano Calzavara, Riccardo Focardi, Niklas Grimm, Matteo Maffei
papers.abstract: Micro-policies, originally proposed to implement hardware-level security monitors, constitute a flexible and general enforcement technique, based on assigning security tags to system components and taking security actions based on dynamic checks over these tags. In this paper, we present the first application of micro-policies to web security, by proposing a core browser model supporting them and studying its effectiveness at securing web sessions. In our view, web session security requirements are expressed in terms of a simple, declarative information flow policy, which is then automatically translated into a micro-policy enforcing it. This leads to a browser-side enforcement mechanism which is elegant, sound and flexible, while being accessible to web developers. We show how a large class of attacks against web sessions can be uniformly and effectively prevented by the adoption of this approach. We also develop a proof-of-concept implementation of a significant core of our proposal as a Google Chrome extension, Michrome: our experiments show that Michrome can be easily configured to enforce strong security policies without breaking the functionality of websites.
papers.abstract_zh: 最初提出用于实现硬件级安全监视器的微策略构成了一种灵活且通用的实施技术，它基于向系统组件分配安全标签并基于对这些标签的动态检查来采取安全行动。在本文中，我们通过提出一个支持微策略的核心浏览器模型并研究其在保护web会话方面的有效性，首次展示了微策略在web安全方面的应用。在我们看来，web会话安全需求是用一个简单的、声明性的信息流策略来表达的，然后这个策略被自动转换成一个执行它的微观策略。这就产生了一种优雅、可靠且灵活的浏览器端实施机制，同时也便于web开发人员使用。我们展示了如何通过采用这种方法统一有效地防止针对web会话的大类攻击。我们还开发了作为Google Chrome扩展的重要核心的概念验证实现Michrome:我们的实验表明，Michrome可以很容易地配置为实施强大的安全策略，而不会破坏网站的功能。
papers.title_zh: Web会话安全的微观策略

papers.title: Localizing Firewall Security Policies
papers.authors: Pedro Adão, Riccardo Focardi, Joshua D. Guttman, Flaminia L. Luccio
papers.abstract: In complex networks, filters may be applied at different nodes to control how packets flow. In this paper, we study how to locate filtering functionality within a network. We show how to enforce a set of security goals while allowing maximal service subject to the security constraints. To implement our results we present a tool that given a network specification and a set of control rules automatically localizes the filters and generates configurations for all the firewalls in the network. These configurations are implemented using an extension of Mignis - an open source tool to generate firewalls from declarative, semantically explicit configurations. Our contributions include a way to specify security goals for how packets traverse the network, an algorithm to distribute filtering functionality to different nodes in the network to enforce a given set of security goals, and a proof that the results are compatible with a Mignis-based semantics for network behavior.
papers.abstract_zh: 在复杂的网络中，可以在不同的节点应用过滤器来控制数据包的流动。在本文中，我们研究如何在网络中定位过滤功能。我们展示了如何执行一组安全目标，同时允许最大限度的服务服从安全约束。为了实现我们的结果，我们提供了一个工具，该工具给定一个网络规范和一组控制规则，自动定位过滤器并为网络中的所有防火墙生成配置。这些配置是使用Mignis的扩展实现的，Mignis是一个开源工具，用于根据声明性的、语义明确的配置生成防火墙。我们的贡献包括一种为数据包如何通过网络指定安全目标的方法，一种将过滤功能分配给网络中不同节点以实施一组给定安全目标的算法，以及一种结果与基于Mignis的网络行为语义兼容的证明。
papers.title_zh: 本地化防火墙安全策略

papers.title: Calculational Design of Information Flow Monitors
papers.authors: Mounir Assaf, David A. Naumann
papers.abstract: Fine grained information flow monitoring can in principle address a wide range of security and privacy goals, for example in web applications. But it is very difficult to achieve sound monitoring with acceptable runtime cost and sufficient precision to avoid impractical restrictions on programs and policies. We present a systematic technique for design of monitors that are correct by construction. It encompasses policies with downgrading. The technique is based on abstract interpretation which is a standard basis for static analysis of programs. This should enable integration of a wide range of analysis techniques, enabling more sophisticated engineering of monitors to address the challenges of precision and scaling to widely used programming languages.
papers.abstract_zh: 细粒度的信息流监控原则上可以解决广泛的安全和隐私目标，例如在web应用程序中。但是很难以可接受的运行时间成本和足够的精度实现可靠的监控，以避免对程序和策略的不切实际的限制。我们提出了一种系统的技术，用于设计通过构造来校正的监视器。它包括降级政策。该技术基于抽象解释，抽象解释是程序静态分析的标准基础。这将有助于集成各种分析技术，实现更复杂的监视器工程，以应对精度和扩展到广泛使用的编程语言的挑战。
papers.title_zh: 信息流监视器的计算设计

papers.title: Hybrid Monitoring of Attacker Knowledge
papers.authors: Frédéric Besson, Nataliia Bielova, Thomas P. Jensen
papers.abstract: Enforcement of noninterference requires proving that an attacker's knowledge about the initial state remains the same after observing a program's public output. We propose a hybrid monitoring mechanism which dynamically evaluates the knowledge that is contained in program variables. To get a precise estimate of the knowledge, the monitor statically analyses non-executed branches. We show that our knowledge-based monitor can be combined with existing dynamic monitors for non-interference. A distinguishing feature of such a combination is that the combined monitor is provably more permissive than each mechanism taken separately. We demonstrate this by proposing a knowledge-enhanced version of a no-sensitive-upgrade (NSU) monitor. The monitor and its static analysis have been formalized and proved correct within the Coq proof assistant.
papers.abstract_zh: 实施无干扰要求证明攻击者在观察程序的公共输出后对初始状态的了解保持不变。我们提出了一种混合监控机制，它动态地评估包含在程序变量中的知识。为了获得对知识的精确估计，监控器静态地分析未执行的分支。我们表明，我们的知识为基础的监测可以结合现有的动态监测无干扰。这种组合的一个显著特征是，组合的监视器比单独采用的每个机制更宽松。我们通过提出非敏感升级(NSU)监视器的知识增强版本来证明这一点。在Coq proof assistant中，监视器及其静态分析已经被形式化并被证明是正确的。
papers.title_zh: 攻击者知识的混合监控

papers.title: Runtime Verification of k-Safety Hyperproperties in HyperLTL
papers.authors: Shreya Agrawal, Borzoo Bonakdarpour
papers.abstract: This paper introduces a novel runtime verification technique for a rich sub-class of Clarkson and Schneider's hyperproperties. The primary application of such properties is in expressing security policies (e.g., information flow) that cannot be expressed in trace-based specification languages (e.g., LTL). First, to incorporate syntactic means, we draw connections between safety and co-safety hyperproperties and the temporal logic HYPERLTL, which allows explicit quantification over multiple executions. We also define the notion of monitorability in HYPERLTL and identify classes of monitorable HYPERLTL formulas. Then, we introduce an algorithm for monitoring k-safety and co-k-safety hyperproperties expressed in HYPERLTL. Our technique is based on runtime formula progression as well as on-the-fly monitor synthesis across multiple executions. We analyze different performance aspects of our technique by conducting thorough experiments on monitoring security policies for information flow and observational determinism on a real-world location-based service dataset as well as synthetic trace sets.
papers.abstract_zh: 介绍了一种新颖的Clarkson和Schneider超性质子类的运行时验证技术。这些属性的主要应用是表达不能用基于踪迹的规范语言(例如LTL)表达的安全策略(例如信息流)。首先，为了结合语法手段，我们在安全性和协同安全性超属性与时序逻辑超LTL之间建立了联系，这允许对多个执行进行显式量化。我们还定义了HYPERLTL中可监控性的概念，并确定了可监控HYPERLTL公式的类别。然后，我们介绍了一个监控超LTL中k-安全和co-k-安全超性质的算法。我们的技术基于运行时公式进展以及跨多个执行的即时监控合成。我们通过在真实世界的基于位置的服务数据集以及合成轨迹集上进行关于信息流和观察确定性的监控安全策略的彻底实验，分析了我们的技术的不同性能方面。
papers.title_zh: HyperLTL中k-安全超性质的运行时验证

papers.title: Non-interference with What-Declassification in Component-Based Systems
papers.authors: Simon Greiner, Daniel Grahl
papers.abstract: In this paper, we present a novel notion of compositional non-interference for component-based systems. Our specification mechanism for non-interference properties is based on equivalence relations, catering for a precise formalization of declassified information. It takes assumptions on the environment into consideration. We also present a new notion of non-interference for services provided by a component and prove that a component only providing non-interferent services is itself non-interferent. Using these properties, secure information flow in a component-based system can be proved by separately analyzing each of the services that are provided by the components. As a result, we gain modular, precise, and reusable information-flow specifications for component-based systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了一个新的基于组件系统的组合互不干扰的概念。我们的无干扰属性的规范机制是基于等价关系的，迎合了解密信息的精确形式化。它考虑了对环境的假设。我们还提出了一个新的概念，即组件提供的服务互不干扰，并证明了一个只提供互不干扰服务的组件本身是互不干扰的。使用这些属性，可以通过分别分析组件提供的每个服务来证明基于组件的系统中的安全信息流。结果，我们为基于组件的系统获得了模块化的、精确的、可重用的信息流规范。
papers.title_zh: 在基于组件的系统中不干扰什么解密

papers.title: A Certified Compiler for Verifiable Computing
papers.authors: Cédric Fournet, Chantal Keller, Vincent Laporte
papers.abstract: In cryptology, verifiable computing aims at verifying the remote execution of a program on an untrusted machine, based on its I/O and constant-sized evidence collected during its execution. Recent cryptographic schemes and compilers enable practical verifiable computations for some programs written in C, but their soundness with regards to C semantics remains informal and poorly understood. We present the first certified, semantics-preserving compiler for verifiable computing. Based on CompCert and developed in Coq, our compiler targets an architecture whose instructions consist solely of quadratic equations over a large finite field, amenable to succinct verification using the Pinocchio cryptographic scheme. We explain how to encode the integer operations of a C program first to quadratic equations, then to a single cryptographically-checkable polynomial test. We formally prove that, when compilation succeeds, there is a correct execution of the source program for any I/O that pass this test. We link our compiler to the Pinocchio cryptographic runtime, and report experimental results as we compile, run, and verify the execution of sample C programs.
papers.abstract_zh: 在密码学中，可验证计算旨在基于程序执行期间收集的I/O和固定大小的证据，验证程序在不可信机器上的远程执行。最近的密码方案和编译器使得一些用C语言编写的程序能够进行实际的可验证计算，但是它们在C语言语义方面的可靠性仍然是非正式的，并且很少被理解。我们提出了第一个认证的，语义保留的可验证计算编译器。基于CompCert并在Coq中开发，我们的编译器的目标是一种体系结构，其指令仅由大型有限域上的二次方程组成，可使用Pinocchio密码方案进行简洁验证。我们解释了如何将一个C程序的整数运算编码成二次方程，然后编码成一个单一的密码可检验的多项式测试。我们正式证明，当编译成功时，对于通过该测试的任何I/O，都存在源程序的正确执行。我们将我们的编译器链接到Pinocchio加密运行时，并在我们编译、运行和验证示例C程序的执行时报告实验结果。
papers.title_zh: 用于可验证计算的认证编译器

papers.title: Analysis of Key Wrapping APIs: Generic Policies, Computational Security
papers.authors: Guillaume Scerri, Ryan Stanley-Oakes
papers.abstract: We present an analysis of key wrapping APIs with generic policies. We prove that certain minimal conditions on policies are sufficient for keys to be indistinguishable from random in any execution of an API. Our result captures a large class of API policies, including both the hierarchies on keys that are common in the scientific literature and the non-linear dependencies on keys used in PKCS#11. Indeed, we use our result to propose a secure refinement of PKCS#11, assuming that the attributes of keys are transmitted as authenticated associated data when wrapping and that there is an enforced separation between keys used for wrapping and keys used for other cryptographic purposes. We use the Computationally Complete Symbolic Attacker developed by Bana and Comon. This model enables us to obtain computational guarantees using a simple proof with a high degree of modularity.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一个通用策略的关键包装API的分析。我们证明了在任何API执行中，策略上的某些最小条件足以使密钥与随机密钥不可区分。我们的结果捕获了一大类API策略，包括科学文献中常见的键的层次结构和PKCS#11中使用的键的非线性依赖性。实际上，我们使用我们的结果来提出PKCS#11的安全改进，假设在包装时密钥的属性作为认证的关联数据被传输，并且在用于包装的密钥和用于其他加密目的的密钥之间存在强制分离。我们使用Bana和Comon开发的计算上完全的符号攻击者。这个模型使我们能够使用一个简单的高度模块化的证明来获得计算保证。
papers.title_zh: 关键包装API分析:通用策略、计算安全

papers.title: A Verified Extensible Library of Elliptic Curves
papers.authors: Jean Karim Zinzindohoue, Evmorfia-Iro Bartzia, Karthikeyan Bhargavan
papers.abstract: In response to increasing demand for elliptic curve cryptography, and specifically for curves that are free from the suspicion of influence by the NSA, new elliptic curves such as Curve25519 and Curve448 are currently being standardized, implemented, and deployed in major protocols such as Transport Layer Security. As with all new cryptographic code, the correctness of these curve implementations is of concern, because any bug or backdoor in this code can potentially compromise the security of important Internet protocols. We present a principled approach towards the verification of elliptic curve implementations by writing them in the dependently-typed programming language F* and proving them functionally correct against a readable mathematical specification derived from a previous Coq development. A key technical innovation in our work is the use of templates to write and verify arbitrary precision arithmetic once and for all for a variety of Bignum representations used in different curves. We also show how to use abstract types to enforce a coding discipline that mitigates side-channels at the source level. We present a verified F* library that implements the popular curves Curve25519, Curve448, and NIST-P256, and we show how developers can add new curves to this library with minimal programming and verification effort.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了响应对椭圆曲线加密技术的日益增长的需求，特别是对于不受NSA影响的曲线的需求，诸如Curve25519和Curve448的新椭圆曲线目前正在被标准化、实现和部署在诸如传输层安全性的主要协议中。与所有新的加密代码一样，这些curve实现的正确性令人担忧，因为这些代码中的任何错误或后门都可能危及重要互联网协议的安全性。我们提出了一种验证椭圆曲线实现的原理性方法，通过用相关类型编程语言F*编写椭圆曲线实现，并根据从以前的Coq开发中得到的可读数学规范证明它们在功能上是正确的。我们工作中的一个关键技术创新是使用模板为不同曲线中使用的各种Bignum表示编写和验证任意精度的算法。我们还展示了如何使用抽象类型来执行编码规则，从而在源代码级别减少旁支。我们展示了一个经过验证的F*库，它实现了流行的曲线Curve25519、Curve448和NIST-P256，我们还展示了开发人员如何通过最少的编程和验证工作将新曲线添加到这个库中。
papers.title_zh: 一个经过验证的可扩展椭圆曲线库

papers.title: Automated Reasoning for Equivalences in the Applied Pi Calculus with Barriers
papers.authors: Bruno Blanchet, Ben Smyth
papers.abstract: Observational equivalence allows us to study important security properties such as anonymity. Unfortunately, the difficulty of proving observational equivalence hinders analysis. Blanchet, Abadi & Fournet simplify its proof by introducing a sufficient condition for observational equivalence, called diff-equivalence, which is a reachability condition that can be proved automatically by ProVerif. However, diff-equivalence is a very strong condition, which often does not hold even if observational equivalence does. In particular, when proving equivalence between processes that contain several parallel components, e.g., P | Q and P' | Q', diff-equivalence requires that P is equivalent to P' and Q is equivalent to Q'. To relax this constraint, Delaune, Ryan & Smyth introduced the idea of swapping data between parallel processes P' and Q' at synchronisation points, without proving its soundness. We extend their work by formalising the semantics of synchronisation, formalising the definition of swapping, and proving its soundness. We also relax some restrictions they had on the processes to which swapping can be applied. Moreover, we have implemented our results in ProVerif. Hence, we extend the class of equivalences that can be proved automatically. We showcase our results by analysing privacy in election schemes by Fujioka, Okamoto & Ohta and Lee et al., and in the vehicular ad-hoc network by Freudiger et al.
papers.abstract_zh: 观察等价允许我们研究重要的安全属性，如匿名性。不幸的是，证明观测等价的困难阻碍了分析。Blanchet，Abadi & Fournet通过引入观测等价的充分条件简化了它的证明，称为diff-equivalence，这是一个可以由ProVerif自动证明的可达性条件。然而，差异等价是一个非常强的条件，即使观察等价成立，它也常常不成立。特别地，当证明包含几个并行分量的过程之间的等价性时，例如P | Q和P' | Q '，差异等价要求P等价于P '并且Q等价于Q '。为了放松这一限制，Delaune，Ryan & Smyth引入了在同步点的并行进程P’和Q’之间交换数据的想法，但没有证明其合理性。我们通过形式化同步的语义，形式化交换的定义，并证明其合理性来扩展他们的工作。我们还放宽了他们对可应用交换的进程的一些限制。此外，我们在ProVerif中实现了我们的结果。因此，我们扩展了可以自动证明的等价类。我们通过分析藤冈、冈本太田和李等人的选举方案中的隐私以及弗罗迪格等人的车载自组织网络中的隐私来展示我们的结果。
papers.title_zh: 带障碍的实用Pi演算中等价关系的自动推理

papers.title: Modeling Human Errors in Security Protocols
papers.authors: David A. Basin, Sasa Radomirovic, Lara Schmid
papers.abstract: Many security protocols involve humans, not machines, as endpoints. The differences are critical: humans are not only computationally weaker than machines, they are naive, careless, and gullible. In this paper, we provide a model for formalizing and reasoning about these inherent human limitations and their consequences. Specifically, we formalize models of fallible humans in security protocols as multiset rewrite theories. We show how the Tamarin tool can then be used to automatically analyze security protocols involving human errors. We provide case studies of authentication protocols that show how different protocol constructions and features differ in their effectiveness with respect to different kinds of fallible humans. This provides a starting point for a fine-grained classification of security protocols from a usable-security perspective.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多安全协议将人而不是机器作为端点。差异是至关重要的:人类不仅在计算上弱于机器，而且天真、粗心、容易受骗。在本文中，我们提供了一个模型来形式化和推理这些固有的人类局限性及其后果。特别地，我们将安全协议中易犯错误的人的模型形式化为多重集重写理论。我们展示了如何使用Tamarin工具自动分析涉及人为错误的安全协议。我们提供了身份验证协议的案例研究，展示了不同的协议结构和功能对于不同类型的易犯错误的人的有效性是如何不同的。这从可用安全的角度为安全协议的细粒度分类提供了一个起点。
papers.title_zh: 安全协议中人为错误的建模

papers.title: sElect: A Lightweight Verifiable Remote Voting System
papers.authors: Ralf Küsters, Johannes Müller, Enrico Scapin, Tomasz Truderung
papers.abstract: Modern remote electronic voting systems, such as the prominent Helios system, are designed to provide vote privacy and verifiability, where, roughly speaking, the latter means that voters can make sure that their votes were actually counted. In this paper, we propose a new practical voting system called sElect (secure/simple elections). This system, which we implemented as a platform independent web-based application, is meant for low-risk elections and is designed to be particularly simple and lightweight in terms of its structure, the cryptography it uses, and the user experience. One of the unique features of sElect is that it supports fully automated verification, which does not require any user interaction and is triggered as soon as a voter looks at the election result. Despite its simplicity, we prove that this system provides a good level of privacy, verifiability, and accountability for low-risk elections.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代远程电子投票系统，如著名的Helios系统，旨在提供投票隐私和可验证性，粗略地说，后者意味着选民可以确保他们的投票被实际计算在内。在本文中，我们提出了一个新的实用投票系统，称为sElect(安全/简单选举)。我们实现的这个系统是一个独立于平台的基于web的应用程序，旨在用于低风险的选举，并且在结构、使用的加密技术和用户体验方面设计得非常简单和轻量级。sElect的独特之处之一是它支持全自动验证，不需要任何用户交互，只要选民看到选举结果就会触发。尽管它很简单，但我们证明了这个系统为低风险选举提供了良好的隐私、可验证性和可问责性。
papers.title_zh: 选择:一个轻量级的可验证的远程投票系统

papers.title: A Methodology for Formalizing Model-Inversion Attacks
papers.authors: Xi Wu, Matthew Fredrikson, Somesh Jha, Jeffrey F. Naughton
papers.abstract: Confidentiality of training data induced by releasing machine-learning models, and has recently received increasing attention. Motivated by existing MI attacks and other previous attacks that turn out to be MI "in disguise," this paper initiates a formal study of MI attacks by presenting a game-based methodology. Our methodology uncovers a number of subtle issues, and devising a rigorous game-based definition, analogous to those in cryptography, is an interesting avenue for future work. We describe methodologies for two types of attacks. The first is for black-box attacks, which consider an adversary who infers sensitive values with only oracle access to a model. The second methodology targets the white-box scenario where an adversary has some additional knowledge about the structure of a model. For the restricted class of Boolean models and black-box attacks, we characterize model invertibility using the concept of influence from Boolean analysis in the noiseless case, and connect model invertibility with stable influence in the noisy case. Interestingly, we also discovered an intriguing phenomenon, which we call "invertibility interference," where a highly invertible model quickly becomes highly non-invertible by adding little noise. For the white-box case, we consider a common phenomenon in machine-learning models where the model is a sequential composition of several sub-models. We show, quantitatively, that even very restricted communication between layers could leak a significant amount of information. Perhaps more importantly, our study also unveils unexpected computational power of these restricted communication channels, which, to the best of our knowledge, were not previously known.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于发布机器学习模型而导致的训练数据的保密性，最近受到越来越多的关注。受现有的MI攻击和其他先前被证明是MI“伪装”的攻击的启发，本文通过提出一种基于游戏的方法来发起对MI攻击的正式研究。我们的方法揭示了一些微妙的问题，设计一个严格的基于游戏的定义，类似于密码学中的定义，是未来工作的一个有趣的途径。我们描述了两种类型攻击的方法。第一种是针对黑盒攻击，它认为对手只能通过oracle访问模型来推断敏感值。第二种方法针对白盒场景，在白盒场景中，对手对模型的结构有一些额外的了解。对于布尔模型和黑盒攻击的限制类，我们在无噪声的情况下使用布尔分析的影响的概念来刻画模型的可逆性，并且在有噪声的情况下将模型的可逆性与稳定的影响联系起来。有趣的是，我们还发现了一个有趣的现象，我们称之为“可逆性干扰”，即一个高度可逆的模型通过添加很少的噪声很快变得高度不可逆。对于白盒情况，我们考虑机器学习模型中的一个常见现象，其中模型是几个子模型的顺序组合。我们定量地展示了，即使层与层之间非常有限的通信也可能泄漏大量的信息。也许更重要的是，我们的研究还揭示了这些受限通信渠道的意想不到的计算能力，据我们所知，这是以前所不知道的。
papers.title_zh: 一种形式化模型反转攻击的方法

papers.title: CASH: A Cost Asymmetric Secure Hash Algorithm for Optimal Password Protection
papers.authors: Jeremiah Blocki, Anupam Datta
papers.abstract: An adversary who has obtained the cryptographic hash of a user's password can mount an offline attack to crack the password by comparing this hash value with the cryptographic hashes of likely password guesses. This offline attacker is limited only by the resources he is willing to invest to crack the password. Key-stretching techniques like hash iteration and memory hard functions have been proposed to mitigate the threat of offline attacks by making each password guess more expensive for the adversary to verify. However, these techniques also increase costs for a legitimate authentication server. We introduce a novel Stackelberg game model which captures the essential elements of this interaction between a defender and an offline attacker. In the game the defender first commits to a key-stretching mechanism, and the offline attacker responds in a manner that optimizes his utility (expected reward minus expected guessing costs). We then introduce Cost Asymmetric Secure Hash (CASH), a randomized key-stretching mechanism that minimizes the fraction of passwords that would be cracked by a rational offline attacker without increasing amortized authentication costs for the legitimate authentication server. CASH is motivated by the observation that the legitimate authentication server will typically run the authentication procedure to verify a correct password, while an offline adversary will typically use incorrect password guesses. By using randomization we can ensure that the amortized cost of running CASH to verify a correct password guess is significantly smaller than the cost of rejecting an incorrect password. Using our Stackelberg game framework we can quantify the quality of the underlying CASH running time distribution in terms of the fraction of passwords that a rational offline adversary would crack. We provide an efficient algorithm to compute high quality CASH distributions for the defender. Finally, we analyze CASH using empirical data from two large scale password frequency datasets. Our analysis shows that CASH can significantly reduce (up to 50%) the fraction of password cracked by a rational offline adversary.
papers.abstract_zh: 已经获得用户密码的加密散列的对手可以发起离线攻击，通过将该散列值与可能的密码猜测的加密散列进行比较来破解密码。这个离线攻击者只受限于他愿意投入的破解密码的资源。已经提出了像散列迭代和存储器硬函数这样的密钥拉伸技术，通过使对手验证每个密码猜测更加昂贵来减轻离线攻击的威胁。然而，这些技术也增加了合法认证服务器的成本。我们引入了一个新颖的Stackelberg博弈模型，它捕捉了防御者和离线攻击者之间交互的基本要素。在游戏中，防御者首先使用一种密钥拉伸机制，离线攻击者以一种优化其效用(预期回报减去预期猜测成本)的方式做出响应。然后，我们引入了成本非对称安全散列(CASH)，这是一种随机化的密钥扩展机制，可以最小化被理性离线攻击者破解的密码部分，而不会增加合法认证服务器的分摊认证成本。CASH的动机是观察到合法的认证服务器通常会运行认证过程来验证正确的密码，而离线对手通常会使用不正确的密码猜测。通过使用随机化，我们可以确保运行现金来验证正确密码猜测的摊余成本明显小于拒绝不正确密码的成本。使用我们的Stackelberg博弈框架，我们可以根据一个理性的离线对手能够破解的密码部分来量化潜在现金运行时间分布的质量。我们提供了一个有效的算法来为防御者计算高质量的现金分配。最后，我们使用来自两个大规模密码频率数据集的经验数据来分析现金。我们的分析表明，现金可以显著降低(高达50%)被理性的离线对手破解的密码的比例。
papers.title_zh: CASH:一种成本不对称的安全哈希算法，用于优化密码保护

papers.title: Multi-run Side-Channel Analysis Using Symbolic Execution and Max-SMT
papers.authors: Corina S. Pasareanu, Quoc-Sang Phan, Pasquale Malacaria
papers.abstract: Side-channel attacks recover confidential information from non-functional characteristics of computations, such as time or memory consumption. We describe a program analysis that uses symbolic execution to quantify the information that is leaked to an attacker who makes multiple side-channel measurements. The analysis also synthesizes the concrete public inputs (the "attack") that lead to maximum leakage, via a novel reduction to Max-SMT solving over the constraints collected with symbolic execution. Furthermore model counting and information-theoretic metrics are used to compute an attacker's remaining uncertainty about a secret after a certain number of side-channel measurements are made. We have implemented the analysis in the Symbolic PathFinder tool and applied it in the context of password checking and cryptographic functions, showing how to obtain tight bounds on information leakage under a small number of attack steps.
papers.abstract_zh: 旁道攻击从计算的非功能特征(如时间或内存消耗)中恢复机密信息。我们描述了一个程序分析，它使用符号执行来量化泄露给攻击者的信息，攻击者进行多个侧信道测量。该分析还综合了导致最大泄漏的具体公共输入(“攻击”)，通过对使用符号执行收集的约束进行Max-SMT求解的新颖简化。此外，模型计数和信息论度量用于计算攻击者在进行一定数量的侧信道测量后对秘密的剩余不确定性。我们在符号探路者工具中实现了分析，并将其应用于密码检查和加密函数的上下文中，展示了如何在少量攻击步骤下获得信息泄漏的严格限制。
papers.title_zh: 使用符号执行和Max-SMT的多运行旁道分析

papers.title: Fault-Resilient Non-interference
papers.authors: Filippo Del Tedesco, David Sands, Alejandro Russo
papers.abstract: Environmental noise (e.g. heat, ionized particles, etc.) causes transient faults in hardware, which lead to corruption of stored values. Mission-critical devices require such faults to be mitigated by fault-tolerance - a combination of techniques that aim at preserving the functional behaviour of a system despite the disruptive effects of transient faults. Fault-tolerance typically has a high deployment cost - special hardware might be required to implement it - and provides weak statistical guarantees. It is also based on the assumption that faults are rare. In this paper, we consider scenarios where security, rather than functional correctness, is the main asset to be protected. Our main contribution is a theory for expressing confidentiality of data in the presence of transient faults. We show that the natural probabilistic definition of security in the presence of faults can be captured by a possibilistic definition. Furthermore, the possibilistic definition is implied by a known bisimulation-based property, called Strong Security. We illustrate the utility of these results for a simple RISC architecture for which only the code memory and program counter are assumed fault-tolerant. We present a type-directed compilation scheme that produces RISC code from a higher-level language for which Strong Security holds - i.e. well-typed programs compile to RISC code which is secure despite transient faults. In contrast with fault-tolerance solutions, our technique assumes relatively little special hardware, gives formal guarantees, and works in the presence of an active attacker who aggressively targets parts of a system and induces faults precisely.
papers.abstract_zh: 环境噪音(如热、电离粒子等。)导致硬件中的瞬时故障，从而导致存储值的损坏。任务关键型设备需要通过容错来减轻这种故障，容错是一种技术组合，旨在保持系统的功能行为，而不管瞬时故障的破坏性影响。容错通常有很高的部署成本——可能需要特殊的硬件来实现它——并且提供弱的统计保证。这也是基于故障很少的假设。在本文中，我们考虑安全性而不是功能正确性是要保护的主要资产的场景。我们的主要贡献是在存在瞬时故障的情况下表达数据机密性的理论。我们证明了存在错误时安全性的自然概率定义可以被可能性定义所捕获。此外，可能性定义隐含了一个已知的基于互模拟的属性，称为强安全性。我们说明了这些结果对于一个简单的RISC体系结构的效用，对于该体系结构，只有代码存储器和程序计数器被认为是容错的。我们提出了一种面向类型的编译方案，该方案从具有强安全性的高级语言产生RISC代码——即，类型良好的程序编译成RISC代码，尽管有短暂的错误，该代码也是安全的。与容错解决方案相比，我们的技术假设相对较少的特殊硬件，给出正式的保证，并且在主动攻击者的存在下工作，该攻击者积极地以系统的部分为目标并精确地诱发故障。
papers.title_zh: 容错无干扰

papers.title: Compositional Verification and Refinement of Concurrent Value-Dependent Noninterference
papers.authors: Toby C. Murray, Robert Sison, Edward Pierzchalski, Christine Rizkallah
papers.abstract: Value-dependent noninterference allows the classification of program variables to depend on the contents of other variables, and therefore is able to express a range of data-dependent security policies. However, so far its static enforcement mechanisms for software have been limited either to progress-and termination-insensitive noninterference for sequential languages, or to concurrent message-passing programs without shared memory. Additionally, there exists no methodology for preserving value-dependent noninterference for shared memory programs under compositional refinement. This paper presents a flow-sensitive dependent type system for enforcing timing-sensitive value-dependent noninterference for shared memory concurrent programs, comprising a collection of sequential components, as well as a compositional refinement theory for preserving this property under componentwise refinement. Our results are mechanised in Isabelle/HOL.
papers.abstract_zh: 依赖于值的不干涉允许程序变量的分类依赖于其他变量的内容，因此能够表达一系列依赖于数据的安全策略。然而，到目前为止，它的软件静态执行机制要么局限于顺序语言的对进程和终止不敏感的不干涉，要么局限于没有共享内存的并发消息传递程序。此外，不存在用于在组合细化下保持共享存储器程序的值相关的不干扰的方法。本文提出了一个流敏感的依赖类型系统，用于对共享内存并发程序实施时间敏感的值相关的不干涉，该系统包括一个顺序组件的集合，以及一个用于在组件式精化下保持该属性的组合精化理论。我们的结果在伊莎贝尔/HOL进行了机械化处理。
papers.title_zh: 并发值相关不干涉的组合验证和精化

papers.title: Resilient Delegation Revocation with Precedence for Predecessors Is NP-Complete
papers.authors: Marcos Cramer, Pieter Van Hertum, Ruben Lapauw, Ingmar Dasseville, Marc Denecker
papers.abstract: In ownership-based access control frameworks with the possibility of delegating permissions and administrative rights, chains of delegated accesses will form. There are different ways to treat these delegation chains when revoking rights, which give rise to different revocation schemes. One possibility studied in the literature is to revoke rights by issuing negative authorizations, meant to ensure that the revocation is resilient to a later reissuing of the rights, and to resolve conflicts between principals by giving precedence to predecessors, i.e. principals that come earlier in the delegation chain. However, the effects of negative authorizations have been defined differently by different authors. Having identified three definitions of this effect from the literature, the first contribution of this paper is to point out that two of these three definitions pose a security threat. However, avoiding this security threat comes at a price: We prove that with the safe definition of the effect of negative authorizations, deciding whether a principal does have access to a resource is an NP-complete decision problem. We discuss two limitations that can be imposed on an access-control system in order to reduce the complexity of the problem back to a polynomial complexity: Limiting the length of delegation chains to an integer m reduces the runtime complexity of determining access to O(nm), and requiring that principals form a hierarchy that graph-theoretically forms a rooted tree makes this decision problem solvable in quadratic runtime. Finally we discuss an approach that can mitigate the complexity problem in practice without fully getting rid of NP-completeness.
papers.abstract_zh: 在基于所有权的访问控制框架中，可以委托权限和管理权限，将形成委托访问链。当撤销权限时，有不同的方式来处理这些委托链，这产生了不同的撤销方案。文献中研究的一种可能性是通过发布否定授权来撤销权利，这意味着确保撤销对权利的稍后重新发布具有弹性，并通过给予前任(即在委托链中较早出现的委托人)优先权来解决委托人之间的冲突。然而，不同的作者对否定授权的效力有不同的定义。从文献中确定了这种影响的三种定义后，本文的第一个贡献是指出这三种定义中的两种会造成安全威胁。然而，避免这种安全威胁是有代价的:我们证明，根据否定授权效果的安全定义，决定主体是否有权访问资源是一个NP完全决策问题。我们讨论了可以施加在访问控制系统上的两个限制，以便将问题的复杂性降低回多项式复杂性:将委托链的长度限制为整数m降低了确定对O(nm)的访问的运行时复杂性，并且要求主体形成图理论上形成有根树的层次结构使得该决策问题在二次运行时可解。最后，我们讨论了一种方法，可以减轻实践中的复杂性问题，而不完全摆脱NP完全性。
papers.title_zh: 优先于前任的弹性委托撤销是NP完全的

papers.title: Access Control Synthesis for Physical Spaces
papers.authors: Petar Tsankov, Mohammad Torabi Dashti, David A. Basin
papers.abstract: Access-control requirements for physical spaces, like office buildings and airports, are best formulated from a global viewpoint in terms of system-wide requirements. For example, "there is an authorized path to exit the building from every room." In contrast, individual access-control components, such as doors and turnstiles, can only enforce local policies, specifying when the component may open. In practice, the gap between the system-wide, global requirements and the many local policies is bridged manually, which is tedious, error-prone, and scales poorly. We propose a framework to automatically synthesize local access control policies from a set of global requirements for physical spaces. Our framework consists of an expressive language to specify both global requirements and physical spaces, and an algorithm for synthesizing local, attribute-based policies from the global specification. We empirically demonstrate the framework's effectiveness on three substantial case studies. The studies demonstrate that access control synthesis is practical even for complex physical spaces, such as airports, with many interrelated security requirements.
papers.abstract_zh: 办公大楼和机场等物理空间的出入控制要求最好从全系统要求的全局角度来制定。例如，“每个房间都有一条经过授权的路径可以离开大楼。”相比之下，单独的访问控制组件，如门和十字转门，只能执行本地策略，指定组件何时可以打开。在实践中，系统范围的、全局的需求和许多本地策略之间的差距是手动弥合的，这是乏味的、容易出错的，并且可扩展性差。我们提出了一个从物理空间的一组全局需求中自动合成局部访问控制策略的框架。我们的框架由一种表达性语言和一种算法组成，前者用于指定全局需求和物理空间，后者用于从全局规范中合成局部的、基于属性的策略。我们在三个重要的案例研究中实证了该框架的有效性。这些研究表明，即使对于复杂的物理空间，如机场，具有许多相互关联的安全要求，访问控制综合也是可行的。
papers.title_zh: 物理空间的访问控制综合

papers.title: Static Detection of Collusion Attacks in ARBAC-Based Workflow Systems
papers.authors: Stefano Calzavara, Alvise Rabitti, Enrico Steffinlongo, Michele Bugliesi
papers.abstract: Authorization in workflow systems is usually built on top of role-based access control (RBAC), security policies on workflows are then expressed as constraints on the users performing a set of tasks and the roles assigned to them. Unfortunately, when role administration is distributed and potentially untrusted users contribute to the role assignment process, like in the case of Administrative RBAC (ARBAC), collusions may take place to circumvent the intended workflow security policies. In a collusion attack, a set of users of a workflow system collaborates by changing the user-to-role assignment, so as to sidestep the security policies and run up to completion a workflow they could not complete otherwise. In this paper, we study the problem of collusion attacks in a formal model of workflows based on stable event structures and we define a precise notion of security against collusion. We then propose a static analysis technique based on a reduction to a role reachability problem for ARBAC, which can be used to prove or disprove security for a large class of workflow systems. We also discuss how to aggressively optimise the obtained role reachability problem to ensure its tractability. Finally, we implement our analysis in a tool, WARBAC, and we experimentally show its effectiveness on a set of publicly available examples, including a realistic case study.
papers.abstract_zh: 工作流系统中的授权通常建立在基于角色的访问控制(RBAC)之上，工作流的安全策略则表示为对执行一组任务的用户和分配给他们的角色的约束。不幸的是，当角色管理是分布式的，并且潜在的不受信任的用户参与角色分配过程时，就像管理RBAC (ARBAC)的情况一样，可能会发生合谋来规避预期的工作流安全策略。在共谋攻击中，工作流系统的一组用户通过改变用户到角色的分配来合作，以便绕过安全策略并运行直到完成他们否则无法完成的工作流。在本文中，我们研究了基于稳定事件结构的工作流形式化模型中的共谋攻击问题，并定义了一个精确的抗共谋安全概念。然后，我们提出了一个基于ARBAC的角色可达性问题的静态分析技术，它可以用来证明或否定一大类工作流系统的安全性。我们还讨论了如何积极优化所获得的角色可达性问题，以确保其可追踪性。最后，我们在工具WARBAC中实现了我们的分析，并在一组公开可用的例子上实验性地展示了它的有效性，包括一个真实的案例研究。
papers.title_zh: 基于ARBAC的工作流系统中共谋攻击的静态检测

papers.title: Zero-Knowledge in EasyCrypt
papers.authors: Denis Firsov, Dominique Unruh
papers.abstract: We formalize security properties of zero-knowledge protocols and their proofs in EasyCrypt. Specifically, we focus on sigma protocols (three-round protocols). Most importantly, we also cover properties whose security proofs require the use of rewinding; prior work has focused on properties that do not need this more advanced technique. On our way we give generic definitions of the main properties associated with sigma protocols, both in the computational and information-theoretical setting. We give generic derivations of soundness, (malicious-verifier) zero-knowledge, and proof of knowledge from simpler assumptions with proofs which rely on rewinding. Also, we address sequential composition of sigma protocols. Finally, we illustrate the applicability of our results on three zero-knowledge protocols: Fiat-Shamir (for quadratic residues), Schnorr (for discrete logarithms), and Blum (for Hamiltonian cycles, NP-complete).
papers.title_zh: EasyCrypt中的零知识
papers.abstract_zh: 我们形式化了零知识协议的安全性质，并用EasyCrypt对其进行了证明。具体来说，我们关注sigma协议(三轮协议)。最重要的是，我们还涵盖了财产的安全证明需要使用倒带；先前的工作集中在不需要这种更先进技术的特性上。在我们的方法中，我们给出了与sigma协议相关的主要属性的一般定义，包括计算和信息理论设置。我们给出了可靠性的一般推导，(恶意验证者)零知识，以及来自简单假设的知识证明，其证明依赖于倒回。此外，我们解决西格玛协议的顺序组成。最后，我们说明了我们的结果在三个零知识协议上的适用性:Fiat-Shamir(对于二次剩余)、Schnorr(对于离散对数)和Blum(对于哈密顿圈，NP-完全)。

papers.title: Statement-Oblivious Threshold Witness Encryption
papers.authors: Sebastian Faust, Carmit Hazay, David Kretzler, Benjamin Schlosser
papers.abstract: The notion of witness encryption introduced by Garg et al. (STOC'13) allows to encrypt a message under a statement $x$ from some NP-language $\mathcal{L}$ with associated relation $(x, w)\in \mathcal{R}$, where decryption can be carried out with the corresponding witness $w$. Unfortunately, known constructions for general-purpose witness encryption rely on strong assumptions, and are mostly of theoretical interest. To address these short-comings, Goyal et al. (PKC'22) recently introduced a blockchain-based alternative, where a committee decrypts ciphertexts when provided with a valid witness $w$. Blockchain-based committee solutions have recently gained broad interest to offer security against more powerful adversaries and construct new cryptographic primitives. We follow this line of work, and propose a new notion of statement-oblivious threshold witness encryption. Our new notion offers the functionality of committee-based witness encryption while additionally hiding the statement used for encryption. We present two ways to build statement-oblivious threshold witness encryption, one generic transformation based on anonymous threshold identity-based encryption (A-TIBE) and one direct construction based on bilinear maps. Due to the lack of efficient A-TIBE schemes, the former mainly constitutes a feasibility result, while the latter yields a concretely efficient scheme.
papers.title_zh: 语句无关的门限见证加密
papers.abstract_zh: Garg等人(STOC'13)引入的见证加密的概念允许在来自某个NP语言$\mathcal{L}$的语句$x$下使用关联关系$(x，w)\in \mathcal{R}$对消息进行加密，其中可以使用相应的见证$w$进行解密。不幸的是，通用见证加密的已知构造依赖于强假设，并且主要是理论上的兴趣。为了解决这些缺点，Goyal等人(PKC'22)最近引入了一种基于区块链的替代方案，在该方案中，当提供有效的证人$w$时，一个委员会解密密文。基于区块链的委员会解决方案最近获得了广泛的兴趣，以针对更强大的对手提供安全性并构建新的加密原语。我们遵循这一思路，提出了一种新的声明无关门限见证加密的概念。我们的新概念提供了基于委员会的见证加密功能，同时还隐藏了用于加密的语句。我们提出了两种构造声明无关门限见证加密的方法，一种是基于匿名门限基于身份加密(A-TIBE)的一般变换，另一种是基于双线性映射的直接构造。由于缺乏有效的A-TIBE方案，前者主要构成一个可行性结果，而后者产生一个具体有效的方案。

papers.title: Preimage Awareness in Linicrypt
papers.authors: Zahra Javar, Bruce M. Kapron
papers.abstract: We extend the analysis of collision-resistant hash functions in the Linicrypt model presented by McQuoid, Swope & Rosulek (TCC 2019) in order to characterize preimage awareness, a security property defined by Dodis, Ristenpart & Shrimpton (Eurocrypt 2009), who also demonstrate its utility in the construction of indifferentiable hash functions. We present a simple and efficiently-checkable property of Linicrypt programs which characterizes preimage awareness. Finally, we show that this characterization may be efficiently automated and as an example, use it to enumerate all preimage-aware compression functions which use two calls to the random oracle. This includes several functions shown to be preimage aware by Dodis et. al. using hand-crafted proofs.
papers.title_zh: linkcrypt中的前像感知
papers.abstract_zh: 我们在McQuoid，Swope & Rosulek (TCC 2019)提出的Linicrypt模型中扩展了对抗冲突哈希函数的分析，以表征Dodis，risten part & Shrimpton(Eurocrypt 2009)定义的安全属性“原像感知”，他们还证明了它在构建不可微哈希函数中的效用。我们提出了Linicrypt程序的一个简单而有效的可检查属性，它表征了前像感知。最后，我们展示了这种表征可以被有效地自动化，并且作为一个例子，使用它来枚举所有使用对随机预言机的两次调用的前像感知压缩函数。这包括Dodis等人提出的几个前像感知函数。艾尔。使用手工制作的校样。

papers.title: Election Verifiability with ProVerif
papers.authors: Vincent Cheval, Véronique Cortier, Alexandre Debant
papers.abstract: Electronic voting systems should guarantee (at least) vote privacy and verifiability. Formally proving these two properties is challenging. Indeed, vote privacy is typically expressed as an equivalence property, hard to analyze for automatic tools, while verifiability requires to count the number of votes, to guarantee that all honest votes are properly tallied. We provide a full characterization of E2E-verifiability in terms of two simple properties, that are shown to be both sufficient and necessary. In contrast, previous approaches proposed sufficient conditions only. These two properties can easily be expressed in a formal tool like ProVerif but remain hard to prove automatically. Therefore, we provide a generic election framework, together with a library of lemmas, for the (automatic) proof of E2E-verifiability. We successfully apply our framework to several protocols of the literature that include two complex, industrial-scale voting protocols, namely Swiss Post and CHVote, designed for the Swiss context.
papers.title_zh: 选举的可验证性
papers.abstract_zh: 电子投票系统应该保证(至少)投票的私密性和可验证性。正式证明这两个性质是具有挑战性的。事实上，投票隐私通常被表示为一个等价属性，很难用自动化工具进行分析，而可验证性则需要计算投票数，以保证所有诚实的投票都被正确记录。我们根据两个简单的性质提供了E2E可验证性的完整表征，这两个性质被证明是充分的和必要的。相比之下，以前的方法只提出了充分条件。这两个属性可以很容易地用ProVerif这样的正式工具来表达，但是很难自动证明。因此，我们提供了一个通用的选举框架，以及一个引理库，用于(自动)证明E2E可验证性。我们成功地将我们的框架应用于文献中的几个协议，包括两个复杂的工业规模的投票协议，即瑞士邮政和CHVote，它们是为瑞士环境设计的。

papers.title: Election Verifiability in Receipt-Free Voting Protocols
papers.authors: Sevdenur Baloglu, Sergiu Bursuc, Sjouke Mauw, Jun Pang
papers.abstract: Electronic voting is a prominent example of conflicting requirements in security protocols, as the triad of privacy, verifiability and usability is essential for their deployment in practice. Receipt-freeness is a particularly strong notion of privacy, stating that it should be preserved even if voters cooperate with the adversary. While there are impossibility results showing we cannot have receipt-freeness and verifiability at the same time, there are several protocols that aim to achieve both, based on carefully devised trust assumptions. To evaluate their security, we propose a general symbolic definition of election verifiability, extending the state of the art to capture the more complex structure of receipt-free protocols. We apply this definition to analyse, using ProVerif, recent protocols with promising practical features: BeleniosRF and several variants of Selene. Against BeleniosRF, we find several attacks showing that verifiability in Belenios does indeed suffer from the attempt to introduce receipt-freeness. On the other hand, Selene satisfies a weaker notion of receipt-freeness, but we show that it satisfies verifiability in stronger corruption scenarios. We introduce a general frame-work to compare the verifiability of these protocols in various corruption scenarios and conclude with an analysis of SeleneRF, an attempt to get the best of both that we formalise in this paper. In addition to extending the symbolic model, our results point to foundational gaps in current cryptographic models for election verifiability, as they fail to uncover attacks that we do.
papers.title_zh: 无收据投票协议中选举的可验证性
papers.abstract_zh: 电子投票是安全协议中冲突需求的一个突出例子，因为隐私、可验证性和可用性三者对于它们在实践中的部署是至关重要的。免收据是一个特别强烈的隐私概念，它表明即使选民与对手合作，也应该保护隐私。虽然不可能的结果表明我们不能同时拥有无收据性和可验证性，但有几个协议旨在实现这两者，基于精心设计的信任假设。为了评估它们的安全性，我们提出了一个选举可验证性的一般符号定义，扩展了现有技术以捕捉更复杂的无收据协议结构。我们应用这个定义，使用ProVerif分析最近的协议，这些协议具有有希望的实用特征:BeleniosRF和塞勒涅的几个变体。针对BeleniosRF，我们发现了几个攻击，表明Belenios中的可验证性确实受到了引入无接收性的尝试的影响。另一方面，塞勒涅满足一个较弱的无收据概念，但是我们证明它在更强的腐败场景中满足可验证性。我们引入了一个通用的框架来比较这些协议在各种破坏场景下的可验证性，并以对SeleneRF的分析结束，这是我们在本文中形式化的一个尝试。除了扩展符号模型之外，我们的结果指出了当前选举可验证性的密码模型中的基本缺口，因为它们未能发现我们所发现的攻击。

papers.title: Proving Unlinkability Using ProVerif Through Desynchronised Bi-Processes
papers.authors: David Baelde, Alexandre Debant, Stéphanie Delaune
papers.abstract: Unlinkability is a privacy property of crucial importance for several systems such as mobile phones or RFID chips. Analysing this security property is very complex, and highly error-prone. Therefore, formal verification with machine support is desirable. Unfortunately, existing techniques are not sufficient to directly apply verification tools to automatically prove unlinkability. In this paper, we overcome this limitation by defining a simple transformation that will exploit some specific features of ProVerif. This transformation, together with some generic axioms, allows the tool to successfully conclude on several case studies. We have implemented our approach, effectively obtaining direct proofs of unlinkability on several protocols that were, until now, out of reach of automatic verification tools.
papers.title_zh: 通过非同步双进程使用ProVerif证明不可链接性
papers.abstract_zh: 不可链接性是对诸如移动电话或RFID芯片之类的几个系统至关重要的隐私属性。分析这种安全属性非常复杂，而且非常容易出错。因此，有机器支持的正式验证是可取的。不幸的是，现有技术不足以直接应用验证工具来自动证明不可链接性。在本文中，我们通过定义一个简单的转换来克服这个限制，这个转换将利用ProVerif的一些特定特性。这种转换，加上一些通用的公理，使得该工具能够成功地完成几个案例研究。我们已经实现了我们的方法，有效地获得了几个协议的不可链接性的直接证明，这些协议直到现在都是自动验证工具无法达到的。

papers.title: Basilic: Resilient-Optimal Consensus Protocols with Benign and Deceitful Faults
papers.authors: Alejandro Ranchal-Pedrosa, Vincent Gramoli
papers.abstract: The problem of Byzantine consensus has been key to designing secure distributed systems. However, it is particularly difficult, mainly due to the presence of Byzantine processes that act arbitrarily and the unknown message delays in general networks. Although it is well known that both safety and liveness are at risk as soon as $n/3$ Byzantine processes fail, very few works attempted to characterize precisely the faults that produce safety violations from the faults that produce termination violations. In this paper, we present a new lower bound on the solvability of the consensus problem by distinguishing deceitful faults violating safety and benign faults violating termination from the more general Byzantine faults, in what we call the Byzantine-deceitful-benign fault model. We show that one cannot solve consensus if $n\leq 3t+d+2q$ with $t$ Byzantine processes, $d$ deceitful processes, and $q$ benign processes. In addition, we show that this bound is tight by presenting the Basilic class of consensus protocols that solve consensus when $n > 3t+d+2q$. These protocols differ in the number of processes from which they wait to receive messages before progressing. Each of these protocols is thus better suited for some applications depending on the predominance of benign or deceitful faults.
papers.title_zh: Basilic:具有良性和欺骗性错误的弹性最优一致性协议
papers.abstract_zh: 拜占庭一致性问题是设计安全分布式系统的关键。然而，这是特别困难的，主要是由于任意行动的拜占庭进程的存在和一般网络中未知的消息延迟。尽管众所周知，一旦$n/3$ Byzantine进程失败，安全性和活性都处于危险之中，但是很少有人试图从产生终止违规的故障中精确地表征产生安全性违规的故障。在本文中，我们通过将违反安全性的欺骗性故障和违反终止性的良性故障与更一般的拜占庭故障区分开来，给出了一致性问题可解性的一个新的下界，我们称之为拜占庭欺骗性良性故障模型。我们证明，如果$n\leq 3t+d+2q$具有$t$拜占庭过程、$d$欺骗过程和$q$良性过程，则无法解决共识。此外，我们通过提出当$n > 3t+d+2q$时解决一致性问题的基本类一致性协议来证明这个界限是紧的。这些协议在进程数量上有所不同，它们在进程继续运行之前等待接收消息。因此，根据良性或欺骗性故障的优势，这些协议中的每一个都更适合于某些应用。

papers.title: Towards a Game-Theoretic Security Analysis of Off-Chain Protocols
papers.authors: Sophie Rain, Georgia Avarikioti, Laura Kovács, Matteo Maffei
papers.abstract: Off-chain protocols constitute one of the most promising approaches to solve the inherent scalability issue of blockchain technologies. The core idea is to let parties transact on-chain only once to establish a channel between them, leveraging later on the resulting channel paths to perform arbitrarily many peer-to-peer transactions off-chain. While significant progress has been made in terms of proof techniques for off-chain protocols, existing approaches do not capture the game-theoretic incentives at the core of their design, which led to overlooking significant attack vectors like the Wormhole attack in the past. In this work we take a first step towards a principled game-theoretic security analysis of off-chain protocols by introducing the first game-theoretic model that is expressive enough to reason about their security. We advocate the use of Extensive Form Games (EFGs) and introduce two instances of EFGs to capture security properties of the closing and the routing of the Lightning Network. Specifically, we model the closing protocol, which relies on punishment mechanisms to disincentivize parties to upload old channel states on-chain. Moreover, we model the routing protocol, thereby formally characterizing the Wormhole attack, a vulnerability that undermines the fee-based incentive mechanism underlying the Lightning Network.
papers.title_zh: 非链协议的博弈论安全性分析
papers.abstract_zh: 离线协议是解决区块链技术固有的可扩展性问题的最有前途的方法之一。核心思想是让各方只在链上交易一次，以在它们之间建立一个通道，以后利用产生的通道路径在链外执行任意多个对等交易。虽然在链外协议的证明技术方面已经取得了重大进展，但是现有的方法并没有捕捉到其设计核心的博弈论动机，这导致忽略了重要的攻击媒介，如过去的虫洞攻击。在这项工作中，我们通过引入第一个博弈论模型，迈出了对链外协议进行有原则的博弈论安全性分析的第一步，该模型具有足够的表达能力来推理它们的安全性。我们提倡使用扩展形式游戏(EFG ),并引入两个EFG实例来捕获闪电网络的闭合和路由的安全属性。具体来说，我们对关闭协议进行建模，该协议依靠惩罚机制来阻止各方上传旧的链上通道状态。此外，我们对路由协议进行了建模，从而正式描述了虫洞攻击的特征，这是一种破坏闪电网络下基于费用的激励机制的漏洞。

papers.title: Keep Spending: Beyond Optimal Cyber-Security Investment
papers.authors: Yunxiao Zhang, Pasquale Malacaria
papers.abstract: We introduce an efficient solution for Stackelberg games in the context of a class of Security games and bounded rational attackers. These games model a threat scenario where an attacker can launch multi-stage attacks against a defender who can deploy defensive controls subject to some budget constraints. Because the optimal solution in these games may leave some unspent budget, the question of what to do in this situation arises. In this work, we suggest investing it iteratively in the closest sub-optimal solutions until possible. Here we develop the needed theory and framework, starting from defining sub-optimality and solving the corresponding optimisations. By using total unimodularity and precise linear programming (LP) relaxation, we provide an efficient computational solution to these games. The security improvement of the proposed approach is illustrated with an AI threat scenario.
papers.title_zh: 保持支出:超越最佳网络安全投资
papers.abstract_zh: 在一类安全博弈和有限理性攻击者的背景下，我们介绍了一种有效的解决方案。这些游戏模拟了一个威胁场景，攻击者可以对防御方发起多阶段攻击，防御方可以根据一些预算限制部署防御控制。因为这些博弈中的最优解可能会留下一些未用完的预算，所以在这种情况下该怎么办的问题就出现了。在这项工作中，我们建议将它反复投资于最接近的次优解，直到可能为止。在这里，我们发展所需的理论和框架，从定义次优和解决相应的优化开始。通过使用完全幺模和精确线性规划(LP)松弛，我们为这些游戏提供了一个有效的计算解决方案。通过一个人工智能威胁场景说明了所提出方法的安全性改进。

papers.title: A State-Separating Proof for Yao's Garbling Scheme
papers.authors: Chris Brzuska, Sabine Oechsner
papers.abstract: Secure multiparty computation enables mutually distrusting parties to compute a public function of their secret inputs. One of the main approaches for designing MPC protocols are garbled circuits whose core component is usually referred to as a garbling scheme. In this work, we revisit the security of Yao's garbling scheme and provide a modular security proof which composes the security of multiple layer garblings to prove security of the full circuit garbling. We perform our security proof in the style of state-separating proofs (ASIACRYPT 2018).
papers.title_zh: 姚断章取义的一个分邦证明
